The process to fill in my payment details and get verified was long, but ok, I completed everything.Then there was a notice saying "we need to confirm you have licenses for your music, please contact support".So I had to manually contact support. That was 2 months ago. Since then they sent one message that they will reply to me soon, and then they just closed the support ticket with no reply.I am still unable to withdraw anything, and I doubt they will ever let me, they just ignore you and provide fake reasons for not letting you withdraw.I spoke with friends who are with other distributors, and none of them had anything of "proving your license", especially not after the fact, manually to contact them, not with some automated standard process. My music is my own, singer songwriter style, it's obvious there are no "licenses" involved. But they don't even want to confirm that, they just ignore any attempt to contact them.To me it's obvious this is designed to delay any payments to artists, maybe that's how Ditto really makes money. Also, it's obvious that many of the positive reviews here are purchased by Ditto and not real.Edit: March 2021 and still not paid. No replies from support. Just ignored.

Great service, even if you have any issues, they respond quickly. You can message via the instagram page too and they get back to you the same day normally. Very happy, have used them since day 1 and chances are it will stay that way. The website is clear and as a musician you get all the information you need.

The worst service hands down... it took between 10-19 days to get responses from support...Website constantly crashes/logs you outI tried to re-upload music already up with my old distributor, got one re-released successfully with them for them to then tell me (nearly 2 weeks after my ticket) that it's not possible to do the second time around....this was only for a re-release of old music too, so I dread to think how badly things would go with a fresh releaseDo not waste your money! find a good distributor
I love using this service been great how I can see all my music and how easy it is to get back to my next album or single selection and be able to see how I can improve.

review_title: I've been using Ditto Music  and get PAID
review_content: I've been using Ditto Music 2 professional artist plan for 5 months. Uploading was easy and fast. Delivery was on time. The customer service is quick and fast as you can chat them directly. I live in Indonesia, so it's quite a time difference, but they replied fast. The only downside, is the royalty report which you can't see your stats beyond 30 days and it quite slow compare to distrokid in reporting your royalties. Overall, It's been a good experience so far.(Update). I,ve just  received my first royalty payout recently . Honesty, i am quite nervous reading all the negative comment of ditto not paying royalty. But i can say it's not true. As long as you are not doing shady stuff like bot streaming, or other illegal fraud streaming  method , i believe you should be fine.The process tooks me around three weeks from the first royalty report. Then your royalty were held for pending clearance verification. I submitted my ticket for clearance support. And it tooks a while to get replied. I live chatted ditto cs a few time, and they can't help much because it's a different department and they have limited access. I appreciated their help. Then once you received email from clearance department, you can withdraw your royalty to payoneer. It tooks me around 3 days to get the payout money into my local bank.the good things, ditto dont cut any tax or witheld tax like distrokid, 100% exactly from your royalty report and $3 processing fee from payoneer to your local bank.This is my experience, so I cant guarantee it will be the same to everyone.I will update this review once i received my second payout. Cheers

review_title: I was trying to release an EP under…
review_content: I was trying to release an EP under multiply artist and I understand it is a bit complicated so the support team had to do some research to help me and it some a couple of hours but they helped me find the best way in the end.The only thing they could do is to inform themself before so they don't tell people the wrong things and waste their time, but as long it comes out right in the end its all good.
It was all good, best experience! Thankyou also for the opportunity!

review_title: I would like to be able to add the…
review_content: I would like to be able to add the lyrics to my songs so that the lyrics are present in Spotify, Insta, etc..

review_title: It’s  been great working with Ditto all…
review_content: It’s  been great working with Ditto all this while. Love how they report streams, how simple it is to upload a track and how fast they appear in stores. Only problem I have with them is their payout options. There should be more options not only Payoneer. Payoneer is not allowing anyone withdraw money. It is more and more looking like a scam. Ditto should consider adding other payout options. Thank you

review_title: We've been using Ditto about 3-4 years…
review_content: We've been using Ditto about 3-4 years now and have had a relatively decent experience.  Every company has it's hiccups so I don't expect the world.  With that being said, Ditto has made it pretty much pretty simple in terms of getting music out.  They are connect to nearly all of the players in the streaming world so once you release, your music is everywhere.  No complaints there. .. if there were a complaint it would be a slow communication and the lack up updated features as not much has been changed or added over the last few years.  Other than than that, we will continue to use them for what we do..,

4 stars because I haven't quite finished the whole process yet.  I'd like to use Ditto's PR campaign and will be looking at that soon, so the 1 star is waiting until I've used the service.Easy enough to upload my track and I like the way it's one price for unlimited uploads. That a big help for emerging artists.
Excellent service!! Always released music on time and never delayed any promotions. Great company.

Truly aweful customer service. Used Ditto for years until I found that they had taken money out of my bank account without my permission. 3 months later still no resolution despite promising a refund.Customer service is virtually none existant and if you do get an answer they don't care. I have had to open a despute with PayPal and my Bank. Also I'm having major issues with getting my royalties for my songs. Basically Ditto has a chunk of my money (from royalties of my songs and just dipping into my account) and they don't seem to want to help. Honestly, I would advise people to stay clear of Ditto Music.

Ditto is a very good distributor. It has some nice functions such as analytics to see where your streams and downloads come from. It also has an easy and intuitive design. The only negative thing about Ditto is the speed. It takes more than a week to receive an email back from customer support and your releases take 10 days to be live on all stores. Any faster costs an extra 50 bucks per release.
Beware - they charged me money via Paypal years after I've canceled my subscription.

review_title: Ive been here for years and had a bad…
review_content: Ive been here for years and had a bad experience, I always have to sign in over and over while trying to maintain my account, I've been waiting years for my Video account to be connected, I can never get any support.  I set for all my songs to be added to stores as they come, yet I have to manually update them all,  also I have never been sent my Box for RLIAB.  I feel used and cheated.

We absolutely love working with Ditto to release our work. Their customer support is fantastic, any issues we have come across they have jumped straight onto it for us and communicated every step of the way. Thank You Ditto Team - we look forward to continuing with you in 2021!
Very happy with what's been achieved over my first year with Ditto. Although I've not exactly made it, everything you've done has been extremely helpful.

Overall, I am more than satisfied. This process has been new for me but it has not been as difficult as I thought it would be. I appreciate the progression and improvements that are being made in the backoffice. I am pleased with the prompt responses from contact support when I have had an issue.

I’ve been a user of Ditto music for nearly 3 years now. The Ditto Music online service l is a dream to use until you need any kind of human interaction or contact.  I didn’t have any issues with the service until I had an issue and I needed assistance. For the past month I have been trying to resolve an issue with payments of my own funds in my account which, at this time, I’m still awaiting to be resolved. Ditto customer service can take up to 7+ days to reply to you about an issue you are having. I believe this to be unacceptable for any type of company, especially a company holding monetary funds for its user base. In addition to this issue, Ditto have also moved my release date three days after I selected and confirmed its release. They did this by asking me to check and confirm my release didn’t contain “ Titles must not contain generic wording - e.g. Track 1, Future type beat, dance mix 2, acoustic backing track, etc.” By having to confirm this, something that I’ve never had to do before, pushes my release to a later date. For these reasons I will be reconsidering my digital distribution as I think Doesn't care about it’s customers.

review_title: I've been a member for over 3 years now…
review_content: I've been a member for over 3 years now and i must say I have enjoyed my experience thus far. i know this is a big platform with millions of users, but hopefully the  processing speed of uploads can be a few days faster. lol.
Very easy to use, communication is superb.

review_title: Quality alternative to more expensive options
review_content: Ditto Music has helped us release our music for a fraction of the cost of bigger name competitors. Ditto recently helped us obtain an Official Artist Channel on YouTube, which gave our label a big boost.

From start to finish Ditto delivered a professional, speedy and easy way to get our music out there!  In addition, they are efficient and friendly.  They guided me through the process, every step of the way.We continue to use Ditto to release our music.

Ditto does as advertised.  The reason it isn't 5 stars is issues arise which I find out instead of Ditto telling me.  Releases not going live etc.  Ditto will work with you to fix and we've made money

Horrible service, nothing on your site is clear. every release is being taken with a buffer of 1 month extra coz you never know if everything is correctly set up. and no one never answers - and when does - so the answers aren't relevant. would never recommend anyone to register with you.

review_title: A pleasure to work with and always…
review_content: A pleasure to work with and always efficient. Looking forward to releasing new material in the forth coming months!

review_title: I am satisfied with Ditto Music's…
review_content: I am satisfied with Ditto Music's service. It helped me a lot as an independent music artist.

this site deserves everything it gets it's easy to use the help and has so many stores to publish your music on.I'm glad I found this site cause if I didn't I would have a very hard time publishing my music and making music is my dream thx to DITTO!

Really The Biggest Differences From My Other Distributors I can say is the Best Feature for me to have a Live Support that can Solve Your Problem Instantly. As for other features, I can say I'm Really Satisfied.
I am excited to release new music to the whole world before 2020 ends!!! I just hope that it'll go up fast! Thank you so much Ditto for helping me as an independent artist!!! I love Ditto!!!!

review_title: The only place to launch your music…
review_content: The only place to launch your music around the globe!

review_title: Like any other Distributer Ditto has It…
review_content: Like any other Distributer Ditto has It Ups And Downs just Pick Your Poison..😉But I Promise if You Stick Around #DITTO Get to Know and understand how they Operate while being Very PATIENCE,While working Hard.. Your Desires As and Independent Artist Will Surely Manifest I recommend DITTO if You Wanna be A great Independent Artist

Ditto Mousic Rocks! I have enjoyed you guys as my distributor since I have returned to creating music. If I have ever had an issue you guys got it situated in a timely manner. Proud to be part of the Ditto Fam!
Awesome I lobe how simple they make it to release an start to earn from your music. Just a few clicks an uploads an hour on your way to having your content on all platforms

review_title: Much more than what it says on the tin...
review_content: When Covid struck... I was at a loss. I hadn't played music in a long time but somehow picking up my guitar again and starting to write seemed to make sense. After getting a few tracks written and recorded I started to look around for a distribution company. There are plenty... but, Ditto stood out to me as being solid, totally capable of doing a great job and all for a great price with no hidden extra charges. The artist navigation area is easy and straightforward to use and I actually felt so comfortable with them as a company that after a few months I opted into one of their marketing and promo packages, which to me... didn't seem cheap at the time. But, I felt so comfortable with them that I invested. And, I'm really glad I did. The money was irrelevant with regards what the package actually delivered - it made it seem more than cost-effective. I was surprised by just how much detail went into it and how personalised it all was. But, on top of that, every single member of the Ditto team - and I dealt with about 4 different departments - were all so friendly, helpful and totally professional. They worked like a well-oiled machine. And, even after the process came to an end I had a quick question about something and one of the guys responded to me immediately and provided advice and help. This was totally above and beyond. I genuinely can't recommend them enough. Cheers Ditto!

Don’t work with these people. I’ve had tons of issues in the past with royalty payments but more recently overcharges. 3 years of Ditto over charging me. I squeezed one refund back but they are refusing to pay the outstanding two charges back. Very unprofessional. Go else where. I’m leaving ASAP.

I've used Ditto for years, the upload process is quick and easy and the release options are flexible and easy to understand. I've just gone back and added additional albums from my back catalog that were not previously released here as I was so pleased with the process and results i've had using Ditto.

Absolutely THE BEST Music Distribution platform for Indie Artists to release content and have TOTAL CONTROL of how they reach their target markets. The system is also very efficient and effective when it comes to Artist receiving direct Royalties. Fantastic DITTO Music definitely recommending this platform to my fellow Music Creatives!

Ditto is easy to use and whenever there are issues they will work with you to get them resolved! They also don't overcharge for additional items on your releases like other distribution companies. Just wish they'd add the ability to input lyrics!
Fantastic service and vibe! Love working with Ditto. Always supportive feedback if i'm unsure about stuff too. 5 stars! *****

My Publishing Co. CATEP from South African started very small. Now since I have joined DITTO we are reaching thousands of people around the world. I only started with one Artist 'Universal Catholic' and  I am very happy with the results. What suprised me even more was the royalty pay outs which are paid without a hassle.

I've had the best experience with Ditto. It's not that things don't go wrong (as with everything in this industry, lol), it's the way that they handle things when they do, that makes me continue with them. A straight-forward and fast service.

review_title: honestly Ditto Is the easiest and best…
review_content: honestly Ditto Is the easiest and best distribution service that I've used so far and the royalties are a Mad bonus! Deffs give them a go!
Ditto has changed my life. Before I started releasing music with Ditto I was a poor, broke, sad man. Now I make cake and women love me. Thanks Ditto.

review_title: I absolutely love your services and…
review_content: I absolutely love your services and everything that you all provide that helps me get my craft and energy delivered to the world! I would never go another way for distribution services because you guys have me locked in for life and even after!!!!!!
Actually , Proud to be part that Ditto Team!! Top Service, top tools, We love Ditto Music, thank u so much Ditto Guys!!

I've released all my material through Ditto Music. They're the best distribution team by far! I wouldn't trust anyone else with my submissions. Any questions or queries  i've had are always promptly dealt with by the amazing team at Ditto! I look forward to releasing more music in 2021 and beyond with Ditto🙏

review_title: I can't upload any tracks and they…
review_content: I can't upload any tracks and they still take my money. I asked them to fix my account but they say that it is not their priority. What is their priority if not paying customers?

review_title: I have been Robbed by Ditto every year...
review_content: I have been charged £19 every year since 2017, and every year I have to chase these fraudsters. I have no releases with them as I took it down since 2017, however they still rob my Paypal every year. I have now taken the matter to Trading Standards. And should that not resolve it, I will issue County Court Claim, I recommend the same route for all Musicians/Artists being scammed, robbed and defrauded by Ditto or any other distributor/company.

review_title: ditto has been helpful for me since i…
review_content: ditto has been helpful for me since i first started uploading music, thank you.

review_title: Ditto Music Supports lot of independent…
review_content: Ditto Music Supports lot of independent artists and I am one of them. I start releasing my music from Feb 2020 and year comes to end. Now I feel that I am part of Ditto Music Family. Ditto Music helped me in this pandemic and resolved my issues. Thank You Ditto Music Thank You So much for making my 2020 memorable ♥️🙏

review_title: Ditto, My Favorite Distribution Service but...
review_content: I really like ditto, honestly the best distribution company I have used. I used Repost Network through Soundcloud, and it's meh, I would not use it. I will say one thing, the only problem I have had with ditto was that when I tried to name a song, I could not upload the song since it had parenthesize in them. The song name was "A Short (Sad) Love Song". I tried to upload that song in an album, but for some reason I couldn't, when I checked why, it just said there is a problem with track 1 and make sure I don't have a title like "future type beat". The only thing I would say that you should change is the naming. I would really like to name the songs that I want them to be. I understand not to use "type beats" in the title, but I would like to use parenthesizes in my music, or even numbers, but sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn't.

I love using DittoMusic to release my independent music. It amazing to have such an affordable platform to distribute online. I am an experimental instrumentalist and found it hard to find the right promoter or agency to help me, so I stuck to doing it myself, with the help of Ditto. Thanks for making it possible.

review_title: Fine until you want your money
review_content: Everything was fantastic until I asked for a withdrawal of some funds (not even my entire balance).  I was hit with a its under review and then within a week, my account was suspended.  This was right after I had just spent $300 on a promotional package for an upcoming album I plan to release.  No access to the account or to be able to use the package.  They ask for "documents" to support your claim but don't specify the documents or where to even get them.

review_title: DITTO is one of the best Music Distributor
review_content: For me DITTO is one of the best music distributor, the pricing of their plans is very affordable, all artist can afford. Their team so approachable in terms of sending them a support. All I can say is DITTO was Artist friendly.

Very good and easy system to release tracks. Fast and solution oriented customer support. I can gladly recommend to anyone who wants to be/stay independent and to keep control all aspect of their releases giving a go with Ditto Music. Edit: Not having a call centre is not good in terms of speed up some supports and these days customer support is not as fast as they should be.
The experience is terrible, spending money but not being able to upload music to Apple, customer service is useless and extremely arrogant
Amazing distributor , flawless and a beautiful interface. All works as it should, don't listen to the negative reviews it's 99% their own fault.

They will steal your royalties and make baseless claims about streaming fraud with no documents from any store to back it up.  Stay away, they are criminals and write their own good reviews on this site.

Absolutely disgusted with this service. Submitted our track over 4 weeks ago - they messed up our entire order. Messed me around from day 1. Unresponsive. When they did reply, they didn't know what they was on about. Changed our release dates without any approval from us. Didn't fulfil pre-order that we paid additional £40. Today was meant to be pre-order day and it's still not live. Spoke to them numerous of times, 100s of emails and messages. The most poorest experience I have ever had. We will be taking legal action due to loss of potential 1000s of sales today. Awful, awful, awful company. Do not release your music here.
Awesome Digital Distribution Service,  For Independent Artist Like Myself, And Others.I Love The Support Team As Well for Their Professional Response In A Timely Manner. Thank You Ditto

Solid company. Have had a couple of hiccups in the past when reuploading my older music, but they were quick to fix and have always been helpful. Would recommend to any artist or label for independent releases.
Being completely honest. Uploading/ distributing music is very easy. Ditto has always been my fav. I would love the addition of the lyrics feature though

review_title: I really love services and all other…
review_content: I really love services and all other things from the Ditto, it is the best distribution programm 🥰❤️
Excellent service. We have released 8 tracks independently as a band with Ditto now and haven't had any problems at all...smooth as!

review_title: Ditto Music are easily the best distribution company…
review_content: easily the best distribution company out there. easy to use with no fuss and they do exactly what you need them to. i recommend Ditto Music to anyone who needs to get there music out there. i been using them for a few years and i have never had any issues with them.

Hello, i like the experience overall, i just wish if there was an option where you can set yourself as the remixer, and pretty sure alot of independent musicians would want too, but hopefully one day it will be added,definitely would recommend ditto to a friend, which i already did and they joined the ditto family, stay safe and stay healthy
Ditto's customer support chatline is super responsive and helpful. Euniz helped me finalise my release before submission so I feel very calm and confident about a smooth rollout to stores.

review_title: Be careful, looks like faked reviews
review_content: I don't know if they paid Ed Sheeran to give them good endorsement or what but this comany is a scam!Ditto stole my royalties after waiting a year to get 3 million streams, they took all the money and said they won't pay my royalties claiming "fraudulent streaming". Completely against indie artists.

Awesome!!I honestly didn't know how to get my music out for people to hear - I thought of demo cd's, YouTube, contacting producers - But then I found Ditto. For a small annual price I was able to begin sharing my music, sharing my outlet, and my passion. With a user friendly interface, uploading tracks can be done within minutes. I would like to thank the Ditto team for making my dream come true, you guys rock. ~Cal R Smith

Ditto smashes the competition with its blistering distribution speed, intuitive interface, comprehensive analytics and swift payment process. Shelter is selling and streaming to every corner of the planet thanks to Ditto!

review_title: I have used Ditto for my distribution for 7 years
review_content: I have used Ditto for my distribution for 7 years and I'm more than happy, they are a fair price, reliable service, fast response to enquiries and easy to use and informative web site "O" and fast payments.

Worst music distribution service, support totally absent, many restrictions, bo possibility to distrubute music with public domain contents (absurd) even if its classical music. Terrible service. NEVER BUY
We Love Ditto! -Overjoy

review_title: Ditto is a great service to use to distribute music. All they need to do is improve slight things with uploads and it would be perfect.
review_content: I generally love the service but need to improve slight bits when uploads tracks.

review_title: Ditto has always been a super helpful…
review_content: Ditto has always been a super helpful and simple company! Would recommend to any up and coming or established artist!

review_title: Poor support, I’ve lost all trust
review_content: Buggy website, poor support, lost trustWhile most of the experience is supposed to be self-serve, their buggy website makes it hard to do anything. You’ll encounter the weirdest errors and obstacles that make releasing music harder than it has ever been. If you encounter any issues, support will take upwards of 2 weeks to reply (if they ever do) and are unhelpful. They’re not committed to helping you or standing by any of their commitments. I would highly recommend that you research other places to publish your music before choosing Ditto.

review_title: Giving artist a voice and not silencing talent and the platform they use to express and relate
review_content: I have been enjoying our Ditto switchover from CDBaby where we released 30+ songs and weren't totally seeing results.  There's some lag in response, but we understand you are busy and someone does usually come along and fix it.  I've just noticed that some things are not making it to platforms unless you find it on the platform missing.  That happened with CDBaby that we had music out for three years and not knowing it was never showing up on Pandora or Tidal etc... things are everchanging, but the one thing we need to fight for is our talents in the world.  WE need to fight for the artists, the youth of the globe, and the right to have a voice today and platform to use it.We have a whole other album that's just about ready to release, but it's going to be under a completely different artist name than Liv V.  I truly hope someone in charge reads this and would contact us in regards to it and possibly collaborate to benefit both.  We have not signed with anyone and have remained indie over the years.  However, for the safety of artists creativity and the unprecedented way we have chose to do things, I hope that we can speak to better the future of music in the name of "true art."
Spent an entire year trying to get paid my $250. I eventually just gave up. Don’t use Ditto.
Ive been using Ditto for the last few years, Ive had no problems! Easy to use upload serviceClear and understandable dashboard professional and quick replying customer service

IMO the best UK distribution label. Very reliable service and it's always really easy to release new music with them. Their pricing is super competitive and they have really affordable packages and helpful guidelines which really help artists move forward and grow.

If you want AMAZING Distro for a yearly low price? This is the site to go to ! I have nothing but good things to say about Ditto, i've gotten all of my royalties, all of my songs have been released to all stores on time. and if i've had an issue they have resolved it no problem!!!
Stay away from this company. After the takedown they steal your music and the music is still online everywhere.
Great service, really user friendly. Very helpful to unsigned artist(s).

Scam Scam Scam...Everything started very well, the problem started when i started asking why is my account balance not available for withdrawal. They responded and said there must be something with my licensing, they will check and revert back to me. After a week i receive an email saying my account is suspended!!!Sent a number of emails to them, no response for a month now.

review_title: The platform has been exceptional, just add writter and producer credits
review_content: The platform has been exceptional compared to other distributors we have used. We took a chance with you and it is working out quite well. Service delivery is great and it resonates well with our brand.Only thing I would suggest is including songwriter and producer credits with the music distributed with DITTO.

Got a claim from them and they suspended my account. I tried to solve it ut they keep ignoring my mails and only send out the same Email Templates over and over. I even got out to Spotify but they don't know what's going on.Claim at hthe Better business bureau has been opened.
I loved the free trial  , I'm excited to continue working with ditto
They never respond to emails and have a lot of hidden fees.
As a long time Ditto user, they always deliver for me. A user friendly interface that makes releasing my new music a piece of cake every time!

Ditto Music helped bring artist in my studio to new levels with a lot of debut releases to bands and solo artists who never thought they could get their music online. Their great prices really makes a difference - for example, artists can take more risks and be more experimental with their music because it won't cost an arm or a leg to get it online so that people can listen to it.. and for that, I truly believe that Ditto is making the Music Industry a better and more free and open place.Me and my recording studio and everyone part of it will keep on supporting Ditto Music. And I will keep on spreading the word to every musician I come in contact with.

Worst service in the world:I uploaded my music to DITTO on the 14th October, I payed with PayPal (luckily with PayPal) an artist subscription and right after that an Error screen came out in the web. My artist suscription was not active but I checked my Paypal account and the payment was made to them. I wrote a ticket explaing my concerns and they took 13 days to answer to my 1st ticket. Tired, I escalated the case to PayPal and PayPal was very fast giving me my refund when I sent them the payment proves. Another 12 days after I had already escalated my problem to PayPal and I had got my refund, DITTO sends me an email asking me for Screenshot of my payment in my website. I basically told them to forgot the problem, that they have such a bad customer service and I had already solved my problem contacting with PayPal. Another 10 days after my answer and a month after my 1st ticket, they write me this:"- Thank you for getting back to us. We appreciate it.- If you have raised this over to Paypal and wish to have a refund through us, you may need to drop the dispute with Paypal so we can have it processed on our end.- Please send us a confirmation once the refund has been dropped so we could proceed with our refund process.- We hope to hear from you soon. Have a great day."This just shows the bad service they have, how slow they are and why I would NOT recommend to use this service.

review_title: You're slow to attend to issues and…
review_content: You're slow to attend to issues and every time I upload a release I encounter a technical issue. You don't have the function that enables us to input credits (Metadata is important), splits and update lyrics. YouTube Content ID is by request, this is something that's basic as a music creator and should be availed automatically.

Sending my music to the stores had a glitch. It wouldn't let me send to stores until I upgraded my plan. I was already on another plan, but it wasn't until I upgraded the option for me to send to stores became available. Thus, I feel like I was squeezed for extra money. I also recommend a customer service number to call in during these moments (this wasn't the first).

review_title: Reliable people who will go out of…
review_content: Reliable people who will go out of their way to help you. I’ve released heaps of music with these people and they pay out good royalties every three months. I have never seen any other distribution company that offered PR and social media boost packages!!
Excellent way to release music independently and are always helpful and quick to make any changes you need, wouldn’t release any other way

Awesome. Review and approval of songs are much faster than it was last year. :)Page loads everything and uploads songs a lot faster than last year.Cost is cheaper than competitors. It's also a great year for us since we switched to DITTO. We've been getting a lot of online streaming plays like there was DITTO charm. :)

review_title: Fraudsters. Same old story as everyone else
review_content: Same old story as everyone else. They sign you up then continue to take your money without your permission even though you cancel your account. I've contacted trading standards in the UK.All the positive reviews on here about Ditto are written by their own employees.AVOID

review_title: They don’t even deserve 1⭐️ I loaded my…
review_content: They don’t even deserve 1⭐️ I loaded my music in 10/2019 it’s now 11/20 no check and when I inquired about my money they suspended my account. I tried to email them and they said I no longer have an acct with them-this is there way of robbing independent musicians. Beware of ditto stay away( over 3 million streams in s year and they kept my money and my music is still up so they are the biggest crooks in the game

review_title: A contact number that no longer works…
review_content: A contact number that no longer works and a support email that never replies. If you ever have any questions or queries, Ditto isn’t going to work for you.
Ditto is amazing, great service awesome team.
I enjoy releasing music through Ditto. I must say however I would prefer that some of the costs AFTER you upload were upfront...but I get it.

review_title: Love this website it helps me get my…
review_content: Love this website it helps me get my music out with no issue... 100% satified

Dittos experience over the years has been a pleasure, my only gripe is the support isn't reliable enough. When it's going good it's great but if something goes wrong it takes them too long to reply/rectify the situation

review_title: What I appreciate and like most about…
review_content: What I appreciate and like most about Ditto are is the song upload, information and registration process, It's simple an none time consuming.
I have always wanted a distributor that can handle promotions and PR. I am so happy, ditto gave me all. thanks
Just the worst. Poor and even angry customer service, antiquated payment system, little real pull for any placement. ANY other service I've used (CDbaby, Tunecore, OneRpm) is infinitely better.

review_title: All those good reviews are fake
review_content: All those good reviews are fake. Ditto used to be good but they have become a scam company. They steal your royalties and close your account. Beware of ditto music. SCAM SCAM SCAM

review_title: ditto is the best distribution platform…
review_content: ditto is the best distribution platform I'm totally happy

Ditto is truly amazing ! , they have helped me release to stores my music which I'm super happy to of done ! the have helped me with every issue i have had in record time :) I love it ! they are helping me become a musical artist, full time , one song at a time :)

Ditto has unresponsive costumer support, one of the worst track records at solving issues I have ever experienced (I have an issue with a release since 2018, all tickets I have put on support have been archived without the problem being solved), inflexible guidelines that do not respect the artistic integrity of the music and they do not even have a clear, transparent and easy way to pay owed royalties. In case you are thinking of using the service be warned that you will need to make an account on a third party service to (maybe!) receive royalties. They have also double-charged me for a subscription renewal.If you're an independent, experimental artist, I urge you even more to not use them since they will refuse to put your record out if the audio has static, silences, tracks with abrupt ends and other things like that. They will also make demands re. artwork, such as what text can be displayed.The service is so terrible, and so frustrating, that even though I am usually too lazy to follow through with drastic measures, I have requested a take down of every single release I had with them (that's 18 releases by 3 different artists) and I am in the process of trying to figure out how to completely delete my account.In short, just find some other service, this is simply not worth it, especially with their exorbitant subscription fees.

review_title: Ditto may be one of the worst companies…
review_content: Ditto may be one of the worst companies I have ever dealt with. I requested a withdrawal and the money says it has been sent but I never received it, after months of back and forward emailing they came to tell me that it is Payoneer's fault and I have to get in contact with them. Not once did I make or get asked to make a Payoneer account. I had to verify my identity on the ditto website and that was it. So basically ditto has sent my hard-earned money to Payoneer and not given them my PayPal email to be able to forward my funds. This has put me in a situation where I need to pay for cover art and promotion for my artist but cannot due to ditto being dishonest with me. I have sent several emails now and just get ignored....

review_title: Ditto music is not paying royalties !!
review_content: Ditto music is not paying royalties !!Hello, I was using Dittomusic for about 3 months and suddenly my account got locked. I contacted support what happened and i was told account was blocked due to fraudlent streaming activity from Deezer. I didnt do any fraudlent activity or use such service so i assumed i am victim this behaviour which i explained to a support that i dont need royalties from Deezer as my main income comes from spotify but support ignored my requests. Even it was everything ok in other stores support refuse to pay out already earned royalties so they keep it in their wallets. For questioning how can i avoid being victim of this no response, nothing. There is literally nothing i can do about it and support member does not provide any solution for this (I guess they enjoy my royalties so why would they even solve my issue).Stay away from this service, they collect royalties and keep it for themself !!

Cheap distribution, easy transactions and great customer support. Only 'complaint' is the song metadata, I wish Ditto had the opportunity to add featured artists to the title and edit credits such as songwriters, producers etc.

Ditto has been a very reliable distributor, always released my projects on time and without issues. Fast customer service with any edit release requests. The only fault in my books is that the don't have an option to add producer or instrumentalist credits for releases.
I really appreciate DITTO, continue to empower the artist and our independence. incredible service kudos -BriesontheBeat/Up There Music Group

I have been releasing music via Ditto since 2015. It's so easy to get your music out in the world. I'm an artist and producer myself ana have several bands that I manage from my own indie label. With Ditto I can release as many singles, EPs an albums I want every year. Perfect!

I've never had a bad moment with Ditto. They are resourceful, they make the process of sending music to stores very, very easy and have pristine clean visuals to assess your analytics and stats!I recommend ditto to independent musicians always.

review_title: A Welcoming Experience for Any New Artists
review_content: Ditto music has not only been an inexpensive and convenient way for me to release my music, but it has taken the time to really make sure that my individual needs as an artist are met with every single release. I don't feel like I'm dealing with a company every time I set a new release. I feel like I'm dealing with real people - and good ones at that! There have been times when responses have been slow or releases get backed up, but as soon as I can get ahold of someone, they understand and fix my problem within a day!

review_title: The Best UK Music Digital Distributor…
review_content: The Best UK Music Digital Distributor in my opinion.Perfect for DJs and Dance Music releases as they also distribute to Beatport. The Quality of uploads allowed (24bit) is better than some other DDs and they provide marketing tools and stay ahead of the game.Very helpful team, highly recommended and helpful with getting traction on so many of my releases especially in this difficult time.With thanks personally to Lee Parsons, his brother and the Ditto TeamRemember... 'Music for Music's sake! 'CheersDJ Jon

review_title: Ditto has allowed me to be heard wherever!
review_content: Ditto has been very helpful with allowing me release music to a large variety of musical platforms that I would have otherwise not been able to have achieved.Instead of only selling albums at shows I've played with the help of Ditto  people all over the globe can now access and listen to the music I produce.And.. If there's an issue or I have a question they are always happy to assist.

review_title: great company but slow on paying artist(due to stores not ditto them selves)
review_content: great company! has the right tools to help independent artist reach their goals in a professional manner, there promotion tools are great at building a solid fan base for your music! just like any other distribution company you have to wait for stores to deliver the data to them.only thing i can say needs improvement is the payout process. been almost 90 days for me & still no royalties or anything which is a disappointment but hopefully soon

review_title: Why three stars?!  Issues Ditto does not resolve or address.
review_content: Why three stars?  I took a star off because I agreed to an Unlimited Plan.  I have been repeatedly throttled for releasing too much music.  Unlimited has a specific meaning.  When I was accused of violating the Fair Use Agreement, Ditto refused to supply me with a copy of this Agreement.Ditto lost another star for a debacle over artwork.  I had releases halted for using copyrighted material.  I was using public domain works that I further modified.  Ditto never resolved how It continued to make an incorrect determination on the albums involved.This is my second year with Ditto and neither of the above issues have been addressed or resolved.  Tw o months ago I seriously considered moving my label and works to another distributor.  I am still on the fence and if things are not addressed by August I will not resub.
Proud to release my music through Ditto -  the epitome of artistic autonomy.
I love using ditto music the home of the greats. It’s a very simple but effective service that is needed for artist growth. I’m very happy with this service and my experience.

review_title: These THIEVES have over £10k of our money they won't release!
review_content: We have over £10,000 in our account, which we requested 16 weeks ago! Followed up over and over and were ignored. Finally someone replied they would check into it. Weeks later no reply. Several follow ups and they froze the account! They still haven't paid!  We even had our lawyer reach out twice directly to their lawyer, and they ignored it. ABSOLUTE CROOKS!!! Also their reports are hard to read and customer service is terrible. Tunecore and Distrokid are such better options.
Account suspended for no reason. Proof of streams and source of them provided. No response from Ditto. They are holding peoples music & taking their Royalties to try & keep the company alive.

my account has been permanently deleted.  explanation - I can not log in using my login.  it was obviously impossible to restore.  I did not violate anyone's rights, and the Music is genuine and the subscription plan was paid

review_title: Great Distributor for Electronic, Experimental Music
review_content: I've been releasing experimental jazz and electronic music with Ditto Music for over a decade now under the name Revolution Void. Over the years, Ditto has continued to improve and streamline their service without sacrificing any of the great features I fell in love with in the first place.

review_title: Ditto is a great all-in-one music company
review_content: Ditto is a great all-in-one music company (distribution & promotion) for independent and unsigned artists, they make post-production processes fast and easy for unsigned artists like me. I signed up for the free trial and so far the experience has been great! I have received a smart link (for promotion) to all stream platform - a week before release.
Ditto are amazing, easy and simple way of getting your music on streaming platforms. I have tried a few DSP distributors but none are as responsive or as easy to use as ditto.

review_title: Ditto have been brilliant for me if im…
review_content: Ditto have been brilliant for me if im honest, always working hard and attending to my needs if any problems arise with quick response, I wouldn't use any other distribution company. Thank you for your continuous efforts to make each releases as smooth as possible. #Thankyou #Spotify #Number1

review_title: The best music distributors and to alot of platforms I recommend everyone who wants to sell and promote their music to visit Dittomusic.com
review_content: The best music distributors

review_title: Ditto has been good and bad
review_content: Ditto has been good and bad. The good thing was that they provided a quick and efficient service with being able to release music on demand. The only downside is when you have a issue or enquiry their was no 24 hour customer service to help with in the moment problems which was stressful.

review_title: the services from ditto are good but…
review_content: the services from ditto are good but they can be great, i know ditto is trying to maximize their profits but why wait 14days atleast for a release to go live? it should be atleast 7 days to go live also ditto advertises what they don't give, they advertise that they provide content ID or protection on youtube thats what made me join ditto but its been more then 8months me and ditto support have been going back and forth with my first release just to be on content id. they should have stated that they give content ID to prominent names in the music industry, i had to find an alternative distributor which provide content ID. what i like is only they give 100% of profits. One this I forgot which is the most important here is royalty splits, we work with artists who has to get their fair share of royalties so it becomes a problem with ditto cause you don’t know how much a release made. This becomes has for us to split royalties
I'm Speechless! In short words , THANK YOU DITTO.!!!!!

They block your account claiming you have used Artificial streaming. They demand you to prove your streams (how am I supposed to do it?). If you try to contact them you can wait for weeks before they reply (if you get lucky). In the threating email from them you also see: ”If we haven't received any supporting documents within 7 days, we'll have no choice but to permanently close the account”. Seriously what the F? Don’t make a mistake of signing up to ditto scam.

Dittos support team has gone above and beyond every time, even in instances where it was the other platform with the issues. what I like most is being able to keep track of my issue as it gets resolved, which is usually quick and I get an email receipt so I know when my issue is in the right hands.

review_title: The platform is easy to use - but poor support
review_content: The platform is easy to use, but when you have a problem the support is pretty poor. You can raise support tickets but as I found out today they are not logged on their system and are not resolved.

review_title: Ditto is perfect for me have been to…
review_content: Ditto is perfect for me have been to other places, but not like ditto!Love working with ditto and I recommend people looking for distribution this is the place.

review_title: If I could give zero stars I would
review_content: If I could give zero stars I would. Absolutely horrific service. Support don't get back to you for weeks if at all. Account suspension seems prolific with no clear reasoning behind it. Ditto Music don't care about artists at all.

I read the reviews carefully and still went ahead because i believed people complaining were actually the once who used fake streams as we have succeeded in withdrawing one payment from a past promo of a single, we playlisted our song on our new album which was a big project and got our account suspended for abnormal streams even after providing evidence of streams we didn't even get a response back till now, they even went ahead to report to Spotify and had our songs taken down without actually providing evidence or responding to our email with evidence of stream, now the songs are still in the other stores gaining streams and yet we can access it, this is absolutely not the way to do business because the same customer care where quick to respond before we uploaded our album and now they can no longer do so, this may truly be a way of scamming artist? at least remove the songs from all the stores you distributed to so the artist can redistribute with other stores easily as you guys are not the only distributors so it looks more like an excuse to extort as their actions are clearly not professional as they also complained about us uploaded more songs than we paid for which was clearly not the case either, silly excuses if you ask me, daylight robbery!

review_title: Now 1 year releasing my VEVO video &…
review_content: Now 1 year releasing my VEVO video & music single with Ditto. Very very good customer service, worth paying a bit more than other online distribution services.

I have had my account closed, when I ask why they ignore me.  just left the music on stores and wont let me login to their website.  so now I can't release it with someone else, its been 2 months and still they have not removed it after asking repeatedly, absolutely terrible there are a lot better aggregators available, regret ever choosing Ditto.

review_title: Ditto Music makes independent artiste's life easier and fun.
review_content: In times like these when an Independent artiste has to hustle an extra mile to publish their music, build and interact with their fans, think about collecting the royalty they are owed, marketing their music and basically staying afloat in the music industry, Ditto Music is a blessing in disguise surely as it makes the hustle much easier and provides so many genuine guidelines for uninformed artistes to understand the music industry and make the most of it. With these absolute ingenious product and services, Ditto Music surely gives the Independent artistes an edge and a lots of optimism. Cheers. :D

review_title: Where would I be without Ditto...
review_content: Where would I be without Ditto...? Probably still running around chasing after various Platforms like a headless chicken! If you want your music heard across the globe with a professional approach then you need to sign up with this distributor. Most importantly, customer care and attention have been consistently attentive and very Human. Thanks to Daisy and the team 🙏

review_title: Been with Ditto music from the start of…
review_content: Been with Ditto music from the start of my career and they've helped so much from my first release in 2016 to now with songs with 10's of thousands of streams.Whenever ever issues arise the support ream are amazing at helpingDefinitely recommend for artists coming up
Hey ! I'm an artist and have been with Ditto for over a year now and release music quite frequently. They are quick to distribute and to answer any questions you may have regarding your music!

I love your platform. But it could do with some improving. Metadata is very important so that we credit the people behind our music and it really sucks that you don't allow us to edit metadata. Also you should add an option for lyrics synchronisation. Lastly, you should add more genres.. I'm from South Africa and the the two most dominating genres in SA are not part of your platform, which are "Gqom" and "Amapiano"

My experience has been awesome, I got the dates I wanted to drop music on and I've been releases a bunch. I have another project coming soon & I am confident that Ditto will have it on platforms in no time.
i love ditto music its easy and gives user accurate analyticsonce ditto always dittothank you for your customer service

Our band has had a really positive experience with Ditto so far! Their support staff is extremely responsive on the website, e-mail AND social media, and quickly changed the name of another artist featured on our song when we requested it. They also made it a point to inform us that the issue was resolved and were extremely responsible and professional with following up on our ticket.

The support team really does its job. I am very happy to be working with Ditto Music. I've had no problems until today. I don't think I'll have a problem after that. Endless respect and love for the entire Ditto Music team

So far as a music promoter in Uganda, Ditto Music has been my best distribution store ever.All my songs have been distributed to a number of other music stores and this helps my artists reach out to great audiences with fans.Otherwise thank you Ditto Music I'd recommend the rest of the artists to use Ditto and even download the app for it the best I have ever seen.#ivanjaymusicpromoter

review_title: For me the WORST Music distributor & Artist support ever.
review_content: few months Ditto was just amazing, regardless they careless on my singles releases on time and the need of daily check if my single was released or not, to send them an email as a reminder if they just didn't.This time they careless about my work becomes so far. They mark my singles as "sent to stores" and I did receive the "smart link" however, after several days I didn't see my single in to my "upcoming releases" in Spotify.I did worry about that, and decide to contact Ditto support send them screenshots and so on to prove and help with this matter. However after more than 1 week ignoring my request and not receive nothing back, I decide to contact Spotify. After provide my UPC numbers to Spotify, they ensure me, they didn't receive any release under those numbers. What? how is possible?I decide again to forwards that email to Ditto and wait for any explanation, however the days passed and I still not have an answer. Ridiculous, for me Worst music distributor ever I work with.I supposed the next single will be released next friday, however thanks to this "amazing" and "efficient" ditto music team, in the case they decide to sent it today, unfortunately, I will be not be elegible for Release radar, neither for a pitch. I must say i did send this single to be released on September 19th, 2020. so there should be enough time.My personal Conclusion: If you care none for your music, then maybe Ditto is for you, as they will show same appreciation for your music as they do to me. however if you care a bit or more, then chose some other distributor.You can see other reviews. and convince yourself.

Ditto music is so good and perfect for me. Recently I released a track and that was the best. After that, I applied for YT OAC and that's on the way now. I think ditto is a little bit slow but it could get faster. Thank You!

review_title: talking about the site' the future of Ditto music

review_title: Been with you guys going on 3 years now…

review_title: Ditto Turns Complex Distribution into Simple Genius
review_content: Ditto is a simple interface that can do everything you need for a digital release.  They are cost effective and efficient in getting your songs uploaded to Digital Service Platforms. They can quickly verify you as an artists and offer extra packages and opportunities for releases.  Their reputation as a top digital aggregator is more than fair, and if you are having trouble deciding on a service then save yourself the hassle and choose Ditto!

review_title: This is my first time releasing music…
review_content: This is my first time releasing music and Ditto have made feel so easy! The customer service is attentive and very prompt in answering all my queries. My first track was approved and sent to stores much quicker than expected - in fact it was so quick, I missed the notification that it had gotten approved! Thanks Ditto for making this transition from DJ-ing to releasing music feel so seamless.

Ditto doesn't only help me upload my music to DSPs with no stress, it also provides me with several features that ensure my track becomes a success. The lessons from its blog about the music industry have been very rich and enlightening too. If you are an artist (or you are managing an artist) Ditto is highly recommended.

review_title: Really good service and fast responses…
review_content: Really good service and fast responses when needed. Would recommend 110%
Like stars in the cloud.. it will be very difficult to be spotted but thanks to ditto music distribution services. I can can shine as bright as visible among million of Stars.

review_title: The ditto music is my favourite one…
review_content: The ditto music is my favourite one means his service is very good and instant service at a time.I'll prefer to all use Ditto music and get your music in next level.I am also a producer and I've usedGo with Ditto music.
I trust ditto music with my music, streaming, downloads, royalties and distribution ect. I highly recommend ditto music to every artist out there. I'm now in control of my music and in safe hands.
Good help and service, fast response to messages and an easy way to get your music to the world

I call you when I need you, my heart's on fire. You come to me, come to me wild and wired. Oh, you come to me, give me everything I need. You're simply the best, better than all the restBetter than anyone, anyone I ever met.-Tina Turner... and I agree ❤️

review_title: The Best place for Artists and Labels…
review_content: The Best place for Artists and Labels to start their career! Thank you for everything

review_title: Love using ditto as my music outlet
review_content: Love using ditto as my music outlet. Always here to help in the best way they possibly can, any problems I have had were fixed soon as possible with no issues. With a cheap yearly subscription
awesome!  free trial

review_title: Satisfied from release to payouts so far.
review_content: Been satisfied with their service lately!

I have been using them for the last 6 months, their customer care is painfully slow and the slowness kills the goal. But there is a small chance, it could be only me and also the pandemic. The whole rhythm with them is uninspiring and slow. I have had hiccups with them, I use their USD 19 yearly subscription. It's not a lot but every little penny counts when most of us indie musicians are not earning much.

review_title: Things that could get even better
review_content: Hi,Since the beginning I had good experiences with Ditto. Overall I have nothing to complain about.There are some points that I believe could help a lot if Ditto implemented:1. I would like to be able to indicate the artist profile link at the time of distribution. Because very often the release is linked to the wrong artist profiles.2. Sometimes 8 artists want to make music toghether, but Ditto does not allow me to put this 8 artists as main artist. It is something tha could be implemented too because I don't think in music we should have this kind of limitation. In addition, these unions help a lot to get more reproductions, consequently more royalties and more visibility and should be encouraged and not limited.At the most I am very satisfied with Ditto and I always recommend, alerting my friends of these limitations.Thanks for the space to comment on improvements.

review_title: DO NOT USE THIS SERVICE! (THEY WILL SCAM YOU EVENTUALLY)
review_content: This is a warning to anyone thinking of using Ditto Music. I've been a successful independent artist for the last 10 years. Unfortunately I made the mistake of using Ditto to distribute my own releases over the last 16 months. To cut it short, their customer support is appalling to non-existent, they frequently messed up simple release info and dates, will upload your music to the wrong streaming accounts, and when contacted about issues it takes weeks to resolve simple things.Worst of all they will eventually lock you out of your account without warning, claiming you've been involved with 'artificial' or 'illegal' streaming so you can't access your royalties. Meanwhile your music will stay online and they won't take it down whilst ignoring your emails. This is happening to numerous artists using their service, and something they will eventually do to you. (They currently owe me over $1,000 in royalties)Please save yourself the headache and use a better service. Ditto is cheap, and you get what you pay for. Do yourself a favour and pay the extra money to use another distributor to avoid these issues. Ditto Music is an absolute scam company which doesn't care about their own image, or scamming independent artists out of their money.

WORST COMPANY FOR MUSIC DISTRIBUTION THERE IS. They are unethical and will rob you off your royalties you have earned and after ripping you off they blame it on Spotify then lock you out of your account. When you go to dispute it they say you have 7 days. Well guess what? They didn’t even get back to me within 7 days let alone at all. So my account has been disbanded and I lost all my hard earned royalties. It’s a good thing I went in and got the info for all my releases such as the ISRC Codes this way II can re release them and get my royalties for them. I HIGHLY suggest going with TubeCore. It’s more money but you won’t get scammed and will actually get to keep your royalties. DITTO IS A SCAM!!!!!!
LOVE pure love I love there service team way better than any other distributors I tried any questions that I had were answered and just a very straight forward experience GREAT 5 stars

review_title: They have made a chat service available…
review_content: They have made a chat service available where they always reply in a few minutes - it is great!

Looks good and the website is user-friendly but beware...  I set up an account, 4 months later (when the first royalties come in) I tried to obtain the money.  Ditto suspended my account so I could not log in.  Eventually got a response using their support email address saying they suspected fraud and would investigate.  No further response or replies from them.  I couldn't even get them to withdraw my music, so they remained accruing more royalties.  I suspect fraud.  Not sure if it is an individual or the whole company.  Definitely unprofessional.  I got legal advice which stated that I could sue them but the costs involved would probably be more than the money retrieved.These companies operate in an unregulated market.  It's allowed some of them to behave like this.  Thankfully, I have found that other companies do not operate like Ditto.
DITTO are the bestDITTO are efficient and effective and always keen to help with any of our releases. We have worked with them for many years and they are consistently great at what they do.

I got with Ditto Music since I always wanted international outreach. They have headquarters in the UK, Australia, plus Tennessee. So, it made sense to distribute with them. Their staff is down to Earth and they care about the artists! There's access to blogs, festival, record labels, and it's a company that uses social media.  I enjoy the platform as a whole.

review_title: Great service and always helpful and…
review_content: Great service and always helpful and good response times on queries. We've only had one problem with our music going to the wrong Artist on streaming sites but other than that no issues. Would be good to be able to add credits to release data in future though!

I released some music early in 2020 with Ditto music that ended up being featured on an editorial playlist. A huge deal for any musician. Over time I watched as my streams clocked over 100K, 200K, 300K, 400K and up and up. With is, my royalty earnings rose higher and higher. After a few months, back in early August, I saw that figure was sitting at around $3,000. That’s cool right! I’ve been featured on a playlist, people are listing to my music and I’m making a nice little side hustle wage. So I thought, it’s time to cash out. I had followed everything that Ditto asked to the T. Confirmed my identity, bank details and all of that. But while my balance said $3,000 my available balance was $0. I out this down to a technical error and created a support ticket.The reply I received when I asked why I couldn’t cash out was a rude and short message that alluded to me having to wait for them to verify my account and details. Which had already been done months ago. After about 5 days of no reply, I tried to log in to my account and it said ‘incorrect details’. Reset my password and thought my account had been hacked. Nope, it turns out Ditto had decided to lock my account while they ‘verified’ my streams. But I was lucky. I could without a doubt show exactly where 99.99% of my streams came from, the editorial playlist inclusion. I sent over my undeniable proof that matched the data in the Ditto account and showed where all the streams were coming from. One track, off one EP from one playlist on one streaming service. You cannot argue with it. It was as clear as day. The proof I showed matched up exactly.So they shut my account down and banned me for absolutely no reason despite me being able to prove exactly where my streams had come from.But what does this mean? It means that Ditto music have taken full control over my music and IP with the full and knowing intention of taking all my current royalties and to continue to collect on them. I now have no access or control over my music. They will not take the releases down. They will not pay me my royalties. They have straight up stolen my music and my rights to it.My company IP lawyer and my own solicitor both informed me that Ditto can shut my account down at any time. But they cannot in any form take any part of my IP and or its earnings.So I am now in the process of working with Spotify, Apple Music and other distributors to place an IP claim on my OWN music to have it taken down from those services and stores and regain control of my IP.But that isn’t even the most sickening part of it all. Not only did they do all the above, Ditto music are actively fighting my claims. Yes. Fighting me, the rights owner, to keep hold of my IP. This is beyond insanity.As of writing this, I have been successful in getting my music removed from Spotify and some other distributors. Spotify are actually aware of what Ditto is doing, so if you are in my shoes, contact Spotify directly and they will help you. So will Apple Music. But I am still battling to get my music completely removed from Ditto’s control.What Ditto have done to me is completely destroy all and any momentum I had and was gaining by simply seeing I was making money and stealing it. To them it was a quick cash grab. To me and everyone else they have done this to it was a potentially career destroying action.There are thousands of other artists going through this same nightmare right now that leads me to believe that Ditto Music is going broke. There is no company that would expect to survive another 6-12 months that would dream of doing anything near this illegal and down right disgusting.I am extremely fortunate that this was a side project for me and that I was not hoping to create a career from my music. But for many people who use Ditto music and are going through this, it is absolutely devastating.It is clear that Ditto’s respect for its customers is so low that they not only are happy to steal from them in the worst possible way, but are also happy to do it believing that many of them do not know how and or cannot afford to fight them legally on the matter.If you have been affected by the same thing here, keep an eye out on the internet.I have a feeling a UK based class action against Ditto Music and the twin brother CEO-Founders will not be very far off. And when it does get started, be sure to join it. I know I will be. It won’t cost you anything and when it is won, you will get the money they owe you, the control of your music back and more.I’ll end this saying that if you’re considering any music distribution service, I goes without saying that Ditto is not the one.

review_title: Always had great service from Ditto
review_content: Always had great service from Ditto, speedy support when I've had issues and all round good experiences.

I have been extremely disappointed by the service Ditto have provided over the past two years since I have been using them as my distributor. Although I have uploaded music months in advance of the release date, I have had two occasions where 1) The music was released after the release date and 2) The music said it was sent to stores when it had not been. With regards to their customer service, the 'support log ticket' system does not work. I am constantly sent to 'the page you are looking for does not exist' and although when I do occasionally manage to log a support ticket I have waited more than 72 hours for replies. I have received generic emails from service member teams who clearly have not read my problem properly. This is not always the case... but it is a gamble who ends up responding to your support ticket. I can only assume that customer service members are told to 'hit targets' which is why my problems are not read correctly and are answered with generic replies. I can also only assume that the music is checked according to release date rather than upload date. This means that  artists who upload their music months in advance so as to have the best chance at having their music heard for playlists end up being hurt the most as platforms such as Spotify do not receive the music in time despite the length it has been sitting with Ditto waiting to be sent to stores. What else can I say? They were pretty good 2 years ago when I started releasing with them, but have only gone downhill and are now between a rock and a hard place. I cannot see myself releasing with them again in the future. I just hope that my most recent release, which I've paid more money for just in the sheer hope it actually gets to the platforms on time, does actually make it there. That's all I can assume - the more money you throw at them, the more likely chance you have at seeing your music released on time.

review_title: Hit badly by COVID or a scam?
review_content: TL;DR: Terrible customer service and there seems to be issues with the site at the moment, but it could be more than that... I've lost money and time to this and got nothing in return but stress.Full review:I released an album as part of a band without too much trouble under a different account and found the service to be pretty straight forward to use. However, I have recently tried to release music on another artist page, paid for the artist account and scheduled my first release. I then tried to release two more singles, however, neither let me select the "unlimited" plan I've paid for.It gets worse.I sent a ticket 5 days ago and haven't had a response despite adding updates with each other issue I've encountered (yes there's more). So remember the first single? I received an email 2 days ago stating that the first track I uploaded for release has an issue, so can't be sent off. It said this issue was due to the artwork not being up to spec/being corrupted and as I created the artwork TO the Ditto specs, I just re-uploaded. When trying to "repair" the release though, I get stuck on the same page as my other unreleased tracks: Select Your Plan. I cannot select the plan I have paid for on ANY of my tracks, meaning I can't release any of my music. I wonder if this part of the site is just down in some way and there aren't the staff to fix it due to the virus, or if I've just been scammed. I hope I get my money back, but looking at their lack of customer service, I doubt I'll get it...

I am experiencing what most complaints I’m seeing now are facing.  I haven’t been able to withdraw my royalities since May so I raised a ticket.  In the past this was no issue when it occurred and it was cleared within a few days.  I received an email that they were backed up, but would get to my issue as soon as they could.  Next thing I know I’m locked out of my account with no access to my releases or royalties.  I emailed about this problem and have yet to hear back.  According to other reviews I will be waiting for a response that will accuse me of streaming fraud so they can justify their criminal behavior.  I believe they are stealing from clients.  If you have this same issue,  I encourage you to file a complaint with the UK government so they can investigate Ditto Music because this company is a complete fraud.  Just use Tunecore, they would never do something like this.I’m not allowed to leave a link in this review, but just google “UK Complain about a limited company”And you should see the government link, should be the first to pop up.  Good luck and don’t give up on your dreams.UPDATE:  Ditto did respond and accuse me of ‘artificial streaming’.  When I asked for them to provide the claim they mentioned they received from a store they made an excuse that support has no access to claims.  It was all very vague and clearly a lie.  I entertained their accusation and provided proof of streaming activity (non of it extraordinary or abnormal), they responded and said thank you for providing the information.  Here we are months later and I am still locked out of the account with no access to my releases or royalties.  They are 100 percent stealing people’s masters and royalties.  Do not use this company.  I see the future for Ditto and I will not be surprised when I see indictments and jail time for this company.  The only fraudulent activity is coming from Ditto themselves, DO NOT USE THIS DISTRIBUTOR!

We'd paid for 15 artists' unlimited distribution only in March, and already we are moving our services elsewhere because of how much of a nightmare this company has been.I'm not sure we're being given an accurate representation of our streaming stats or the money we have accrued throughout our time with them, but at this point I really do not care. I just want to get away from this awful company. Would never go near them ever again. I highly suggest any company stay away from Ditto. Literally go ANYWHERE else.

After careful consideration of choosing the 'right' distribution for my releases, I went against what all reviews and 'collaboration' parties people advised.Everything went 'okay' until I actually released my debut track. + Wrong Profile. + No advance in links to create artist pages for Spotify or Apple Music which didn't allow me to request for playlist. + Customer service is useless+ No faith + Don't listen to your request to fix problems+ Scripted messages+ English barrier from agents+ Feel lost with no where to turn regarding complaints+ Removed songs from profile (randomly) + No concern for unsigned artists or how valueable distribution is to us as artists + Totally messed up second releases resulting in no plays+ No apology to the mistakes they have caused+ Linked to an email address which I had already done (if they'd checked their notes) I'm utterly shocked and appauled at how the agents have very little (if not any) customer service empathy to me as a paying artist. I'm in customer service aswell so from my end I have been understanding, calm, worded responses in a polite manner until my last communication with them as I'm so frustrated it's a madness. This is on a Wednesday at 06:30 am. Please really research who you use as a distributor from now on.
