Hello,I was recently looking for a distributor to supply my first ep entering the music industry. I chose Ditto because they had advertised to have worked with the likes of Ed Sheeran, Stormzy, and Sam Smith, so I considered them reputable.I purchased RLIAB package for $750-$800, all was good, when my ep was mastered I sent it to for distribution. I paid $499 for the pr campaign, cause it seemed enticing at first. It promised to provide 3 artworks/3video promo's, a pr guide list calendar, a social media post calendar guide catered specifically for your brand, and 2 blog post made about you. What I received was the pr guide list calendar (template) , and the social media calendar which was also a template and on it they didnt bother changing the previous customer artists name, in stead of "Nemo" ( me ) , they used Swerve. Anyway I ignored that, and as it came 3days till release I didnt have much time I started emailing them asking whats going on and got no reply so 48hrs before my release I decided to pull the plug and ask for a refund because they didnt deliver what they promised. They forwarded my paypal account a refund and said I should receive it in 2-3days (which is tomorrow) .WAIT, IT GETS WORSE! SO AFTER WASTING MY TIME I STARTED TO INVEST BIG MONEY INTO MY OWN ADVERTISING CAMPAIGN PRE RELEASE HOPING I CAN GET A BOOST WITHIN THE NEXT 48HRS. AND WHEN THE RELEASE CAME, THE WORST NEWS HAPPENED. KEEP IN MIND THIS IS MY FIRST EVER EP... DITTO ATTACHED MY TRACK TO ANOTHER ARTIST NAMED NEMO, TO ALLLLLL MUSIC PROVIDERS. WHAT A COMPLETE MESS UP.  SO NOW IM COMPLETELY SCREWED BECAUSE 1. I ADVERTISED A TON OF MONEY AND 2. THE RELEASE ISNT EVEN ON ATTACHED ON MY NAME. PLUS THEY DIDNT RELEASE IT ON BEATPORT LIKE IT WAS ADVERTISED ON THEIR WEBSITE.... I DONT KNOW WHAT TO DO I HAVE EMAILED THE SUPPORT TEAM AND ARE WAITING FOR THEIR REPLY. IF THEY DONT FIX IT ASAP ILL HAVE TO TALK TO MY LAWYER.. BECAREFUL GUYS THESE GUYS ARE RECKLESS.

Ditto Music is the cheapest distribution service for a reason, you get what you pay for. Lack of customer support often leads to numerous delays of the original release date. The analytics are extremely basic with very little information. I would not recommend Ditto Music to anyone, SAVE YOUR MONEY!

Anthony Martin - CEO of Royalty Collection IncDear Community, usually  don´t write any reviews at all.But i really have to warn you all to stay away from ditto.This company is just a big scam.I heard couple of bad rumours before but i usually try to make my own experience.To make a long story short when its coming to payment ditto will be a master in excuses and will hold or block your payment.Im sure at smaller artists they will be successful and for me it seems to be part of their business.They try to cheat their small artists. In the moment you send your lawyer suddenly all is fine and there are no problems anymore.So i consider this as not honest and its cheating in my opinion.You can check my reputation and will surely understand that i have reason to speak bad about Ditto. The only reason i did it its because they are scammers.

Really unsatisfied.Their customer support takes around 5 days (not like 24 hours they say on their website).My releases were constantly canceled without them telling me why. My last release (which consisted of stuff like rain sounds) was approved, scheduled and accepted by them, but they didn't release it. When I asked why, they replied with "we don't publish ASMR" which is complete BS as my last release was "ASMR" too and was accepted successfully. As a cherry on the top, my account was banned and my releases removed without a single notification or anything before deleting. Conclusion:Poor & slow customer serviceUnprofessional & rude towards artistsLimited options for releasingRelease dates are constantly pushed back without an explanation.

review_title: I uploaded my first single with ditto…
review_content: I uploaded my first single with ditto music, and they distributed my music everywhere WITH A TYPO ON MY NAME!! Also my music was jumbled up with lots of other artists, not only a waste of time AND money using them, but now I'm having to waste time and money trying to resolve all of the issues they have caused. I have contacted them, and heard NOTHING back. They have done nothing helpful for me along any of my journey so far, and have only been a hindrance. Note to anyone reading: USE A DIFFERENT DISTRIBUTOR!

review_title: Two months, no release of earned royalties!
review_content: At this point, we’ve been waiting almost two months for the release of £8000 from ditto. I’ve received a handful of emails saying almost the exact same thing, “we’re forwarding this to the royalties team, they’ll reply withing 5-7 days”. And “this is for your protection”.This company is single handedly crippling our lives because of negligence and poor customer support in the middle of a global pandemic!! To add insult, the tag line saying how their business is unaffected by the crisis pops up every time I log on. Evidently they’re happy to take your money right now, but not to pay money earned by artists already signed up.

Appalling music distributor. DO NOT USE THEM. Have never been able to receive any royalties. They say they owe you a certain amount, and then palm you off on another service Payoneer. But they have no record of the money. I took my album off Ditto cos was so frustrated I never received any royalties from it, and they're STILL charging me my subscription TWICE. I've complained repeatedly and nothing happens.Am now going to report them to PPL as I think they're definitely breaking the law by holding back royalties. I strongly suggest other people do the same.

review_title: They will need you BIOMETRICS Scam !!
review_content: Scam !!! In order to get your money out ( Payout) they make you add your bio metrics ( YES, BIOMETRICS ) + Need your Government ID + a selfy Video... Yes they need All Of These things ! Talk about violation of privacy. Other companies just ask for EIN number or SSN!!! This is really bad... Do Not Use Them, you never know what they will do with your personal information

review_title: Since joining n 2018 have had constant…
review_content: Since joining n 2018 have had constant site upload problems, they never get round to fixing them. Now they are doing everything to withhold royalties like making you show your passport by video & picture and then they need more ID what the heck is going on with these guys? If that's not enough you get error messages saying that didn't work and this hasn't worked try again, their site is bugged up completely and they never sort things. Either that or they are doing it to avoid paying people their monies/royalties due.
awful service. no customer support. dont waste your time on these bloodsuckers

My songs were on SPOTIFY OFFICIAL PLAYLISTS. But THIS SITE deleted my songs and did not pay my money I earned.P L E A S  E I'm warning you! stay away from this site.I guess they steal my 6.000 pounds. (because as you know, payments are changing on all sites)God bless you.

I have been using DittoMusic for over One year. At the beginning i was new to the Music Streaming Business because i was a DJ and most of my money was made in Clubs and events. However a Year later and after that i have become successful and started having a lot of Listeners on Streaming platforms such as Spotify, and even though i had renewd my Annual Subscription to Ditto Music, a week later i was trying to log in to my account and it didnt work. So i thought there was a Bug in the system and i waited for a day. One day later... Nothing happened. So i sent them an email since i cannot log a Ticket because i cant access my account. Their reply was, that there had been some fishy activity from my account and that my account is under investigation and that i would not have access to my account until they finish the investigation. They had not given me what sort of investigation are they undergoing and what is the reason, they refuse to pay me my ROYALTIES and They refuse to Reply to any of my inquiries and e-mails! They also haven't even paid me back my Subscription. My Conclusion: Don't ever use these scammers. Their behaviour resembles an addicted crack user who just wants to steal people's money to carry on! SHAME ON YOU !

So far so good I signed up for the Record Label In The Box. There Was A few Hiccups Along The Way But Those Were My Fault. The Customer Service Was Very Efficient And Helpful As Well As Patient With My Mess Ups. In The End The Process To Setup My LLC and Legalize My Label. Thanks Ditto I’ll Definitely Write A New Review When I Get Yo Use All Your Services! For now I definitely recommend RLIAB for anyone wanting a label.

review_title: I have now been trying to upload my…
review_content: I have now been trying to upload my music on their site for over 24hrs it keeps buffering on 100 percent.Their services might be good but iv had the bad end of it . Im not one for bad reviews but i had to on this occasion seeing as im struggling here and have also lost my ideal release date.So overall i am not impressed

review_title: If it wasn't for Ditto releasing music…
review_content: If it wasn't for Ditto releasing music would be a pain but fortunately Ditto makes it so simple , they even provide marketing tips , promotion tips , for me Ditto is the only distribution service people should be using.

Likewise continues turning out astounding new stuff. It's extraordinary the amount I can lear about my music just from signing into my record. Continue doing what you're doing folks, it's completely been amazingly useful.

review_title: Ditto’s PR + Social media package was…
review_content: Ditto’s PR + Social media package was very helpful in broadening my horizon's in terms of having a more professional appeal, especially as an up and coming artist. they certainly impressed me with how many people are now reaching out because of hearing my music, They were a very helpful team of people that were focused on achieving the campaign goals.

review_title: Ditto made my musical fantasy a reality
review_content: Ditto music is ultimately the best and most reliable way to distribute your music. I remember being an indie artist and feeling completely hopeless with no record deal and no major opportunity. Ditto gave me that. Their site and resources are very easy to use, and navigation through their endless tools are as easy as pressing a few buttons and filling a few boxes. Ditto takes care of the rest. I’ve work with distrokid, and many other distributors, and NONE have compared to ditto’s makeup. I recommend it to brand new artist, and legends in the music industry all the same!

review_title: Very user friendly with great response…
review_content: Very user friendly with great response rates. Also the promotional packages are a bonus
Friendly, helpful and easy to use :-)
one of best ways to launch and promote music

review_title: Ditto Music Is one of the best distros…
review_content: Ditto Music Is one of the best distros and simple to use anybody can easily upload their music to all digital platforms in minutes.

review_title: Ditto made made my life easier and gave…
review_content: Ditto made made my life easier and gave me hope that i can be able to have my music heard and available in all platforms.Thank you so much

review_title: Good services and nice customer support.
review_content: It is going on the third year that I (we) have been using Ditto music to distribute music online and we are so satisfied with the services. This website is acting as a perfect platform for independent musicians and labels to publish and promote their works. I am happy to see that the website and the whole company is up and about; we are looking forward to expand our landscapes using this platform. I have also heard rumors about how they may not be answering support tickets which is not true, I have received replies and helps whenever I asked them for.

I’m 2019 I started seeing a lot of information on Ditto on Instagram and after Mr. Lee Parsons responded to a private message I sent it made me see how approachable and down to earth the company was in my opinion.    I bought my package and didn’t use it till January 2020 but ran into a snag because their site wasn’t showing my purchase.   I was discouraged and was having second thoughts about using them but then realized that if I want to establish a relationship with these people I have to do my part and use all channels available to me.  I wrote their customer service and was promptly answered and had to send proof that I brought it.  I sent proof but forgot to press send.  Long story short, customer service did their part and I took advantage of most opportunities provided by the site because I feel that I want to succeed and make my music career better than ever and this company can help me achieve that.   I look forward to building a closer relationship especially after I do my part in making great music - cheers!

review_title: I was trying to get my music heard so…
review_content: I was trying to get my music heard so one day i was just strolling threw the internet and came across ditto and i started with the basic lease and started releasing music then i got the LLC's and been with them for 3 years now and going to continue
Can't much but ditto music is huge success for Artist

review_title: Ditto Music: The Only Distribution Service Worth Considering
review_content: I've gone through a number music services down the years and I'm relieved and happy to have found and stayed with Ditto. Their customers service is excellent, always promt, helpful and polite.Their distribution network is vast and ever expanding.Their Pr packages are not only extensive, but most importantly effective.Oh, and they also regularly send tips and guides to help artists get off their careers off to a flying start.

review_title: This is a great resource for everyone
review_content: This is a great resource for everyone! Good work

Amazing platform, amazing concept, fantastic support and guidance with every release helping all independent artists and labels The dictionary meaning of Ditto is "same thing again"...and the above is what they deliver every time

review_title: We have never had a problem with…
review_content: We have never had a problem with releasing our music or even getting responses from emails from the ditto team.The journey has been amazing hence why we are carrying on with ditto music.

review_title: Looking forward to future projects with ditto
review_content: Straight forward to use, a good turn around time when reporting an issue and lovely and friendly customer service team. I love the useful emails that provide tips and support on various topics related to releasing music or being in the industry and have learnt quite a bit from my time with ditto and look forward to future projects and releases with Ditto
Really easy to use service that gives you 100% of your royalties. Dashboard is great and gives a good overview of your work. Can I have a Chartbreaker pack please?
Good distributor, easy to use and trustworthy.

review_title: Ditto is the only platform that gives…
review_content: Ditto is the only platform that gives you your ISRC number within seconds. I have waited days with other platforms. One needs this number to register your music on ASCAP or BMI. If you want your streams tracked on Soundcloud, you also need this number. Ditto is honest, easy to use, and fast.

The Cranium King Hear! promoting, the Cranium way!  trustpilot, DITTO MUSIC GAVE ME THE SENSE OF BEING A STRONG MUSIC PUBLISHER #TCFRECORDS AND AT BEST THE ARTIST #ZONEDUBBLEO7 I WORK EVEN HARDER KNOWING THAT THEY ARE IN MY PORTFOLIO,I CAN AND WILL BECOME MORE AND DITTO GIVE US ALL THAT REACH... I "TCK" SAID; (KEEP UP THE GREAT WORK BIG CRANIUM NATION ™ APPROVES SUPPORT, LET'S KEEP MOVING FORWARD WITH OUR UNBEAILABLE REACH TWORDS THE FUTURE....IN ESSENCE THANKS FOR REMARKABLE RESULTS. CRANIUM.

review_title: Have been using 4 years now and love it
review_content: Have been using 4 years now and love all the new updates no complaints besides the royalty payments 3 months behind

Best Digital Distribution. Easy to work, additional services you wont get elsewhere. And Packages to plan your entire release, from charts to promo. Or making your own artwork directly in your distribution dashboard.
very good price and support

review_title: Ditto is so professional and easy to…
review_content: Ditto is so professional and easy to use with lots of different packages to suit your needs I would recommend Ditto as I have used similar websites and they do not match up to what Ditto can offer

Working with companies on an online basis has it's pitfalls and frustrations. However Ditto has proven to be more than a "run by the mill" organization. If I can guarantee you a "Costumer Centered" company then well! Ditto Music Is That Company! Of course you wanna know "Why"? They actually respond within the time frame that they promise to irrespective of the work load. The Service Advocates went beyond their call of duty to ensure that we were satisfied when the errors were encountered and we needed them to assist us the most, they left a sweet taste in our mouths. We had 2 singles, 1 EP and a re-release planned and when we need the information, they actually delivered exactly what was needed to be known. I would give them 1000 starts if I could. But I am extremely satisfied with their work ethic and friendly tone in their dealing with my staff members.

review_title: Ditto Music is THE place to publish music
review_content: Ditto Music is THE place for independent and unsigned musicians to self publish your music. Go professional For £19.99 per year, you can release as many singles, EP's and albums as you can create straight from your home studio in a few clicks. Ditto deliver your music straight to the shelves of all good online music stores including i-tunes, amazon, spotify (and beatport, if like me you primarily produce dance music). It's super easy to use, they collect & (you keep 100%) of any royalties you make & your metadata gets embedded into your music along with the internationally recognised publishing catalogue codes they issue on your behalf, also useful for later on when your next iconic release gets picked up by the music sync supervisors over at Netflix. Ditto have been in the game for years and broke acts like Ed Sheeran to the market, they have millions in revenues paid out to thousands of artists and they can also help your budding career out with comprehensive PR and publicity packages, modestly priced and guaranteed to get you real exposure.I'd tried different ways of releasing my music previously before Ditto, but with mixed results; inadvertent take downs, recurring hosting fees and "Horror".. bad mp3 encoding (no names mentioned.)Ditto Music have a great, responsive support team and ticketing process for urgent requests and they have lots of good FREE advice for unsigned bands too. I've actually got a release coming out tomorrow through Ditto Music. It's my very first ever re-mix track and it will be up and out there when I wake up in the morning. EXCITING !  I've also got a twin album release coming up for spring 2020 (currently working my way through 18 mixdowns !) and I'm seriously considering Ditto Music's Chartbreaker package to break my music out to a whole new audience. It includes Pre-Release, Chart Registration, Social Media Graphics, Press Release Builder, PR Guide & Contact Database.   Check them out... if you're an independent label, you can also release & manage as much music content from multiple artists from as little as £29.99 per year. I don't often give 5+stars but they deserve it. Well done Team Ditto ☆☆☆☆☆(☆)Outerground

I have been using Ditto for a couple of years now, and would recommend them to everyone. Their pricing is the best value for money I have found, especially given the quality of service they offer. Not only do they distribute my music to a wide number of platforms, but they provide me with regular emails giving me coaching on how to maximise my music exposure.
Ditto Music has been wonderful, started using it this year. The experience 💯I've also recommended it to over 10 independent Artiste. It's worth it

This has been by far the best distributuion company i have worked with.As a new artist i would highly recommend Ditto Music not only do they have an excellent website with good packages for your new releases as well as in depth anayltics for your new releases they also have a fine selection of their own playlists on Spotify.Furthermore they also allow you to Submit your own music to their playlists and also give lots of information and help and were very professional through the whole process. Once again a massive thank you to everyone at Ditto Music 😎👍Kind regards Daniel

review_title: Very good platform for artists to make…
review_content: Very good platform for artists to make our dreams a reality by publishing our work and sharing with the world.

Seemed ok at first, logging tickets   for problems is a complete waste of time, I have NEVER had a response unless I leave a comment on their social. media page .. and payouts.... well what can I say...

review_title: Friend to foe to great friends!
review_content: Gone from friend to foe, to great friends. In true midlands fashion! 😂I can't express how important it is to be able to have direct contact with the CEO's of a company that share a similar background to myself!Hoping to maintain a great relationship!Also, the list of festivals is an amazing.

Just want to say a quick thank you to everyone at Ditto Music that have dealt with me over the past few months. Releasing a new album this year has been very stressful for me but Ditto have been a dream to work with. Very helpful, hands on and patient. Already recommended them to some of my friends and 100% I will recommend them to any other musicians I speak to about releasing music from now on.

review_title: I wish I had read these reviews before paying
review_content: I wish I had read these before giving them money. They are not worth the money. Save your money and use CD Baby for music and just do your own video distribution. They do not help you get on Vevo playlists so they are basically just taking your money to put you on YouTube. Customer service reps are short with you too. So peeved. Stay away.

After my last unhappy experiences, I must admit that the service has finally improved!My royalties were paid very quickly.One major problem that needs improvement, is the lack of support for unsigned artists.It would be really helpful, if we could get our releases featured in Beatport’s “New Releases” just like the major labels do for their artists.

review_title: The worst distributer you can imagine
review_content: The worst distributer you can imagine. Nothing works on the website and the representitives from customer services won't bother to help you in any way. It has cost me a lot of money and the only thing I got is a waste of time and a lot of frustrations!!

Stunningly bad customer service.My release was twice delayed due to a mistake by the "Content Team." It took several days to reach a "Support Advocate" who said they were "a little hasty with my release" and that was the cause of the error. She assured me that my release would immediately be processed and would appear in the stores within 72 hours with no results. A week later and another customer service representative said it could still be days before a solution could be found after a costly promotional campaign was already launched based on their assurances.Long story short, this was a costly learning experience and I would recommend looking for an alternative service if you are considering Ditto.

Do not use this company. I had a few releases with them that went smoothly. I was then charged for another year but decided I wanted to cancel my subscription and have a refund. They Canceled my account and I was told to take down my releases and they could refund my payment. I took down my releases and then they told me they cannot refund me even though I took them down. Shocking customer service, do not release your music with them if you want a good experience. Now I don’t have an account because They’ve cancelled it and my releases have been taken down, yet they’ve taken my money. Awful. Will never use again.

Fantastic service so far. Daisy and the team are great at providing information and helping guiding you trough the distribution process. The RLIAB is a great idea and is helping me as an independent artist grow and move forward on my own terms. Would recommend this to any artist serious about being self sufficient and owning your work. Big love to Daisy and the Ditto team. K

review_title: Every time when you want to release…
review_content: Every time when you want to release music they keep having issues, always about artwork while in the end it turns out nothing is wrong but their website or system. It is not normal if you have to contact the helpdesk each time before being able to release your music. Though their customerservice is kind and once fixed the music does end up on all streamingservices.

review_title: Uploaded a track on Ditto have waited…
review_content: Uploaded a track on Ditto have waited 13 days and its still in review worst site ever dont ever use it!!

review_title: I was having a few problems uploading…
review_content: I was having a few problems uploading my music to the Ditto website but, after emailing them, I received a quick response from a member of their staff and the issue was resolved swiftly. Thank you!

review_title: They take forever to take down a song…
review_content: They take forever to take down a song im still waiting and it's been 4 months now and they take 2 weeks to upload a song. Distrokid does it in 1 day and they do the lyrics. ditto is wack af

review_title: Sometimes I have issues with the…
review_content: Sometimes I have issues with the website. The positive side is the staff. The Australian team I deal with are excellent and can't recommend them highly enough. All artist I deal with in the industry I steer toward Ditto.

got ' banned ' months ago. i have been sending emails and they always answer with the " ungoing investigation " thing.unbelievable that i cant get to my tracks or my royaltys.they just do what they want. i bought a full pack. my own record label my *ss. i have been strugglin to write a bad review but how they handle their bussiness is just not how it should be.

Ditto has continued to sell my music for 3 yrs without paying me. I have asked several times for them to please take my music down or pay me my money, they have refused to do either! This is the worst service for distribution on the entire Internet, there is a reason why cdbaby in Tunecore are the most noted distribution because ditto sucks!

review_title: I wish I never used them
review_content: my tracks were delivered to Spotify, deezer EXCEPT youtube.  I asked Ditto when this track would be available to youtube.   it has been one week and i have not received any reply.  i would like to know why they can't answer...     Also please don't go Chartbaker.  it is SCAM.

RUNNNN  AWAYYY . Worst service ever , they delayed my work and made me look as a liar infront of my customers  , each time they say there is something wrong with my art cover and it was totally fine . they kept delaying me for a month , telling me itunes does not approve my art work and i did publish albums before with same album quality . Never use them or you will be trapped by bunch of scammers who don't know anything of what they are doing .

review_title: Great service for setting up my RLIAB…
review_content: Great service for setting up my RLIAB and releases - i must thank you Daisy for the professional support - great communication and customer focus.

very frustrated and bad experiences with DITTO.     Some are nice enough but I don't get answer that I need.    They failed also to deliver my track to youtube and I am still waiting for their reply.  Please don't go for Chartbaker deal.  My track was one of many and it was on the bottom list.   my track never got played.  it was such a big waste of my money.   Terrible business   VERY VERY dissapointed.

Absolute trash service. Matt and Lee Parson are some of the most unprofessional leaders in the music business. For those who are on the fence due to the 64% positive reviews rest assured that those reviews are either by people who just started out or bought and that these lengthy negative reviews are worth a hundred of the positive vague and short ones. I released my song on October 26th. I initiated the distribution on October 5th. Three weeks passed and i saw that the song was up on Spotify, Deezer, Apple Music, Shazam and Pandora. All the other stores don't seem to have this song available. That's problem number 1. But it turns out that i needed to take down my song because i wasn't getting good feedback for it. So I submitted 3 tickets, one in November two in December, all 3 were ignored. I had to manually go to every store's website and request the takedown personally through their own customer service. I don't want to mention the terrible problems they have regarding withholding funds from other Artists as my friend had to go through. Ditto is using spikes in streaming to justify withholding funds from others. By claiming that there may be "suspicious" activity going on with your account they can effectively stop you from having any control over your money. So to put it in perspective of how absolute trash Ditto's customer service is. I had an easier time taking down my songs through 44 customer services, each of different busy websites than Ditto's. This is not a joke and should serve to be a red flag. Oh and they do respond to emails when it has something to do with payment. You paying something to them that is forget any responses of a refund.Infact a "refund" is an inconceivable thing to Ditto and doesn't really exist despite it being an "option" Its like an alien word to them. Here is a video detailing one terrible experience a YouTuber had with Ditto music: watch?v=p1RGVLeAjD0"But Ed Sheeran and Chance The Rapper have used Ditto" and guess what buddy, they do not in any way shape or form use Ditto anymore or even suggest using it at all. Ditto flail their names around but you don't see the opposite happening because if they had any respect for their artists they would have people like Sheeran and Chance respect them, but you don't see Ed Sheeran or Chance the rapper support this company at all and that's because this company has been embroiled in too much controversy that never worked in favour of their reputation.If this isn't enough to convince you to stay the hell away from Ditto then i'll leave this as my final try. Ditto have long been causing the same issues I've mentioned here since 2014 and possibly before. Just see for yourself: https://rwffmusicDOTblogspotDOTcom/2019/08/ditto-music-musicians-and-labels-avoid.htmlhttps://wwwDOTdigitalmusicnewsDOTcom/2014/10/08/asked-ditto-music-pay-mechanical-royalties-said/http://wwwDOTlantosDOTcomDOTau/2011/03/31/ceasing-deal-with-ditto-music/?i=1https://aristakeDOTcom/post/cd-baby-tunecore-ditto-mondotunes-zimbalam-orWe took the risk and paid the price for it. Now its up to you not to be stupid and make sure that you use any other distributor but Ditto.

review_title: I think they just keep your money
review_content: I think they just keep your money. Tried to withdraw and they locked me out of my account. Now there is an ongoing investigation for illegal streaming. Really? Complete joke
cant get paid... RUN FROM THEM

If you are thinking of releasing your music, do yourself a favour and choose someone else. ANYONE will do. They tried to hide royalties from me from week one of my release. Sending support tickets gets ignored time after time. You may get a response if you email them directly but that's where the 'fun' starts. They constantly contradict themselves and LIE to you. It's BEYOND frustrating.I have basically been called a liar from one of their support staff 'Jen'. They refuse to answer a simple question, dodging and dancing around the issue, then CLOSED the ticket before the issue was resolved because I was asking questions they didn't want to answer!!!Previously they added me to a load of streaming services without my permission or knowledge. This meant people were streaming my album for free instead of buying the album. You get pretty much nothing for streaming so I have lost money because of this. I found out I had been put on Apple music and trying to get them to take it off took over TWO MONTHS. Support at Ditto is an absolute joke. A shambles. DELIBERATELY INCOMPETENT I suspect..Having had enough of Ditto, I wanted to go to someone else to host my album. You have to get your album taken down from Ditto before you can do this. I requested a takedown of my album which was initially ignored! It seems if you make a request which doesn't benefit THEM, they will ignore you, drag their heels and won't let you go. It took about FOUR MONTHS for this to be completed. They blamed Amazon, so I went to Amazon and they blamed Ditto. What a mess! There is NO PHONE NUMBER on their site. You cannot call them and speak to an actual person. All the phone numbers I found online didn't work. I wonder why? That should set off red flags right there.Any positive reviews are probably from people who haven’t had to send a support ticket, one review I read was someone who gave them five stars, then admitted that they'd never actually released anything from Ditto! REALLY??!!  OR they are sock accounts from Ditto themselves as some sort of damage control because of all the terrible reviews they get. Just look at the six 5 star reviews below mine, they where all submitted on THE SAME DAY. BS!! They really are TERRIBLE. Just read all the one star reviews on here, all a very similar story’s regarding problems with releases which aren't the artists fault. THEY ARE A COMPLETE WASTE OF TIME. DO NOT BOTHER EVEN THINKING ABOUT GOING WITH THIS SHAMBLES OF A COMPANY. SCAM ARTISTS. CRIMINALS TAKING PEOPLE'S MONEY. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.

review_title: You get what you pay for!
review_content: Cannot withdraw royalties, Never upload songs on time especially in advance to submit to Spotify playlists (which is sooo important for up and coming artists). They also are very ambiguous about the process and how long it may take "Held back royalties due to licensing verification" ??? We will respond in 5 to 10 Working days would be nice. Artists don't quit your day job any time soon! At this rate we'll be eating thin air for breakfast, lunch and dinner!I've also heard from a few people that their PR Packages are ineffective so I wouldn't bother! unless you have some sort of buzz already it's better to define your brand and build it up yourself takes time but as a independent artist you can't afford to waste your monies, after all they are just a distro company not a miracle working business.All in all It's a shame really, they have a good business model but cannot maintain customers due to a poor and neglectful service. They need to take some of their earnings and invest in hiring more staff! As word spreads very quickly. I am in the process of switching my catalogue over to AWAL. Hopefully they are able to maintain and support their large volume of clientele. Wish me luck! P.S Don't fall for the fake 5 star reviews on this site, they were all coincidently uploaded on the same day *wink wink* LOOOOOOOOOL

DONT TRUST THE 5 STAR REVIEWSNotice how all the 5 star reviews get uploaded on the same day? The company is blatantly faking these reviews. Ask any real customer and they will tell you how pathetic and useless this company is. Should be shut down immediately.

Terrible experience with this company is unacceptable the existence of this fraudulent people that support fake accounts and don’t take action against them, but protecting them!! I had to contact my lawyer and action with iTunes to block them and make them take action! But they never replied my emails If you don’t pay them starting a program you don’t have access to claim rights but what is probably worst once you pay they don’t reply your mails and anything!!! Terrible terrible don’t use them!! Thieves!!

review_title: I would NOT reccomend Ditto for all the…
review_content: I would NOT reccomend Ditto for all the reason stated in these reviews, in-fact i wish i had read some of these before i went ahead and distributed to them. Releases never go through on-time and by the time they communicate that there is a problem with your release, its the day before or the day of the release. Can never get through to them eith by email or telephone and on visiting their Liverpool office was told they DO NOT see customers as walk ins, that must make an appointment 6months in advance of seeing them which is completely counter intuitive because if you have an issue today how is it going to help resolving it in 6 months time STUPID!!!!. The latest issue is the withdrawal of any royalties collected. First of all you have to sign up for a pay as you go credit card provided by "payoneer" this takes a few weeks for Payoneer to register then send out the card, retrieval of the pin (a few more days) and then activation.You would think that this would be the end of the loop jumping but NO!! theres more, Somehow your identity has to be checked by Ditto and clarified before they release any Payouts. I request for my identity to be clarified and varified sometime in March maybe February of this year 2019. On checking today Several months later, my identity is yet to be clarifies so i am unable to retrieve any Royalties my songs have accumulated. So yeah This company is legit Fraudulent. i would suggest releasing through a more reputable distributer. If i could give zero stars i would.

Ditto are extremely bad at communicating any problems with your release.  I end up guessing as to what the problem is, because nothing is explained clearly.  My latest problem is that my song titles are generic.  The example they give is this:"Dear Ditto Music User,We’ve noticed a problem with your release and cannot process your order until the issue is resolved.Please check that your release conforms to the following rules:No generic song titles (eg, Track 01, Song 01)"My song titles do not have any of the words or numbers given as an example so I am lost as to what the problem is.  Even when I contact them through customer services I get really vague replies.  It's real guess work to try and work out what is going on or what you need to change.  This has been the 5th delay to my release now and it just goes on and on and on.I would recommend paying a bit more to a more professional aggregator and getting common sense and clear communication!!

review_title: I felt that Ditto did not have certain…
review_content: I felt that Ditto did not have certain features that Distrokid had so I tried to receive a refund last November the same day that I paid for it, but they said I could not get my money back. I was just charged AGAIN one year later, having never used the website.

Currently every release I have theres Issues and I’m forced to email and log a ticket with ditto, which I HATE doing as they either reply days later or not at all.I’m unable to withdraw my royalties, when I first emailed about this they ignored me. Now they’re saying I owe them money when I don’t owe anything.Every time I release a track it’s never on Spotify to submit to a playlist so I have to email them to correct it every single time which is exhausting because they take forever to reply. Not to mention there has been times my music has been taken down for months and I’ve had to email constantly to get it put back up.In 2015 when I first used them they were great and helpful, you could call them and speak to a real person, but now? If you want unreliability, no responses and hard work then maybe they are ok. Personally I think they’re the ryan air of distribution!(Also I complained about them on My Instagram and they got it took down)
PLEASE RUN AWAY FROM THEM. THEY ARE LIE TO YOU WITH WHATEVER THEY SAY. BEEN WITH THEM FOR 4YEARS AND NOW THEY CANCELLED ALL MY SUBSCRIPTION
Worst service ever, took my money song never got live and never recieved an answer from CS, stay away !!

I don’t often leave reviews but I genuinely feel like Ditto deserve it. They’ve helped me massively on more than one occasion and I’d  still be clueless about the music industry without their help. Great company. Great service

review_title: Moved to Ditto I utilized CD child…
review_content: Moved to Ditto I utilized CD child before moving to Ditto Music and the distinction reaction time as far as getting answers from client care is tremendous. Likewise can here and there take a days or two to hit you up, yet contrasted with Tunecore that is astounding, who despite everything i'm looking out for getting a reaction from about bringing down some music. I'd have picked Ditto over them inevitably in the event that I'd have known they contrast in any case.

review_title: Same is the best Ditto your the best
review_content: Same is the best Ditto your the best! Couldn't have accomplished what I've accomplished without you!!

review_title: Much obliged to You Ditto Thank You…
review_content: Much obliged to You Ditto Thank You Ditto for all that you've accomplished for us. I don't survey things all the time however I feel like Ditto merit it for enduring the majority of my inquiries and answering to me rapidly regardless of how little my issue was and comforting my psyche. Much obliged to you everybody at Ditto I've addressed.
best music platform

review_title: Great price Ditto dropped the price of…
review_content: Great price Ditto dropped the price of my subscription, put one of my songs on their Spotify playlist and give me some excellent advice about my upcoming song when I emailed them about a problem… all in the space of a month. Very very happy with Ditto, thank you.

review_title: Shout out to Ditto Huge shout out to…
review_content: Shout out to Ditto Huge shout out to Ditto Music. Had a big release coming up but made a mistake when I uploaded it and she fixed it for me and stopped me from stressing out. Big thanks!!

review_title: My Record Label A year ago I was a…
review_content: My Record Label A year ago I was a busking and now I run my own label and it’s all thanks to the guys at Ditto. Its something I always wanted to do and wasn’t sure if I actually could, but record label in a box made it much MUCH easier than I thought. Signed two artists already and excited about the future.

review_title: Ditto just banned my account for no…
review_content: Ditto just banned my account for no reason...i had 1k of Royalty fees on it....they just scammed me! The support is very awful as well. I am waiting for my payment for 4 months now...beside the royalties they also stole my music and my subscription money!

This is undoubtedly my worst experience of using "legal" distribution service Ditto Music.I had to go a difficult way to prove my rights and win the disputes on the stores. And finally all payment (almost 1400 pounds) were gone to the Ditto. And i see it in my account and i am happy...for a while.After one weeks of holding all payments they just banned my account because "the fraudulent activity".All my requests to prove my copyrights and clarify the reasons were explaining as "investigation is still going, we have no any timeframe on how long this will be completed". Like "just stop send letters, dude, we just not gonna pay you. Deal with it".They robbed me. Just like this.

SERIOUSLY DITTO! What's going on??? I've launched a ticket 2 days ago and another 20 hours ago and still NO RESPONSE? Do I have to shout and scream on Facebook every time I want a response from this service? You are by far the WORST digital distributor I have ever worked with! PLEASE respond to ticket: #242936 and #242782

Do not believe the 4 or 5 star reviews they are fake..probably from ditto staff. Stay clear they are truly one of the worst distributors around. I've been fighting for 3 years to remove my entire catalogue and they ignore it. Customer service is really bad and the owners are unprofessional rude arrogant and aggressive. How they are still in business ill never know. Save yourself some stress and go elsewhere. Octiive distrobution is the best for me.

Wanna-be player.I just tested this service out and would not recommend it at all.Problems i had in the very first week of usage : - Their track upload script is a mess. Bugs everywhere (duplicates while setting up the release , missing tracks, cant proceed to next step even if everything is set up correctly etc etc )- Release day were set to in 10 days. Release got reviewed and taken down because i had my label logo on the coverRedid the artwork , taken down again because the EP title contained the word "ONE" . - Support is confusing and misleading or not even responding.- Release still not out yet and i guess ill have more headache when it comes to get the release assigned to the correct spotify artist page then .
Never use them! Big scam! They dont work fine and dont pay all royalties! If you complain they lock you and keep all(!!!) Your royalties!
One of the worst distributors.Almost always problems while uploading and they didn't answer when you need helm

review_title: i claim i am best electronic music…
review_content: i claim i am best electronic music writer in world,  well i am, i produce my music on digital platform,  so sound quality is perfect,  ditto music i was using 3 years,  i dont want money, or revenue, i just want my music to be on music markets. they can keep all revenue but i keep paying for subscrubtion they always send my song back, everytime with different excuses. vocals corrupt they say or music high volume or aertwork not this and that. ditto i got so much problems i dont need a enemy

Read about my label's appalling experience with scam artists Ditto Music here: rwffmusic (dot) blogspot (dot) com/2019/08/ditto-music-musicians-and-labels-avoid.htmlNo mention of needing a passport or driving license to withdraw your royalties. So I complained. Of course, they took ages to respond since their customer service is notoriousy bad. I had no other option than to complain on social media. Instead of dealing with the issues correctly and appropriately, they blocked me from all their social media accounts and then removed our label's account. They are now desperately trying to find ways to keep the royalties that belong to our artists, but I have made it clear that I'm not having it.
Great servicesLove and enjoy the options Ditto music offers musicians. Do think that they're payout system could be faster in regards to verifying funds. Other than that great service!

review_title: I am just Ditto Music´s latest sucker
review_content: I am just Ditto Music´s latest sucker. They got my 19.99 through PayPal and I am now trying to reclaim.  I have nothing new to offer from the reviews below, just that I wish I had read them before subscribing.  Couldn´t upload tracks,  and no response from tech dept., or anyone else for that matter. Don´t believe any good reviews below. They were probably put there by DM themselves.

If ANYTHING goes wrong they take about 3 - 5 days to respond to you each time you email a response. It says please allow up to 24 hours to respond but they have honestly never got back to me in that time. Their admin team is appalling and their site is constantly undergoing maintenance!MOST IMPORTANTLY - they sometimes upload a different release name to the one you input on their system!!!! They literally edited the name of my Album and months later edited the name of a Single I put up - this seems like a joke - it's definately not. If you have any queries they take ages to respond to you and it pushes back your release date! I highly, highly recommend you go with a different distributor and shop around. I was intrigued by the nice design of their website but the people behind it all are SLACKING.

I have to wonder how many of these reviews are fake. Ditto regularly mess up our releases and getting hold of anyone to discuss it with is a very slow and frustrating process. At the moment I have one release that hasn't appeared in certain stores for reasons unknown and another release where they changed all the artist information and it's now incorrect. The only way to fix this is by sending an email and getting a generic reply 2-3 days later. It's a bit like sending a letter which is ironic for a digital distribution company. The Ditto interface is decent enough so I'll give them that and they're relatively reasonably priced compared to some others. Just hope nothing ever goes wrong...

Paid for the artist membership which is a good price, the website was easy and i got my music uploaded to the site in no time. 3 weeks past and the only service my music was available on was youtube and instagram, after many emails i got no response, they wouldnt even respond to me backing out of the service AND charged me to take the music down. avoid at all costs.

Ditto is awesome, best for independent artists and it’s simple. Not only that, unlike other distribution companies, you don’t have to pay a dime to release a single or album unless you want it on a certain store which is cheap and mostly all of them are free. Also as long as you sign up for your services that’s probably the only time you’ll pay especially if your a person that’s always tight on money! To add to that for the people who got the money but can’t seem to reach a fan base, their services will take care of you for sure.

review_title: Ditto has been a great source and…
review_content: Ditto has been a great source and outlet for me as a solo artist. I have never gotten so much attention from listeners around the world and locally any other way. I highly recommend them as an independent artist's first choice as a source for their music's distribution. They have every outlet available to you and the fee is not phenomenal. They get it all done for you exactly the way they advertise!
Ditto Music is awesome. Great interface and exceptional service! Keep it up Ditto Team!

review_title: I use Ditto, me too DITTO
review_content: I find the interface very easy to use and navigate.My only gripe is when there is an issue with your release before it is sent to stores such as the cover, you receive an email with a generic message which involves you guessing what could be wrong to correct it, then after you correct it this delays your release by another week or ten days. There needs to be a better option than that.

review_title: Ditto music experienced a lot worldwide…
review_content: Ditto music experienced a lot worldwide to help us all, thumb up Ditto music, thumb up...  Great job forever

review_title: They have good and well explained…
review_content: They have good and well explained packages

I love how easy it is to upload music onto your service and the speed at which music is delivered and released on the stores. I don't like how the analytics are caps at 7 days, I can't seem to access the analytics from release to date.

review_title: I gave a 4 star review but it's really more like a 4.5 star
review_content: The only reason why I gave a 4 star review & not a 5 star one is because I haven't been with ditto long enough to give a 5 star review yet, but from what I have seen so far and how quickly their customer service responded and fixed a valid issue I had not too long ago was impressive. They didn't have too, but they did anyway without question!

review_title: When registering with Ditto music it…
review_content: When registering with Ditto music it does everything on your behalf, all you can is to tell them what do you want thats it, am very happy to work with ditto music#mymusic my future with ditto musicThanks

This is one most flexible distributors in the marketplace of distribution/publication companies. That artists alike and an avenue for us Dj/producer's to work alongside of. Sure, every company has something that hinders them in some way. However, to work past those things and improve them a little bit each time are one of the things that customer's look for.
Successful refund

review_title: Research first lots of bad reviews...
review_content: Ah yes so now they are going to recraft your image after you ripped off so many people. Offering unsuspecting people a chance at a prize for putting fake good reviews. Bogus PR packages no working telephone, no royalties read the fine print people. 7 months a paid for release not released till I had to pay another company to do it. Screwed us because we advertised our release, pushed it on different stations and they never put it out. They also rebilled my card for another year even though they were doing nothing. No customer service available to answer any emails. Phone numbers did not work. Looking into a class action suit. Do not give these people your credit card info they will keep rebilling even if you cancelled. Do some research the internet is full of horror stories.
Very fast and easy to use and problems are resolved quickly with a good response time from support teams
Fantastic price for the service.

Simple, easy, effective. The services offered are second to none. The success that we crave is there for the taking, with a little help from our good friends at Ditto. Take control of your future, today. Sign up to dittomusic.com truly wonderful and extremely helpful staff. Love them

review_title: It's absolutely amazing how the Ditto…
review_content: It's absolutely amazing how the Ditto Team work, allowing artist to aim high and chase their dreams. For me personally Ditto is more than a platform, we highly appreciate it

review_title: So far I'm truly satisfied with the…
review_content: So far I'm truly satisfied with the service provided by Ditto, I'm honored to be a part of the the team.. Keep up the good work!

review_title: It’s being a pleasure to work with you…
review_content: It’s being a pleasure to work with you guys, since I’m with you, things started to happen.

review_title: Yo, it's bare minimum here bro
review_content: Ya'll got some good stuff goin' on. Real interrestin' keep the grind, and so will we.- It's Bare Minimum here, bro

At first i was like, "man this site aint nothing like distrokid." Was about to cancel my membership until i started digging. I couldnt believe what my eyes were seeing! I was exactly right. Dittomusic will never be like distrokid!! Its way better than distrokid. You can choose from different types of releases, you can register your releases for the charts, submit to playlists etc. You can also manage more than one artist and start a record label which is down right juicy and delicious if you ask me! My favorite thing about this distributor is the PR services they provide. Its phenomenal!!! Out of the park like the many homeruns Mark McGwire hit in his prime! They can get your name out there for sure. Did i mention you keep all your royalties???? Shoot why you still reading this? Why can i still see you here?? Get that bubble butt up and outta of here and sign up!!! Do the right thing.. make America, no, make the world great again!'Reader discretion advised'

review_title: Amazing Ditto Music this is great for…
review_content: Amazing Ditto Music this is great for new Artists.

Incredible service I started my journey with ditto back in 2016 & haven’t regretted a second of it! They are quick to reply to artists with problems and also show love to your music after its released. Overall amazing experience so far!

review_title: I am going to totalling transparent…
review_content: I am going to totalling transparent here. I’ve signed up to my package with Ditto but have not yet released anything as yet on the platform due to just having released my album. I will be uploading my next project with Ditto which will be very very soon. The info they provide independent artists with is next to none and I have learnt so much just from the things I’ve read and watched. Thank you ditto PS can I transfer my catalogue from Distrokid to you or do I have to reupload everything.

review_title: Ditto is an amazing platform for…
review_content: Ditto is an amazing platform for upcoming artist they give u the tools to be successful without a record deal

review_title: Ditto music are the worst company I’ve ever dealt with.
review_content: Ditto music are a joke. Tried to leave 2years ago after verbal abuse from the CEO who sent me numerous nasty emails. I asked for all my catalogue to be removed from all stores 2 years ago and they still haven’t done it. I now use Octiive who’s customer service is 2nd to none and takedown any requests within 48hours had no problems with them. Ditto however I have not got 1 thing good to say about them. Unprofessional, rude and not worth your money.

Thanks for all the empty rhetoric Ditto Music; my planned July 1st release date for my new album has come and gone without any help whatsoever from those who were supposed to make it happen. Now I will put the album release on hold until I consider my options.I contacted Ditto this morning to find out why my July 1st release had not gone forward, and all I received were automated responses. I find it outrageous when people take my money after promising to provide a service, and then when they DO NOT DELIVER on that promise, think nothing of it and ignore you. Well, shame on you. I can definitely go another route.
Awful service. Awful communication. Completely unreliable and unhelpful.

review_title: I got so many problems with DITTO it's…
review_content: I got so many problems with DITTO it's ridiculous. Nothing works on their website and it's very slow. Their service is worthless. Trying to delete a track takes me 5 months and still it's online. I issued several support tickets and none of them were solved.They wont refund my money so I got nothing only a waste of time and LOTS of frustrationsDONT USE DITTO!!

These guys are a terrible company, make it almost impossible to organise anything as you can not trust their systems and they do not respond to support requests.We uploaded a release and the entire track order / song titles was messed up in the process of them uploading to stores, this was following them letting us know that artwork did not meet criteria on the day of the release when we had scheduled it a while beforeThis has all lead to us initially releasing 3 days late with incorrect information (event though we uploaded correctly) - in order to rectify this we have to take the release down and wait nearly 10 days to reupload after we have spent a decent amount on advertising - very embarrassing.To top this all off they DO NOT respond to tickets (sometimes for 3 days) and have no other way of getting in contactAVOID

This company is avoidable. They are inconsistent, a huge mess and if you dare complaining you lose your money. Label in a box is an expensive scam. Do not believe any promise they make. any cheap distributor does it better.

Its disgustingly BAD! I had not one, not two, but three releases and a label setup messed up bu Ditto! I have a track that is supposed to release tomorrow! Today they email me that something is wrong with it! The next release date that I can select is again in 8 days! I can not wait to go away from them! Do not trust any positive review about them, they are really really bad! I go to Distrokid!
so many issues. No customer support what so ever

review_title: Ditto Music Default Recurring Payment Scam
review_content: Last year I signed up to Ditto Music - a company that distributes music to various platforms. I wasn't happy with the service and quickly cancelled and they refunded my payment.However, suddenly a few days ago (one year later) I received an email from PayPal saying that Ditto Music thanks me for making a payment of $19 to Ditto Music.I was furious because I realised they were operating the default agreement to a recurring payment scam. PayPal agreed with me and said that quite a lot of companies play this trick on their customers.So, if you are unfortunately with them just make sure you un-tick their sneaky little recurring payment box - absolutely disgusting!

review_title: I remember using ditto in like 2011…
review_content: I remember using ditto in like 2011 trying to release something had the same issues ppl are complaining aboutnow totally put me off trusting another distribution company not signed up to another since but I’m getting ready to release so I’m looking around for the best prices/services the prices are too good to be true... n you would of thought they would of improved 8 yrs later but the bad comments reflect on what I experienced too my project was inactive and apparently in review for months never got “active” and getting my refund back was a long long winded process. Defo not trying them again after still seeing these terrible recent reviews

Completely Average. Their website is the most frustrating thing on earth. They boast being able to drag and drop tracks and bulk upload, but you have to reload and reupload ever second or 3rd song because the site times out. Then you have the issue where the boxes you check dont register as being checked and it wont let you continue without them being checked. Then you have to deal with the fact you add titles and readjust the order of the tracks you upload, but they dont reorder coz the site times out.... Then you have to deal with setting your release date, only for the album to sit "in review" for 2 weeks, then when you raise the fact your music hasnt been released on the date you chose, support tell you that there is something wrong with the way you have titled one of your songs or that they dont like one of the words on the cover art... Ive used 3 digital distributors over the years (since 2013) and Ditto are, by far, the worst when it comes to the process of getting your music out. Once its eventually out, they re pretty good. Nice sales stats and user friendly interface, but its beyond frustrating to get to that point. You really do get what you pay for in this industry.

Very bad!! Uploaded my music, and got a release date. At the release date, both albums became "inactive". This was 4 weeks ago. Since then, I have e-mailed customer service many times about what this means and when my music will be published, with zero reply. Stay away!! Distrokid en Tunecore (tried both) are much better.

review_title: Ditto Music is a trustworthy site
review_content: Ditto Music is a trustworthy, reliable and interesting music site.I recommend using Ditto!!

review_title: I am so glad I came across ditto
review_content: I am so glad I came across ditto, not only i got myself on Vevo but ditto has been guiding me from day one. Would recommend to anyone at a blink. Love you Ditto.

review_title: Super happy with ditto and their…
review_content: Super happy with ditto and their services!

Awful awful awful.God awful service. Every release I made gave me uploading issues. My newest issue is arranging song order. Once I go to the next step then go back it reflects the original order. This happened three times in 4 hours.It has a constant spinning wheel which says "uploading" but it never does anything. It sometimes takes days to get a response if you try contacting them. If you upload a song title with a number in it, the system gives you error messages or simply deletes the number from the title altogether. Not user friendly at all. A waste of time and money and I have given them so many chances. I don't usually write reviews, but after spending 12 hours on this with no results I am fed up!It's a terrible site and I already cancelled my year to year subscription. Going to begin seeking other means of publishing my music. This one should be closed down.
I love ditto music, the website is super easy to navigate and the service is helpful and inexpensive for a small artist like myself

review_title: Bad support/song in review for 2 weeks
review_content: Support tickets take ages to be responded at, I deliberately upload my music early on only to be "in review" for 2 weeks. Chances on playlist placing for Spotify are near zero... The only upside is PayPal support, there aren't many distributors that offer PayPal to pay for your subscription.Payout system offered by Payoneer is useless

Been with Ditto Music since 2012.."Nu Ole Skool - New Old School" record label reg with Ditto was easy, 1st Debut single "Treat Life Like a Joke".....Had to release my never heard before 16 Bits of old skool UK rave raw beats, 30 years in the underground tribe music making..Never promoted myself and smiled when i saw people in Greece had bought/listened to my track....Still not there yet with being known in the massive world of music but looking to release 2nd album with more Original "Back Room Studio" beats with Ditto Music for 2019

review_title: Ditto Music community is a great…
review_content: Ditto Music community is a great opportunity for emerging independent songwriters, singers, musicians and artist like myself to create connections. Being offered these important tools can help increase my knowledge and opportunity for growing success in the business. Cheers!! Bo Lavail~ Thanks Ditto Music

review_title: Five star for the first 3 months since…
review_content: Five star for the first 3 months since sing in everything is ok. I recommend.
They are an excellent team, they have helped us grow as a musical group, we are really grateful.
Still haven't seen any sales from the company and am being promised a chartbreaker package to review the site. Nothing else to say as of yet.

review_title: Ditto works in favour of the artist
review_content: I have been using ditto for about 4 years now and hands down they are the most effective and helpful when it comes to distribution. Also they give advice for independent musicians and always have special offers to make your journey in the industry a more comfortable one. I’ve had deals with other distributors but honestly with ditto the power (and money) is always in favour of the artist. Will always recommend

review_title: We’ve used them all and after two years…
review_content: We’ve used them all and after two years of using ditto for all our distribution we couldn’t be more pleased with their commitment to great technology and great understanding of the musician mindset. We recommend them wholeheartedly.

review_title: Ditto is the best for independent…
review_content: Ditto is the best for independent artist alike it gives you the opportunity to share your music and have control over your Royalties as an artist. They offer some really cool helpful tools as well
Excellent! Great and quick support!

review_title: Ditto has helped the business part of…
review_content: Ditto has helped the business part of my label and music substantially
Brilliant! looked at other services but these guys have it all in one place a much wider choice of features for music distribution and analysis of how your doing

Great company for music services, sometimes a little slow on replying to problems but they get solved every time. They also always update their services with the latest features so you are never left behind in the market.

I have utilised the services of Ditto for a number of years. Their analytical breakdown of your music's performance and audience demographics is very useful. They are very responsive with updating any changes you would like to make to your Vevo channel. Great service.

I’ve only been using Ditto Music for just over a year now. It wasn’t the first distributor I tried, I think I’ve been through about six or sever others and I can only say Ditto is the best. Price for price they’re very affordable which removes the stress of worrying about the cost of releases and allows me to focus more on my music! Their support team is brilliant and they’re always quick with their responses as well as very helpful!I think they’re very understanding of the needs of artists and strive to continually improve the service they provide as well as the relationships with artists. Keep up the good work!
Amazing website so easy to use and I really enjoy working with them.

review_title: I have been with the platform for a…
review_content: I have been with the platform for a good 4 years now and after on-going development they have really nailed the sales, analytics and payment protocols. first class distributor, up there with the best!

review_title: Ditto fantastic value for for the…
review_content: Ditto fantastic value for for the money. For getting your music around the world loads of information packages to help you on your way . Well done ditto hats off to you.

THE SERVICE OF DITTO TO ME FOR SOME TIME NOW HAS BEING IMPRESSING , I BELIEVE I WILL HAVE NO OTHER HANDLE MY MUSIC BUSINESS BESIDES DITTO . I UNDERSTAND THE SLIT DELAY SOMETIMES BECAUSE U NEED TO MAKE SURE ALL IS RIGHT . THANKS FOR UR SERVICES

Been releasing track through Ditto for nearly 3 years now. Always been easy and smooth and any times I've wanted to change something they've gotten back to me quickly and been very helpful too.Plus they definitely got the best price of anyone out there considering you can release as much music as you want.I'm a big fan of what their doing in the music industry too, disrupting major labels and helping smaller artists.

Avoid this service. Just use DistroKid. My experiences with Ditto this year have just been a PAIN. They won't tell you theres an error in your release until the DAY before the release date. Which obviusly causes HUGE problems. They then didn't release an album on the right day (it was a day later than they said). They don't reply to emails for about 5 days, and then just give absolutely no help, they just copy/paste from the FAQs. You want to take down a release? Its a 50/50 on whether it will ever get taken down. Valid WAV files get rejected for being 'corrupt' when they worked fine before. (And remember, they don't tell you that until the day before release...)Honestly a joke of a service, and an absolute nightmare for releasing music. As you can see, many other reviewers agree.Compare them to DistroKid. DistroKid tell you within about 30 mins of uploading whether your release has errors and offer instant, easy fixes. Ditto charge you $40 for 'Express Delivery', which DistroKid does for free as standard. Just go to DistroKid. Much larger, professional service.

Go to Distrokid. My band released music only to find it on some other band's page of a similar name - one week on and Ditto still haven't given us our own page on Apple Music, they said it would be 5 working days, which it has been, and the person emailing me just told me it's gonna be another 5 working days. She also said that they can't make this not happen again - so we have to go through this incredibly lengthy process every single time we make a release.

review_title: Despite cancelling my membership I was…
review_content: Despite cancelling my membership I was charged for a second year (it says on ditto website I have no membership ) . If you join check whether you have automatic renewal with you bank / Paypal and cancel it with them if you do not want , otherwise Ditto will charge you even if you think you have cancelled membership .  No customer service , have NEVER responded to a single request . Also beware that Ditto does not always send your tracks to all digital retailers as requested

This is bad service everI set my album to be out on 15 may but later on it was inactive when i email them they dont get back to me and i payed for the AlbumEven they havent got back to me to tell me whats wrongTheir service is bad and poor

review_title: I would give them no stars
review_content: I would give them no stars. They wouldn't pay out my royalties, and when I went to another aggregate CD Baby and closed my account, they are claiming they can't pay me without verification of licensing. I wrote all my own music, and it's copyrighted and with a PRO, so what are they talking about. It's not a huge amount of money, so why are they so reluctant to pay me? They told me if i closed out my account, I would be due the remaining balance. They are shady liars. Don't use them. Avoid them like the plague.

review_title: These guys started off OK... but now
review_content: These guys started off OK.. I think maybe they can't handle the traffic now, or are just unprofessional... or maybe both. 1. When you raise an issue they never get back to you, but will respond if you go on their FB page2. Logging support tickets is a waste of time 3. I personally don't think they submit tracks to spotify in time for the artist to submit to spotify editors before release.

First I was checking out several aggregators and decided to publish my music with Ditto Music for two main reasons:Very fair pricing modelUserfriendly PlatformUploaded my music and was a little bit confused during the time to release date, that they don't gave me further information about the actual processing state. Started to read the negative Reviews as well and felt insecure about handling of my order.So at the planned release date my album was just in state "Scheduled". Luckily this was not time critical because I did not communicate any date to anyone before.Made a Support Ticket, Michelle from Ditto Music was very helpful and competent. She finished the job within 24 hours.Would you recommand Ditto Music? Definitely yes!

Ditto Music is absolutely unprofessional! They changed delivery providers last year and failed to inform Artists about this step because guess what! It turns out they had some technical glitches during the migration which caused tons of Artist not seeing their music up on Spotify and possible other stores. They never rectified the issue and I cancelled my membership with them, because this is just unacceptable! Now over half a year later after I cancelled my membership they are still trying to deduct my money again from PayPal! I stopped the bank transfer but it is so much hassle, on top of that they never paid me what they owed me, which is of course, more hassle in following it up. They are just money hungry and don't care if your stuff is on the stores or not. They are just not worth all the hassle, I recommend looking for another distributor.

Ditto is a great launching platform for independent artists starting up or already on the way but never had a distributor. The opportunities and plans they offer are second to none especially for me being based in Africa. The partnerships they have with other third prty companies that add value to an artist, for example, vinyl printing discounts, branding discounts etc. also have great significance to the productivity of my art.

Pros:The website design is easy to navigate. Affordable prices for music distribution. Cons:If you leave a track too late to be uploaded before the release date (7-9 days), Ditto will most likely finishing reviewing a few days before the release date, and because of this, I could not apply for playlisting on Spotify. Bad customer support. Very short responses that do not answer my question(s)Apparently there is some ‘delay’ in showing you your sales report and Ditto do say that the sales report may not be 100% accurate which is fair enough, but in actual fact it is NOT 100% accurate and therefore I am not getting the royalties I should be getting.

The customer service is fantastic, I have received replies within a day of logging a support ticket. The website very easy to use and the prices are very reasonable. I now have my entire back catalogue on all the best online music stores. Highly recommended :)

review_title: the platform is easy to use
review_content: the platform is easy to use and adapts to my needs, I upload files easily and they help me design my covers

I've tried posting several tracks using Ditto. Only one of them appeared in stores on time, the rest was far too late. One of them is still not on spotify (and has been marked as 'in review' for weeks).If something is wrong with your release (title, artwork, track version, etc) you'll get informed about this just a (few) day(s) before the release date. After making changes you'll have to re-schedule your release and it will take 8 days extra to appear in stores. One time I haven't been informed about my delayed release at all...When you try to reach out to them it takes more than a day (or two) to respond. Their replies are unprofessional and short, and often do not fix the problems. They just want money.I highly recommend using a different distributor.

I’m so Angry I’m cancelling my subscription.
