As a producer for many artists as well as a solo artist, I've been recommending Ditto for years to everyone who comes through the studio. Really appreciate how simple it is to get the music out to the where the listeners are.

review_title: 10 year customer of Ditto is hugely disappointed
review_content: For 10 years Ditto provided my music with a place to live and the sort of simple hassle free set up I would have hoped for, I dealt directly with the founder, Lee, who was really helpful and knowledgeable. Last year a couple of my albums went off Sptofify, now I'm not a famous artist so I didn't even notice until a fan informed me. I emailed Ditto and was told there had been a change and to send everything again, no apology. So I sent everything again, 3 months, multiple emails, twitter contact, contact forms later I had no replies. Finally someone at Ditto got back in touch, again no apology just telling me to send my music and artwork again, which I did and again I was ignored. I'm sure that a big artist would not put up with this sort of neglect which led me to conclude that Ditto is no longer for independent artists. I little bit of competition research made me realise that in 10 years a lot has changed and I can get my music out there cheaper and hopefully with better service. I am currently in the process of leaving Ditto but they have not replied in a while!.....

I tried Ditto for a few years. Ditto put my albums in the wrong genres on different platforms, which was embarrassing. I persevered because it was cheaper than alternatives. I went to load up my latest album April 2018 and the site kept breaking. So I quit - asked for a refund on my March 2018 subscription and walked away. In March 2019, Ditto took £58.80 for a new annual subscription with no warning and no consent. When I had cancelled my subscription the year before they had left me on automatic renewal, even though I had quit. I do not even have a subscription status on the account in spite of having the money taken! There is nothing in my account to indicate that I am on an automatic renewal or how to stop it. This is very sharp practice - highway robbery. And customer service matches.
Excellent they always resolve your issues if you have any

review_title: Totally dropped the ball on my release
review_content: Totally dropped the ball on my release. I uploaded my files and placed my order on January 24th for a release date of March 1st. I was told on Feb 28, the DAY BEFORE my release date, that there were problems with my uploads that I needed to fix, so I promptly went to address the issues and found that the error message did not apply to what I had put up. So I resubmitted and logged a support request for them to fix the glitch and put the order through on time, given that I had uploaded my files over a month prior and planned ALL of my promotion around a date of March 1st. More than 36 hours have now passed without any response whatever and in the meantime, the release threw up the same error again. Given this unresponsiveness from customer service ON my official release day, I logged a support request asking them to cancel the order and I purchased distribution with new barcodes from CDBaby, which I know to be a reliable and responsive company. As a result of this computer glitch combined with their total unresponsiveness, my release is going to be 1-2 weeks late to all the streaming platforms and all the promotion I have set up has been seriously compromised if not rendered totally ineffective. Who goes to YouTube or SoundCloud? They will check Spotify, be unable to find it, and will forget completely about my album. I am seriously angry about this experience. A distributor has exactly ONE JOB and that is to get the product to the stores by the date agreed. I will be taking all my business elsewhere in the future and I suggest you do so as well.EDIT: They finally sent me an email on the morning of March 3rd explaining that I was at fault. And also, the reason they gave for my submission not working -- that there was something wrong with the title format -- was simply untrue, since the exact same titles and tracks had already been delivered to stores by CDBaby at that point. Absolutely brilliant. I responded that they had had four weeks to inspect my tracks and deliver them to stores in advance of my release date, and that this represented sheer incompetence on their part. Do the math. In the same amount of time it took Ditto simply to respond to my initial email, CDBaby had already inspected, approved, and delivered my album to every platform that matters and it was live about 24 hours later, everywhere but Apple, which was a pleasant surprise given my expected timeline of up to 2 weeks' delay. Avoid Ditto Music. I think it's obvious from this review what my recommendation would be, but there is plenty of competition.

review_title: A quick review of my experience with Ditto Music

Some of the in-depth reviews comparing services wernt too positive about Ditto, but I knew some people who reported a good experience and the more I looked at what was on offer, the price points and the ability to add on promotion pakages or chart registration I decided it looked to be what I wanted.I could also see that Ditto were out on social helping some artists with a bit of love as well :)So far I´ve put 4 releases out, and although I had some teething problems they got sorted out by support very quickly.The user interface is pretty simple and, important to me, was the option of distribution to Beatport which costs a one off fee to set up a "Beatport Label".So now Ive got a bunch of tracks loaded and ready to drop - Happy Days :)

review_title: Honest review by a label manager
review_content: We're a small label that works with DITTO's label package and we must admit that we've hesitated to start our partnership because of the mixed reviews we found online. So here's our experience with Ditto Music:* Customer Service *After about a month of working together everything has worked out fine, the releases were all on time and the customer service was sufficient (a bit more short and to the point compared to other aggregators but hey, they're doing their job well so no complaints here). They also tend to send emails with useful tips and interviews with industry people on a regular basis.* Platform & DSPs *The platform you use to submit music is very user-friendly and the DSPs they offer are broad anough for artists in most regions of the world, except Asia (no options for QQ Music, etc.).* Beatport distribution *The fact that they offer Beatport distribution is definitely a plus and it works like a charm, we've tried it on one release. Be aware of the fact that Beatport might upload it in the evening if you're living in West Europe.* Express release service *We had to use their 'Express' release service for a spontaneous release of one of our hip hop artists that was getting a lot of media attention during that time. The track released on iTunes the same day (on a Saturday!) and Spotify was up and running on Monday morning.* Analytics and royalty payments *The Analytics system seems to be working quite well, we can only see a few DSPs for now though. But unfortunately we can't give any thorough feedback on these aspects as we're only using DITTO for about a month now. We did notice that some people had issues with it. Hopefully we can come back in a few months and give some more info on these topics.

Never even dream to get featured on any popular playlist, except theirs. Trust me- they will just ban you with no notice at all!

review_content: I love how ditto's platform is so clear and easy to use! I highly recommend them to all creatives!

In a world of feeling lost in the dark, Ditto was the only entity that put out its hand and honestly guided me in the right direction. At times it almost seems like a friend that’s always there to answer your questions and help guide you out of, and away from the pitfalls of the industry and mistakes that you would’ve inevitably attempting it on your own. ditto restored my belief in music as being a viable source of income. And  because of that I highly recommend Owner of Enigma Records

review_title: Ditto Music is like a family
review_content: Ditto Music is like a family, It's more than just a distribution or PR company. I have known them for a while now and getting in touch with them for or during a campaign is one of the best things you can have, because if you have worked with other PR companies you will understand the importance of communications during campaigns

review_title: I have to give Ditto Music 5 Stars
review_content: I have to give Ditto Music 5 Stars.  I recently used Tunecore as my distribution resource.  I am releasing my next single through Ditto.  So far all the resources that I have come in contact with have provided great insight, great knowledge and huge platform to get my music submitted for other playlist and music charts.  I also have found that it is easy to locate and if I have any questions it will be answered within two days.  I know I am going to really enjoy this new relationship.  I feel deeply that it is going to boost my music and my brand to the next level.  "Phunc Milla"

review_title: Been using Ditto for years and have had…
review_content: Been using Ditto for years and have had very good experiences of their service.Had one problem recently, and was very pleased with how it was resolved. Proper hats off to customer services, who, when we contacted 'em via social media, swiftly moved to rectify.

Brilliant service and the fact that they have people who are on hand to help with all music services it’s amazing! I have had nothing but great experiences when working with these guys and I highly recommend it! Takes away the stress off self distribution

review_title: Ditto music has changed my music…
review_content: Ditto music has changed my music career. I went from having to pay monthly just to be heard to a one time affordable rate. Thanks ditto

review_title: Well lets take a minute to be honest…
review_content: Well lets take a minute to be honest because that's what people really want from reviews. First I have used Ditto for our last few releases with my current band and my previous band. The service is always excellent in getting your music out there on most platforms; however, there at times have been small delays with sites such as Spotify not getting for a few days after other stores like iTunes and google. That being said I have friends who have released on other platforms and lost revenue from sites like youtube, while Ditto actually gave us royalties from content ID which is a nice plus. Naturally being curious I have double checked and found my music in most stores except Pandora, although it has been found even on somewhat obscure places so no harm no foul there. All that being said ditto has been very good and making sure we get our money and has always been very responsive. My only true complaint has been the sales tab does not always reflect sales so there is not a true way to gauge sales on every platform until the report actually shows up which can take quite some time.so here's an easy list of pros and consPro's: easy to use, you do get your money, relatively cheapcon's: the dashboard is "ok" at best, if your like me(from America) all the money is not listed in dollars which can be annoying, the sales report can take forever (which is more on the stores than Ditto itself)so would I Recommend this serviceYes I would

review_title: Dittomusic is by far the best…
review_content: Dittomusic is by far the best promotional company out there.  Not only did they come through on every promise, but they went above and beyond.  I’ve had phone conferences, which were not easy from the United States to London.  They’ve always answered my questions and offered their help every step of the way.  I’ve gone from 300 followers on my Instagram to over 19,000!  I’ve had amazing reviews from online magazines and it has caused a frenzy about my new EP.  Not only would I recommend them, but I will be using them for all of my promotions from now on!  Thank you Dittomusic!!

Ditto Music is really a game changer in the music industry, both in the corporate side of it and the production side of it. The music world has never felt so close and comforting. Ditto Music has done much more than creating the platform for indie musicians/artists/music makers for networking and distribution, they have created an arena that inspires and aspires upcoming music makers, continue to grow those who are already living the music life, and has managed to connect different countries worldwide all through the love of music

It’s great being able to work with a brand who has the independent artist in mind. Having the single yearly fee really makes life easy. All the blog posts helping indie artists is really helpful too. I’ve always known about sync deals but had no idea how to implement them until now!I’ve tried a couple of other places, free and not free and this one really works well for me, especially as an electronic artist.I’ve already recommended the platform and will continue to for the foreseeable future ❤️❤️(I know it’s probably not something you can help, but Beatport always uploads my music a day or two late. Only issue and it’s Avery small one x)

I would recommend Ditto, no doubt it. They gave me what I needed to get my label up and running fast, my first label-in-box registration, and got me registered on a International level. Get with them artists, they are the best hands down.

review_title: I’d give more stars if I could
review_content: I really love Ditto music so much. They’re my one shot I have to become what I want to be and share what I love doing. It’s really easy and efficient to use and it’s pretty cheap as well. There’s little perks that come with it and I’m so glad I get to use Ditto

So easy to sign up, release content and view stats for existing releases. Never had a problem with this site; sales trends is my favourite feature on my profile as I can see how many people are listening to my music in different countries all over. No hidden costs and plenty of opportunities offered throughout the year! Love it, well done team Ditto.
Ditto is simple the best. Look no further

First of all, 4 stars doesn't mean Ditto isn't great, it just states that nothing is perfect. The team at Ditto has made it quick, easy, and functional to distribute my music in a professional aspect. For my latest EP release, DIVE, I purchased Dittos Social Media Marketing Package and it is still bringing in results months after the deadline! There was a bit of miscommunication at the front of purchasing but they quickly handled everything the right way and it was smooth sailing from that point on! Thanks Ditto!-TERRENCE615

review_title: Hello out there I have been using DITTO…
review_content: Hello out there I have been using DITTO MUSIC for a couple of years and I love it very much. Fantastic response and support if needed.THANK YOU VERY MUCH

Ditto is Amazing!!! I just started releasing my music to the public & ditto makes the whole process easy, quick, and affordable. I recommended Ditto to all my friends who are newcomer artists and I plan on upgrading to label soon !!

review_title: I’ve been using Ditto for a couple of…
review_content: I’ve been using Ditto for a couple of years now, and recommend to plenty of other musicians. Brilliant company, no problems what so ever. Fast response if needed. Excellent service.

review_title: Thanks God they came to Brazil
review_content: Real chances for unknown artists to be playlisted. Transparency. Low Fees for unlimited distribution. What else more can you expect?

review_title: Reasonably Prices But Slow Support, Unprofessional and Lack of Care
review_content: Overall the Ditto interface is very user friendly and is a breeze to use. Prices of their services are very reasonable. Most of the time I have submitted music easily, however their support team is completely useless.I had an issue where they had made an error with an upcoming release and they were completely incompetent at resolving their mistake, to the point that despite a 3 week notice of their mistake they still proceeded to release the music with incorrect details after messing with a completely separate earlier release - pathetic customer service with a complete lack of regard for those that pay them for a service; very unprofessional and I would not recommend.
Quick and honest delivery! They check your upload first, and then its uploaded to whatever stores you selected. The site is easy to use and that all for a minimum price!

review_title: Ditto is the way to go!
review_content: User-friendly product uploader. Fast release distribution and equally as quick takedown action. For trying other distribution, I highly recommend that one.

I have used a different distributor in the last 12 months and I can honestly say ditto are brilliant, they are prompt at responding and also will go above and beyond to ensure that your release is as smooth as possible! Would highly recommend ditto. Bravo!

review_title: Ditto is love, Ditto is life
review_content: Hello from Riveryard,Ditto is an amazing company which helps and allows artists to release their music throughout different platforms. Using Ditto is very easy and we would recommend their services to any upcoming or well established bands. In addition to that, their team will do absolutely everything to help. Ditto offers a lot more services, which us as band will definitely look into in the future. Ditto is love, Ditto is life!
Certainly would recommend ditto to any independent artist! Their supportive team will assist you along the way and make releasing your music smooth and effortless!

review_title: Ideal choice for an independent artist.
review_content: Ideal choice for an independent artist.I have tried other services before, but would definitely recommend Ditto - big time.They've been extremely reliable with the release times for my new single 'Stuck In Here' - it meant a lot in securing a great exposure in the US, UK and worldwide.Highly recommended!
Look no further, Ditto Music is simply the best out there. I switched to Ditto Music and Im very happy with my choice! Highly recommend!

review_title: They have a lot of features...
review_content: First used Ditto in 2010 (under another Alias) and I must say the growth is amazing! The website is very user friendly, and everything is detailed but simple to understand. They have a lot of features that make being an independent artist less of a scary thing. I think my favourite thing about ditto has to be their interaction with clients and constant opportunity for growth. Not seen anything better elsewhere

Since November 2018, I am trying to release a track and till date the track is not out yet. Few error with the cover even though I have followed instructions on something se and format. Eventually I have used the artwork provided by ditto but still not work. Just waiting for that cross to cross the final line before ipload more tracks. Ben

review_title: Ditto is easy to use and affordable
review_content: Ditto is easy to use with lots of options to make distribution tailored to how you want it! It’s handy to be able to start setting up a release before absolutely everything is ready so you can come and go and an end what you need until you send the tracks to be distributed. It’s at an affordable price which all artists just starting out need to be able to just get out there and their customer service team are delightful
Ditto is a straightforward distribution site with more than just the option to upload songs. It's very powerful and I'm a happy customer.

review_title: Ditto review by Electrockrat, Tel Aviv, Israel
review_content: Honest true, and hard working staff making the distribution process easy as it gets and will always  be there to support the artists!

Honestly I love Ditto and the services they provide. Absolutely affordable and worth every penny. I always craved to be playlisted on Deezer but didn't know that Ditto is the way, and now that I've registered and also saw the services rates, I'm convinced. I'm gonna stick to Ditto!!

Just Amazing! Setting something like this up on your own could be a daunting task, but got to say these guys made it effortless and pain free, helpful and friendly advice and very professional 5 stars isn't enough honestly!

review_title: just started and ditto made it easy!
review_content: I have just recently entered the music industry and am Pershing a full time career managing artist and releasing music! Ditto has truly made this process easy and convenient.... more importantly clear communication and when ever I do have a query, I alway get great responses, which are really helpful! Thank you DITTO!

Fast responses to queries, and releases my music out there quickly with little heads up! Also extremely useful. Gassed, and fully hoping that the package will allow for more than 5 artists in the near future.

review_title: I was searching for so long and finally…
review_content: I was searching for so long and finally I found a trustable, quick and high customer friendly distribution company. Ditto Music platform is also So easy to use and my favorite future is their amazing P&R and promotion package services. As an independent artist I highly recommend this guys. Take a look! I grantee you won’t regret.

Was advised to use ditto a couple of years back now & have never once been disappointed. - Speedy responses- Friendly & approachable team- Easy to use site. - Great price & service I’d previously used another distribution site and it was nowhere near as easy to navigate round. Everything’s simple and clear & you get 100% royalties!Price for distribution is more than incredible and the services provided, prove that ditto are really here for independent artists & will do everything they can to help.

review_title: I started using Ditto after trialing…
review_content: I started using Ditto after trialing out a lot of other distributors. I must say I’m happy.

Speedy responses to queries, and get's music out there quickly! Also extremely use-friendly in terms of uploading releases. Only wish Traxsource could also be a store, and would be handy if loading a beatport profile could be an added extra for new artists. Otherwise, happy, and hoping that distribution package will allow for more than 5 just artists in future.
Ditto music is amazing!! If you are an artist and want your music on spotify you need to look into ditto NOW! You will not be disppointed.
Amazing. Release my songs on time and answer any queries I have very quckly! Would definitely recommend

review_title: Excellent customer care & a easy to use service
review_content: It’s mostly been a pleasure working with ditto had a few teething problems but these problems were worked out swiftly, their customer services team via both email and twitter are really efficient and has made putting out music on behalf of my artist really easy for me having no experience or knowledge in the music industry.

I wasn’t sure what the experience with Ditto would be like releasing my first single, but I was pleasantly surprised. The video meeting really helped me to nut out my plan and marketing strategy which resulted in a few community radio slots!

review_title: I have been overwhelmed by the amount…
review_content: I have been overwhelmed by the amount of support that I have received from Ditto Music. The Australian team have been so incredibly supportive. After 2 minutes on the phone to them it was clear how knowledgeable & passionate they are. Having worked with other aggregators in the past I can't imagine going anywhere but Ditto for my music.

review_title: Working with Sarah and Rochelle Rocks
review_content: Working with Sarah and Rochelle on our releases has been fantastic. They are a great team and they  are always available to help out. Love the professionalism and friendly nature.Would recommend to anyone.
If you're an independent artist Ditto is a no brainer!!

review_title: Ditto: the easy and reliable distributor
review_content: As a musician, it is important to have the ability to control my income and track streams and sales against marketing release campaigns. Ditto gives me the ability to do the above with ease and via their partnership with Payoneer receive my funds usually within a day or two at the most.Their staff are fast at replies and aren't afraid to answer any questions that arise.

review_title: Ditto has been such a massive help for…
review_content: Ditto has been such a massive help for my band. Tbh I didn't even know I could get my music on itunes and spotify etc this time last year, but now it's all there and it was SO easy and actually really cheap.PLUS they put us on a Spotify playlist too which was really good of them. I just sent them a link and they just did it. Seriously guys thanks so much!! Exciting times!

review_title: Ditto, you make me weep you fkrs
review_content: F these guys, there hasnt been a release that hasn't gone absolutely tits up. their customer service department is basically an automated robot. When they do reply they're super apologetic poor souls, imagine being Robert or Keith stuck in Ditto customer services having to amend constant disasters. As a label, when things dont go to what they promised, even the most casual roles of a distribution services, it is horrible for all involved. Artists, Labels, Agents. I find myself praying to Vishnu that a release will even go live on the date I SELECTED. Imagine any other service. Imagine Mcdonalds giving you a fkin fish filet the tuesday after you ordered a big mac on Uber Eats. Fk DItto, Get better, you guys suck, sort it out. for christs sake

Total rubbish and the worst thing i have done. No emails or any sort of communication is blanked. I cant even get info on how to leave this pile of steaming sxxxt . Trust the reviews and dont use this company...

review_title: They get a 3 from me good job.
review_content: They get a 3 from me.  That is because I did not put anything out with them yet.   But,  calls were returned,   Emails were returned.  If I get stuck on something or have a question they are here for me. I became a member in 2016.  Had no problems. Thank (GOD). I am from Brooklyn Ny and live and have a small  Record label in Raleigh North Carolina.   I will be releasing some of my artist music this year. 2019 will be good.  So far so good.   Thanks Ditto.

I've had money so called sent to me and it was not. Ditto Music steals the money of indie artists. They use a system with Payoneer that does not correctly link your account.  You can submit help tickets until you are blue in the face. But no one will respond. It's been 4 MONTHS. If someone does respond, its someone that can't handle payouts. This company lacks integrity and I urge everyone to stay away. We need to come together and file a civil suit. We are also scheduled to issue a press release concerning their service.

I've distributed through ditto since 2016 and it was easy to do. Even better, i could see the sales data on line and I could see my royalty feed through about three months later.  Now it seems they have decided to concentrate on posting endlessly on Instagram and giving talks to conference audiences whilst their royalty dashboard doesn't work at all and becomes more laughable by the week.Every artist on Spotify knows their streaming performance and the dates they happen but these have now stopped appearing on the Ditto website which is undergoing a redevelopment and has been since September.Any other on line supplier would develop a product off line and then let it go live but not these guys. I am patiently waiting for the streaming money to appear in my account as Ditto tell me nobody has streamed anything of mine for two weeks....oh really?Sort it out Ditto or your loyal users will move on.

I canceled some releases (songs) because I only have royalties paid for streams no downloads so the total subscriptions paid for the songs were much more. Trouble is although ditto took down my releases from most sites, they are still on iTunes which they didn't sell on . What happens if my songs got popular and they started selling? Seems like a total con.
So far so good, music distributed to 160 stores. Easy peasy :)

review_title: I am not to happy I paid  $20 for a…
review_content: I am not to happy I paid  $20 for a music artist to publish his music through me (samuel f.) and they decided to report me as a fraud (even though I have the music artist's permission and sign off with contract/written permission) to do what I am doing.What a bunch of ***** working in music industry shop that provides no phone support and just strictly email. THEY ARE THE SCAM. NOT ME.

review_title: Ditto music make everything easier for…
review_content: Ditto music make everything easier for me! I’m new to music and their service is easy and quick to use! They care about everyone equally and if you have an issue they sort it straight away. Chloe Pitchford

This is a terrible company. They have absolute no moral backbone and they just plain and simple do not care one bit about independent artists. They very very rarely release a record on the correct date, and the customer service which follows is abysmal. Please avoid them and try another platform. They will only cause you stress and anxiety.

If you have not got statements or feel that ditto does not report properly or does illegal activity report it to the FBI. If you purchased some of your own music and it did not appear on royalty statements make a complaint. to IC3 Any company that deals with money and only does business through email is suspect.  They never provide royalty statements from the companies themselves.a victim

What can I say?STAY AWAY FROM DITTO !!They claim to have a 24hr response time. 28 August 2018 was when I last heard from them. it's now 18 October 2018.I've ticketed them everyday, but no response. I've tried Facebook, they've blocked me. I've tried twitter..... nothing.All I wanted to know was, when the takedown would be complete. (I needed to update my songs)Now, I'm asking for a refund and they're ignoring me.I need my money back so I can sell elsewhere. While they're ignoring me, I can't sell my music.Effectively, they're breaking the law with fraud.

review_title: On several occassions I have cancelled…
review_content: On several occassions I have cancelled renewals of releases which they have acknowledged and continued to charge me annually for.

Very very bad experience. Release time never respected (it takes many weeks).Website never working. Unbelievable.Their automated (?) tool always find problem with releases: "corrupt audio files", "Title unaccepted", etc. And then you go back to the beginning waiting during weeks again. For example, they refused an album with continued tracks but with perfect cut (I mean without fade out/fade in... like on ambient album, or on Pink Floyd album...). They even changed an album title name because we had "(" in it and ask to change the artwork (...) --> Because these are forbidden characters guys. Sorry. Well we've decided to go with CD Baby on this album and the release was done the week after... Finally I removed all the release I've put on ditto, I've lost time and money with them.

trash service. stay away from it!!! they ignore sheduled release dates. upload process is full of bugs and 401 errors. sales and stats are hidden because they working on something new... 11 months later still nothing..

review_title: I've had similar experiences to ones…
review_content: I've had similar experiences to ones described in other bad reviews.1. Customer service was slow, failed to reply to the right questions and offered no solutions.2. The sales data and trend reports went down for everyone and my streams were underpaid. I contacted customer services and was given conflicting and inaccurate information. My main questions were left unanswered.3. Shortly after my polite complaint, I received an email from Ditto saying all my music had been taken down. My account seems to have been deleted and I can't get access to any payment of past or future royalties. Ditto claimed Spotify had spotted fraudulent streaming activity, which Spotify have not confirmed their end. What's more, every single track in every single store has been deleted. They have a clause allowing them to keep any artist's money, which they quoted: "8d. We have the right to terminate this Agreement immediately if We believe You are engaging in fraudulent or illegal activity, or following any behaviour deemed by Us as threatening, disrespectful, unprofessional or otherwise carried out by You or any associated parties. Any breach of our terms and conditions by You would result in a non refund of payment." In other words, no evidence required and they can take all your money! My feeling is that Ditto don't like customers that ask the customer support team uncomfortable questions.

review_title: I have already done one review about…
review_content: I have already done one review about Ditto Music, I find it interesting how many fake 5 star reviews are on here from there staff, trying to cover up how crappy their service is Lol. I just don't get it how this company can get away with the crap they pull. As said before I have filed a suit through Canadian Consumer Protection Agency. I am waiting to hear back from them on what my next steps are, it not looking good for Ditto. I wish everyone the best. If we all make a stand and file suits against Ditto, they will no longer have the resources to keep them in business. Spread the word on socials as well!

review_title: Lee Parsons is a terrible crook and a…
review_content: Lee Parsons is a terrible crook and a person working there called Stacey Warder is a complete abusive foul-mouther so-called Customer Advisor. I think it should be closed down. It wouldn't be missed because there are plenty of better companies.

5 stars is a understatement!. Lets take it back a couple years ago when I was recording off a blue bird mic inside a wooden box with some egg cartons I created in my room , and all I thought I needed to do is create music and let the world find it and ill be a success in no time . I learn quick that the music industry doesn't work like that. That if fact you need a team ! and as of one of many independent artist I know that being a independent artist also means wearing a lot of different hats. so with that being said I cant stress how much of a game changer working with DITTO is. It's like having a team with out the expense of one ! just a couple clicks and DITTO dose the importance business part of your music as you work on creating your new track, and I know all this sounds awesome and A good bang your your buck! but it doesn't stop there .DITTO adds the cherry ON TOP!,DITTO also looks out for you with informative articles about the music world and also beneficial services that will kick start your career.  SO to wrap it all up ,if your looking for the right music distribution service then DITTO is for you .You know the the saying . The Best investment is self-investment.   - 7ucas

It's quite simple really. My experience with Ditto has been faultless to a T. Let's face it, most of us here are just little fish swimming round our little fishbowls looking out at the world with our little fishy fins kind of flapping but not really sure where to go or how to get there. :D. Swimming around our little bowls, wondering about the who's, what's where's and how's.  Yeah you've got some music you want people to hear.  Recorded a few covers or written your own songs and have done the best to invest what you have to make as nicer recording of it as possible. It's ready to go and you're searching for the best way to get folks to hear your music. You know some technical stuff and have googled and read reviews and reports on different companies and different products... I know I was there 3 years ago. After careful consideration of all the reviews and reports I found I chose Ditto because it's products suited my requirements at the time. Basically I needed to learn what was going on and get things moving, get invested so I had a vested interest in the world of ONLINE music distribution. I gave my little tail a swish and made the call and from that moment on Ditto stepped up to the plate and everyone involved got to work on my music. I'm just one little fish, one little fish of us many little fishes and they made me feel like a very special little fish. I felt that it was as equally important to them as it was to me for my music to not only be distributed out into the digital world of online shopping but also to presented in the besterest possible way to help attract the eye of folks who would enjoy listening to my music. It's quite simple really, they are professionals at what they do and they do it well. Each step of the way, as daunting as it seemed to me was a breeze for them.. From the generating of social media followers and reaching out to a real online audience to the presentations of promotional posts and music reviews the team was brilliant. Jobs got done and , well results happened. In the first promotional package I used a number of new followers made contact, bought my music online and I even made some great fans um friends I mean fans who are now friends who I still chat with about the music side of life. An invitation or two to go and collaborate with some very cool musos on the other side of the planet.. Seriously, I'm still a little fish because its such a great big ocean out there.. I love making music and having folks enjoying my tunes and I know that if it weren't for the Ditto team being as professional and nurturing and caring and all those good things, then well I'd still be sitting in my little fish bowl flapping my little fishy fins just wondering which way to go. I've given five stars on this recommendation, not because I would recommend this company, but because I do recommend it. For the few sheckles I've invested in the promotional packages, the return has been well above my expectations.

Ditto Music is a fantastic platform that is more hands on than you would expect from an agency who helps MANY artists.  I've been releasing music through Ditto since 2017 and aside from the effortlessly smooth service I've received, they have also given me lots of insightful, and sometimes REQUIRED information that an independent label or artist should have.  I love the grind of the music just as much as the next Creative Engineer; but having the minds that have been in the trenches and still stand on the frontline's of expression, curation, and creativity on YOUR SIDE--- is an Ace in the Hole!
Excellent service and brilliant distribution!!!

As someone who has no idea what they’re doing half the time when it comes to releasing music, Ditto keeps it simple and easy. Support team have always been quick and helpful when ever I have encountered problems and releases come out quickly. Couldn’t fault them. Thanks Ditto for making releasing new music simple!

review_title: Honestly Ditto has given me life.
review_content: Honestly Ditto has given me life..i would aimlessly post music on soundcloud. I did not know that there was an actual larger world out there. I always imagined one day my music would be bought and played on itunes...but never at this point of my journey. like seriously..i have a song on itunes!!!i strongly believed that that sort of opportunity was only afforded to you if you were an A-lister. So as uncle Drake once said "started from the bottom now were here". my music is being bought,streamed and downloaded alongside some of my idols. Using Ditto was so easy and super cost effective. the prices are very fair and all of the advise and info is at your fingertips! You can see that they truely care about independent artists...and really support what we do..ive given 4 stars and not 5 as even though....ditto has been so great...as a dummy and just being clueless about everything...i felt a bit lost on what to do after submitting my songs in stores....and struggled a bit promoting myself because of my confusion....i eventually figured it all out...had to download most of the stores to get the links to my song...took donkeys years...so i think if ditto can help the bit slower people such as myself...in Oprah voice "u get a 5* and u get a 5* and you get a 5*" but Ditto you are a life changer..u have helped me elevate my music and now i can read soo many more people..i truly love your company for that.

review_title: Lost a management client partly to the…
review_content: Lost a management client partly to the bad service. Have seen 3 releases go terribly wrong. No automated troubleshoot, a content team that simply can't troubleshoot. Honestly didn't even directly release through them but through a label and the issues are just too big. It seems they have a service level they want to lose clients with.  Anything the competition does right, they do wrong. I hoping for a resolved situation soon. For now, I am just upset about the terrible service. This has been my worst experience I simply don't understand how they can't use a command-line tool like ffprobe or mdl and give a front-end output if it matches or not.  I am honestly not sure if I would put a PHP sample code here they would be able to implement it.UPDATE:  I had a reply that they couldn't find the release. Not unsurprisingly they weren't able to search their own data. We are now a week away from the original release date. And since I had multiple conversations with the label and saw the Correspondance, I couldn't understand how they couldn't be ashamed.

I like their emails cause they aren’t spam like every other boring business, but actual relevant details to “spice up my life” as once quoted by the “Spice Girls” and their playlists on Spotify are quality jammin juice to my day. The real vitamins I need to sustain my quality dance moves. So thank you Ditto Music. Thank you

review_title: Great and friendly platform to use for…
review_content: Great and friendly platform to use for non advanced web users, easy piece japaneasy
Amazing work. I am trully glad to be a Ditto user. Easy, simple and effective.Best of the best.

Great Work Guys! Very Happy with the Service! Every time i had a problem you were quick to answer and resolve it! The only thing, to me; that you guys could improve is the bug problems on the Website and the Release Dates of the Albums (that are not always respected). Beside that i just have to say Thank You Ditto.

review_title: Ditto Music: The “One Stop Shop” for all your music publishing needs.
review_content: I’ve been releasing music with Ditto Music for the past 3 years and I can’t be happier! My first release was an album and the team were so quick to help me understand all of the tricky stuff (ISRC codes, labelling the tracks correctly) and they really helped the finished product to have a professional sheen.Through Ditto I’ve uploaded videos to VEVO, released singles throughout this year and thanks to the ability to pay for unlimited uploads it’s spurred me on to record and release a new EP by the end of 2018. The team have worked in so many areas of the music industry, their experience and advice is fundamental and I can’t see me going anywhere else any time soon!

review_title: So far the experience has been great
review_content: So far the experience has been great.  I like how we can submit lyrics. The source of information that they have on their blog is pretty resourceful.I don’t like how you have to pay for YouTube service for each song tho. It adds up.

review_title: Ditto has many great oppertunities for…
review_content: Ditto has many great oppertunities for new artist and artist who've already kicked off their career. If the oppertunities are taken advantage of and applied the correct way there's no limit to how far you can go.
amazing services for music marketing, perfect customer care!

review_title: I really recommend Ditto Music, their service is five stars very fast to fix problems and very assertive and a kind staff!
review_content: I really recommend Ditto Music

review_title: Using Ditto music is a no-brainer for…
review_content: Using Ditto music is a no-brainer for an artist like myself, being independent and paying only $19.95 for unlimited distribution is hard to argue with. I know other artists who are of the same opinion too.I've recently taken advantage of the new playlist placements offered as well, which is a nice way to gain some extra traction. I'll be looking into their PR options for my next release.

review_title: So brilliant you can share your music around the world whilst sitting in your pants!
review_content: I have used ditto music on my four releases and would recommend to any aspiring artists out there.  It is extremely easy to use and excellent value for money, best of all you can release a new piece of work across the world whilst sitting in your living room in your pants!

review_title: DITTO MUSIC IS A MUST FOR ANY UP COMING ARTIST
review_content: i am an upcoming artist and needed a distributor to put my music on all the major Digital music platforms but they have done more for e than i could ever ask, they have helped me clim the charts they have helped me get my face on apple music and showed me how to verify my Spotify account, the customer service is excellent, they respond back with the right answer so if you had to pick anyone i would say dittio ive told about 1000 of my friends to join and they think the same y3

review_title: Issues here and there but solid enough (and some feedback!)
review_content: I've used Ditto for a couple of years now with one or two issues, but ultimately they have been solid enough in terms of getting my music to where it needs to go with pretty minimal fuss and cost.A few issues though....- Payoneer are genuinely rubbish. I feel that by abandoning any other form of payment method without telling us customers Ditto have sold us a little short. We now have to pay a third party AND give said third party our personal details in order for them to take money off our hard earned royalties and sales. There doesn't appear to be any continuity between the payment threshold Ditto suggests and Payoneer suggest. I dearly wish they'd not stopped use of the old payment systems of Paypal or BACS. - They used to have a phone number to deal with customer service issues but got rid of it and I wish they hadn't. Coordinating release dates and promo and radio pushes and everything else is tough and sometimes requires urgent resolution of previously unforeseen issues no matter how well you plan things. Having someone on the end of a line wouldn't hurt too much.- I had an issue using one of their promo packages and confusion over US/UK month/day vs day/month detailing. This ultimately lead to me cancelling the service but I received a full refund and their apologies.- The website works fine enough for single track releases but uploading WAV files for album or even EP releases can be a nightmare and last time required me to send the files via WeTransfer to Ditto directly.The one big pro i'd say is the subscription service. I've really liked the capacity to spontaneously release single tracks across online distributors and streaming services throughout the year. Spotify have also been fantastic in terms of dealing with any issues when tracks come their way. Fair play to both.

review_title: Guaranteed Results with great Customer Service
review_content: More results than the value for my Social Media promotions and PR services i got from ditto music. I have had Multiple Music videos released via VEVO account from Ditto Music and they always released the videos on time no matter how busy they were in that period. Great customer service and the most importantly the communication is spot on..Theres always someone to help you with any queries you have via email or phone. Keep up the good work and keep supporting the independent artists.

Gotta say Ditto has been amazing for me. I’ve Never released my own tracks on Spotify before and was chuffed to finally see them on there and have received great help from The people From Ditto.Basically, i put the wrong release date on my EP. I paniced and thought I’d really messed up but when I messaged Ditto they were really nice about it and sorted it straight away.5 stars for you Ditto you deserve it!!

A good friend of mine reccomended Ditto music to me as a way to get my music onto Spotify and i was a little sceptical because they had the cheapest price of all the distrivution companies i had looked at. But she was right to reccomend them as everything was nothing but smooth and easy and now i would also reccommend them

After requesting take down, I have been waiting over 12 months for Ditto to take down several releases.Even though I have re-released songs on another distributor, and on a European record label, they still show my songs on sale with Ditto.I can't get hold of them, so I think It's time I went to one of the UK consumer television programs. Perhaps they will have better luck in contacting them.?DeltiimoLouca Music Records

I never leave reviews, but I’ve been with Ditto for a couple of years. They have gotten to be unbearable as a company. They adjusted their contact info so that you cannot directly reach them, and they changed payout requirements so you can’t even easily get the hard earned money that you have earned. With my last release, Ditto scrambled the tracklist order and while it wasn’t noticed too much, as an artist I was furious because I took the time to craft a tracklist, only for Ditto to mess it up and tell me I would have to pay to remove the album and reupload it if I wanted what I originally paid for. Stick to Tunecore or CDBaby please.

review_title: I've been a customer of Ditto Music for…
review_content: I've been a customer of Ditto Music for the last 6 years and have had a few issues but as they had telephone support they usually resolved these within an acceptable time. However, recently I submitted a track to Ditto Music 14 days prior to the release date. I started promoted the track online and sending it to all local/international radio stations, I spent around £2,000 on facebook adverts and social marketing. 48 Hours prior to release I started wondering why the song had not come up on Amazon or Google Play, a few hours later I had an email from Ditto saying there was an issue with my release. Apparently, you are not allowed any text on the cover artwork! This includes text such as "Music By" / "Vocals By" / "Lyrics By" or even the record label name! I resubmitted the cover and was getting very anxious, the release date had come and gone! My song had been played on multiple radio stations and listeners were waiting to buy it! I frantically I tried to contact Ditto Support but guess what? No Contact Number!! The only way to contact them is via Email and they are not open outside of normal working Hours ( Mon - Fri 9am -5pm ), they also take on average 36 hours to reply to emails. The replies to the emails are poor and you are not told who you are dealing with simply "Kind regards Ditto Music" the staff don't care about your release, they don't care you've spent money on this project. They don't care about your music!! Furthermore up until a few months ago you could transfer funds to your paypal account , this is no longer an option. I have over £150 sitting in my ditto account that I can't access! I've asked them why can I not transfer this into my bank account and why do the funds have a hold on them. They have no idea!!In conclusion don't use this company, they have no telephone support, they don't care about your release! they are impossible to contact, I've sent them 10 twitter messages yet no reply!
Ditto makes it so easy to launch your digital album to all the top stores!

review_title: This is worst choice + my really bad experience
review_content: Worst choice of distribution music on streaming platforms.. Don't believe these 5 stars rating, they are written probably by ditto itself..Let me start with my experience. For first, i waited two and half week for my first release! It was just a single.. one single, didnt even have 2 minutes length.. But ok, let's say this is understandable, they must create profile on every platform and so on... But what happened to mne next got me fxcked up..,I tried to release my first long length project on ditto, got like 7 tracks. I was in rush and needed to release that fast. After two days they postponed my release and said it requires repair.. why? As I saw in many releases on spotify and apple music, name of the artist is mentioned in the name of the tittle like  "PICK IT UP (feat. A$AP Rocky)".. This is basic and really popular thing to do, because featuring artists are just written with small letters under the track and this give them more attention and credit.. But when i did this too, they postponed my records and don't want to release it :)) I sent them plenty of record titles that are made like this, wanted to show them streaming platforms got no problems with this.. no reaction. I was really in rush, so just edited it because of their unnecessary rules.. felt bad for my featuring artist but what else could I do.. and at end of the email they wrote me: "You got 14 days to fix your record to be right, otherwise YOU WILL PAY FOR CHANGES". WHAT?? PAY THE FINE JUST BECAUSE MY RECORD IS LIKE THOUSANDS OF OTHER RECORDS AND NOBODY GOT PROBLEM WITH THAT? If you think that was not enough.. after two days they striked again..Another suspension because:"NO ADDITIONAL TEXT on artwork other than the artist name & release title"You F kidding me??? I just got my favourite outfit on myself and logo of fashion brand "supreme" was seen on the cover.. I was in rush and really hopeless.. THOUSANDS OF RELEASES, especially rap artists is dressed on cover to  Supreme, Gucci, LV... And why they didn't say this after two days already and waited two more days??? I must because of this "rule" made another cover and watch out because of "NO ADDITIONAL TEXT" on the building, on clothes, on the car in the background... Just can't understand how company like this won't release a record just becasue is on the cover written something else than my name and name of the tittle..This is  unacceptable experience, please artists never use this platform.. You can't release your records as you want, as many other records is released.. no. This company got plenty of unnecessary rules and if you did not complete them for 100% you can't do anything

review_title: My experience using Ditto has been…
review_content: My experience using Ditto has been fantastic. There’s a lot of choice out there when it comes to pick a company to distribute your music but after my first year with Ditto I’m happy to renew my subscription plan and give them a positive review. Everything I’ve needed from them has been dealt with quick and professionally and everyone I’ve corresponded with has been friendly and helpful, one time going above & beyond to help me out. Many thanks.

Needed to change distributor so I decided on Ditto because they had a much better price then I was paying before to get my music online and they have been all round amazing. Quickto respond to my questions and did everything I wanted from them. Very, very happy with the Ditto guys, thank you.
Never Pay.Don`t have Pay Pal withdraw - Payonner only.Bad Service. Don`t repeat our mistakes - stay away from them.

I have found Ditto music to be really helpful when I have called upon them. They got back to me very promptly and sorted issues out with artwork and errors that I had made on the release of my EP. I think they could have legitimately declined to help me on these occasions, but they made it very easy and set my mind at rest. I have only been with them for about 3 weeks, but would definitely recommend.
Awful customer service. They are ok initially and they provide a decent service. But when you have to deal with their customer service, they are lazy and unresponsive. Avoid.

review_title: I was initially skeptical of Ditto…
review_content: I was initially skeptical of Ditto Music after seeing some of the reviews left online, but I decided to sign up anyways. I can confidently say that Ditto's customer service has been exceptional. Each of the tickets I submitted were promptly addressed by Adele, (1-2 business days, sometimes sooner) and the Ditto team really helped simplify the process.Overall, in my experience, I would say the teams at Ditto have proven themselves to be reliable and trustworthy, and I would definitely recommend them to any musicians out there looking for a distributor.

review_title: i wish i could give them worser than a…
review_content: i wish i could give them worser than a zero i contacted them email they neverrrrrrrrrrr im sying never got back to me they dont help me with nkthing and i bought they rliab its sad how they do thy clients i cant wait till im through with this company its definely noncaring inconsiderit money taking businesss
A complete scam. I paid them for a service and recieved NOTHING. When I emailed them there was no response and no attempt at trying to contact me and provide service. 200.00 hard lesson to learn.

review_title: Ditto Music made good on their service.
review_content: DITTO MUSIC missed my released date but after I brought it to their attention.  They responded in the same day went to work on rectifying the situation. After a couple of days, I received confirmation.  Any company can make mistakes, I always judge by how their customer service response.  In this instance, Ditto Music demonstrated that they are one of the good ones!

review_title: The worst experience. and still a awaiting promised refund 14 days later!!
review_content: On paper, Ditto was the perfect solution to my needs. But my experience has been nothing but ridiculous.After confirming with Ditto my planned Artist release ( to release multiple artists EP's playing my live show under the banner of a my single plan artist name) i went ahead and purchased the professional subscription package. and created the plan artist.  uploading and scheduling releases for four artists EP's. let the problems begin.The actual release time took far longer than advertised. then i had to speak to about five different people in different departments order to simply get a link to edit my release. it was flagged as a problem as stopped. despite the fact, I had already solved this problem by getting in touch to edit the release. The NIGHTMARE:. all else looked well. however.  Then on the day of the release. The EP's went Live but the name WAS CHANGED! for all releases. ! so the music i was entrusted to produce and distribute, has now been put out in all stores under the wrong name. other artist music released under the wrong name !!  ! this is completely unacceptable. I don't even know how this could happen! it was completely obvious they were by a different artist. I was never notified of a change to my release artist name. or that there was a problem with the name. a name i had confirmed already was fine. Ditto then tried to tell me this was my fault. and that i hadn't created a release artist. even after i provided screenshots of the scheduled releases under the correct plan artist name.  They then claimed again that i had not set this as a my plan artist. when screenshots clearly show this is not the case.i was offered no explanation other than being told to do exactly what i already did in the first place. and incorrectly told serval times that i had not created the plan artist. so basically it was my fault.! even after screenshots prove this nonsense. so frustratedly i had to ask for a refund as I seemed to have no other option. and ditto certainly didn't care about the fact they just botched a release for four different artists. I was promised a refund and told it was being processed 14 days ago now. as of today. still no refund. this is just ridiculous.! i actually wanted nothing but to remain a customer and have the release sorted out. instead. months later. i have no release in stores. and i am still waiting for a refund. everything about my customer service has been impersonal and infective. right down to being told a refund was being proceeded. a complete unacceptable shambles. stay away. !!update: dittomuisc have now escalated my dispute to a claim on PayPal meaning i presume they are trying not to refund me. i hope i can provide the documented evidence to paypal to prove my case.

review_title: alott of hassell most time i want to…
review_content: Alott of hassell most time especialy when  i want to upload my music or take it down or get paid my money!!!Initialy signed up for £59 now they wat me to pay £119 to keep my music up aswell witch is not too upseetting. but the fact i cannot connect my bank to payoneer properly is a problem, Ditto are very Slow to reply , Slow to deal with any requests , slow with questions , slow with payments ,if your even able to recieve them. you could be waiting weeks for your music to come out even though usualy fairly quick could be next day. could be the next week. not very proffesional at all. i have nearly  been dealing with them for a year and have noticed all the flaws and problems every other one star review has given them  on here and there right most of these problems i have encoured  . sorry ditto but will real be trying to get away from your services  soon  i dont know if i would like to renew my subscription when due thats how bad it can be ! not to mention the price doubled i wouldnt even want to  give u the £59 Squid let alone double to do nothing .

Initial experience some five years ago was excellent.  Now I'm trying to withdraw funds accrued.  Nothing happening, no reply to support requests.  What is going on?  Cannot recommend this company under present circumstances.

review_title: CANNOT meet scheduled uploads on time, ruining release plans for artists.
review_content: We (AWAKENING HYPERIA) scheduled a VEVO music video upload yesterday for 17:00 GMT.27 hours later and there is still NO upload and NO response after contacting Ditto many times, during their working hours. It is as if Ditto does not care about their clients. Due to this lack of communication and unprofessional behavior, Ditto have severely compromised our release plan for one of our biggest music videos that we worked tirelessly for. We even PAID Ditto to get this upload done on the right day and right time. We have spent thousands on this video, promotion and ensuring the hype was ready- all to be thrown in the drain because Ditto cannot meet agreements. We have been with Ditto for 2 years, our last two videos were uploaded perfectly- what has happened?We need a reply to sort this ASAP.Regards,J (AH)

Shockingly bad with errors at every possible stage. Took me a year to get a refund and that was only when the M.D. said he’d do it if I kept my mouth shut about their incompetence and remove any mentions online.

They have now changed their subscription plans AGAIN!. This means that they are now charging extra to keep my previous releases on my record label live, despite the fact that I have already paid for these releases with my previous subscription plans.When I questioned customer services about this, they have just ignored me, despite me being a loyal customer for 3 years, and wanting to buy a new subscription for £70 a year.So the most logical thing for me to do in order to keep all my previous releases live is to not use the service again. I do in fact want to pay them £70 a year, but if I do, I will lose previous releases. So I guess the company is doing really well as they are literally turning away money now. Really do not recommend if you want to sell via your own record label due to constantly changing subscriptions and poor customer service.So, Ditto, please look at this and take my money!

Purchased my RLIAB professional and even though it was some time before I got it do to weather and carrier delays, the support team responded in a timely manner and assisted me all the way until I received my package. Great support and Great product

review_title: To say the least Ditto have made…
review_content: To say the least Ditto have made something I thought was impossible, possible. I now own a record label and I’ve been steered in the right direction career wise and am more knowledgeable of the industry I’m in thanks to Jago and all the lovely people from Ditto helping me along my journey in music. I couldn’t be happier and I would 110% recoment Ditto Music to anyone looking to start out in the path. Honestly can’t thank you all enough! Kind regards

Really awful experience with this company.1. website says 24/7 support which isn't the case. Support tickets take generally between 2 & 5 days to get a reply to. They have no phone line so you have no choice but send a ticket to them online and wait for a reply which tends to be half arsed to which you then have to respond to and go through the whole wait again.2. I like many others have experienced a really bad time getting my music released on the day its supposed to. Its constantly raising tickets on the day of a release and chasing and badgering and then eventually you probably get your music released a day or two late which is really really unprofessional.a 5 minute scan of peoples interactions on twitter will show you how many people are having release issues with these guys.their fee structure is good granted but you get what you pay for. its a cheap price but the service you receive is cheap and you end up losing out on music sales because of the way they act, and worse still as an artist or label you look unprofessional for promoting a track release only for it not to be released.I had to chase my beatport release for a week before they finally got it released a week late and then what did they do ? yep they buried it with the original release date meaning my track disapeared behind hundreds of other tracks and automatically became unavailable in the 7 day filter for any weekly shoppers. Essentially the track was never shown as a new release at all.Shambolic service, Once my subscription ends I will be leaving immediately.Honestly find another aggregation service to use paying a bit extra. I regret ever using this company.

review_title: Had a few technical problems uploading…
review_content: Had a few technical problems uploading my video but the great support team replied very quickly and fixed all issues. Will definitely be using them again!

review_title: Owe me money but never reply to my…
review_content: Owe me money but never reply to my messages and never pick up the phone. Can't get paid as their system is broken....Serious fraud office should be contacted....

Never paid my refund. Watch out! Sure its probably my fault, but they are the most inexpensive one so I thought its good for new comer but in order to use their service you need to be well established artist.

The first time I used Ditto Music I was happy with the service. The second time round I've been severely unimpressed. They'd lost the files I uploaded in the first place (this was five years ago, however, they are still displayed as present on my account so how was I to know?) and then accepted payment for a service they categorically couldn't provide. They then didn't inform me and the customer service has been abysmal; my questions are ignored and the ticket has been closed without it being resolved.If you're joining the service for the first time I'm sure it'll go fine. Subsequent reuse is where you are likely to encounter issues. It's the customer service that has dropped far below the standards you would hope to encounter.

Our Independent, Electronic Music Record Label, 'Science Music Records, LLC' sought the advice from a Music Industry attorney before our journey began to become legitimate, although we received sound advice from a lawyer in the music biz, which can be very costly, nothing can compare to what Ditto Music has done for us at such a lower rate than what an attorney has to offer. Starting a new business, corporation or LLC can be very complicated and is not for the uneducated. Ditto Music on the other hand, within a week has established our Record Label with very little assistance from our team. It is unbelievable how fast and professional Ditto Music is as an organization.We recommend Ditto Music for any creator who is interested in either promoting ones works or forming a Record Label, their team made it as easy as 1, 2, 3. We cannot thank you enough Ditto Music team -Science Music Records, LLC -Team

review_title: I worked with Ditto music to get my music on all platforms !
review_content: I worked with Ditto music to get my songs on to spotify.As a young, unexperinced Artist, I was guided through the process for submitting my music! Jayne @ Ditto Music, regularly stayed in contact with myself via email, and answered any of my enquires swiftly ! I experienced one teething problem in regards to Art that i had uploaded as a Track Cover, and Jayne resolved this problem for me within an hour.The process is Stress free and affordable, i would reccomend this too all artists looking to get there music on as many platforms as possible!

review_title: Everything you need, all in one place.
review_content: When first starting out we dont mind saying we didn't know anyone, anything or the best place to start. After being referred by friends in the industry, who found previous success, we put in a call to the guys at Ditto... Ditto had everything we needed to get the ball rolling: starting our label, looking after distribution, paying our artists and making sure everything was done properly and above board. They gave us the confidence we needed, support and direction and would most certainly recommend. Label is going strong, more artists signed and things are looking good!

Excellent personalised service during the set up of my record label.  The team at Ditto couldn't do enough to help at every stage of the process, making everything understandable and comfortable.  Remarkably, their promise to deliver my Record Label In A Box the next day was met (and I live in Portugal!!).  Excellent stuff all round and great value too.  Do business here!

review_title: Ditto is the easiest and most trusting …
review_content: Ditto is the easiest and most trusting site so far. They're extremely thorough, and I couldn't imagine going with someone else. They have extremely fair pricing options, and all around are just a great site to use.

review_title: Me and my business partner bought Label …
review_content: Me and my business partner bought Label in a Box, a lot of promises and they are unable even to pickup a phone call, their website does not work properly (it took us three days to try to upload an album and still nothing, it keeps on glitching), it redirects to sign in page every few clicks, it's impossible to title the tracks properly, a total mess. This is breach of contract. I'm going to release another way and keep track of everything and go for a class action if they dare distrubuting any of our music again. These scammers are killing the music. Shame on this beggars.

review_title: Well here's the story thus far
review_content: Well here's the story thus far, I really just wanted to comment anonymously as this company has responded in a very vindictive ways. I bought each one of their products so I know.1. There customer service couldn't be worse if they outsourced it.2. They're just a distribution company with a little power but don't get involved they can ruin your brand.3. They know they have a little power and act like it.4. They promise the world and deliver on nothing.5. There promotion bundle feels like it's a website that they own  to write a small article about you and big whoop.5. There strategy product is completely avoidable.6. If you've done your own work and promoted your own stuff online they will accuse you of fraud unless you have used their services to achieve that growth.7. Dan and Lee are really pretty cool but you'll never get them. I met them they're friendly but don't expect to meet or speak to them after that first time at a conference. 8. Go to one of the other service providers. I don't think they'll be around for much longer. How can they last with the 1000's of users they claim to have when their services are so poor. 9. I agree with all the other negative comments on here. They take long to put stuff up on the store.10. Do not buy the DJ+ it's just an extra $50 they take for never getting your stuff on beatport. Literally if that's not a scam what is.11. I paid for the $900 record label in a box guess what it's all in the air nothing legal and nothing that is yours just a piece of paper so that they can put your stuff on Beatport but guess what that never happens. What a scam.12. I paid for the social media marketing just to see if they could really help guess what. I spoke to the girl over two emails she sent out standard replies and she offered graphic design.  I asked her to help with the graphic for my logo guess what she said.. 'we don't do that, but I'll ask'... Lol...13. I bought the playlist charter promotion - guess what they kept it up for one day and took it down so I asked them what happened it was the end of the promotion. After explaining what happened over 4 long emails which I didn't have time for guess what they put two of my songs up guess how many listens they got 17 plays in 4 months.  I think they have a real playlist that gets a lot of listeners and one that just shuts people up. w14. What a fraud, they are borderline illegal activity but guess what who's gonna audit them. You can sign up but be forewarned you are walking on eggshells because they don't need you as much as you need them.15. That record company in a box needs to be investigated for the circumventing UK laws. How can a company make you a company how to they have that right to allocate company status from the Uk to someone in Japan? Fraud.16. I had money that I made from streams and they just claimed it was illegal streams they haven't explained they just take your money. I contacted spotify guess what they say 'we don't know what's going on' ask ditto. Spotify doesn't need this extra bad publicity now we have the distributor not paying out the artist. Absolutely ridiculous.

Pretty crappy, I have problems with them constantly. Sometimes its a glitch, sometimes it's making me pay unnecessary money, sometimes I don't even know what the problem is! It would be 1 star, but they usually get the problem fixed and respond fast.

where do I start?Problem after problem. long story short.- website always redirects me to sign in when I click on something. I'd be on final stages of confirming a release then get sent all the way back.- Music is never released on actual day it says it will be making us look very bad as a label, this has happened numerous times.- Helpdesk is useless, ages to reply and never actually fixes a problem (I have had one helpful one called Stacey she's been very helpful)- when I want todo a new release says forbidden until the 20th try. - always getting error messages - Only reason why I'm still with ditto is because I bought the year sub.- I could go on and on.

review_title: Cheating Artist of they sales Wrong price?? No Sales Report Data???
review_content: Cheating Artist of they salesWrong price?? No Sales Report Data??? I had my single released selected my rate and currency my music was uploaded in the correct price then after a month my single selling price increased with out prior notification then when I tried to login the website to check and track sales there was no data even after seven months of selling my data had been removed. Something is going on with this service provider.
Always excellent customer service. They are always quick to reply to any questions. I'd would always recommend them.
Really happy with Ditto. Great service and people and really cheap prices for what you get. Would definitely recommend!

review_title: broken website - poor service / no response after multiple tickets …??
review_content: no response after multiple tickets emails, no phone number to call (was removed from website) and the website is broken with coding errors appearing during attempting to take down music, something major is up with this company - perhaps they're in bankruptcy or something as this is a no go situation STAY AWAY :)

I have nothing but kind things to say about Ditto. The level of care and consideration i've received in this short time i've worked with them is unlike anything from the horror stories fellow artists have told me they've experienced with tunecore & Awal namely. I was pleasantly suprised with how smooth the process of releasing a song and creating my spotify account was, which I no doubt have to praise  Mr Joe Mason for. I feel like they are really on my side and have my best interests at heart which as an Independent artist is a blessing. I would definitely recommend them.

review_title: Worked with them on many projects and …
review_content: Worked with them on many projects and have had nothing but great service! Morgan has solved many of my questions and does an amazing job of replying with a quick turnaround.

review_title: DITTO PR and Social Media Campaign.
review_content: Our PR and Social Media campaign was straight forward, run by extremely helpful and extremely competent staff and we had great results. I'd give DITTO 10/10 without hesitation. DITTO did the business for my band and i would recommend them to anyone and everyone. Scott/WAY UP

review_title: FIVE STARS FOR MAYA BATTLE THREE FOR DITTO
review_content: I would like to give a big fat five star review to Maya Battle and her promo team!!! - Maya is an excellent project manager. She is full of: great, fresh promo ideas, know her stuff and always looking for ways to better the campaign! she is calm and collected, result oriented and very driven. Maya have a great command on the project and her team excute well!  While Ditto have LOTS to improve on with their service(communication between their departments, turn around times, making sure you get the service you have ordered general support etc), they are VERY lucky to have Maya on their team.

review_title: Take The Time To Read This Unbiased Review...
review_content: I don't even know where to start with how diabolical this company is and I really don't know how they are still operating.We've had nothing but trouble with every single release we tried to push out through them. Things ranging from placing a release for a jazz artists where we specified "Jazz" genre and it being push out under "Rock & Metal" to pricing being total different to what we set and it not even appearing on some outlets.Let's summarise problems you will probably get when using Ditto...SupportOk so you used to be able to call them up... Oh No Not Any More! Now you have to fill out an online ticketing system to submit a support request. It says you will be responded to within 48 hours. Want to know how long it took us to get a response? 1 WEEK!!!!...and do you know how we got that response?
