I have found their assistance invaluable to me, my team, and the artists we work for.Not only do I find their advice is top notch, but they are quick to respond to any issues we have with our service. We deal with the Melbourne office exclusively, and the team are *the best*.Plus, whenever we go in for a meeting, they have bagels.
The platform is easy to use and avoids jargon for the newcomer. Support is timely and effective. Highly recommended.

review_title: Wonderful to work with - extremely respectful
review_content: I spend some time last year chatting with some of the team at Ditto. Not only did they actually take the time of day to research my music but where honest enough to go through the various options involved with releasing our music. We didn't end up working together and I think this speaks of their genuine care for music and musicians!
Ditto is easy to use, cheaper than the rest and they have an office near my house! Excellent for independent artists and record labels.

Having used other aggregators before, I was hesitant to change over to ditto. But with the one payment and the super easy to navigate interface I was sold. I cannot wait to explore more opportunities that they offer!

review_title: Happy to be with Ditto Music
review_content: I've been extremely happy to have my music distributed online with Ditto Music.  I'm convinced that Ditto Music are the best in the industry.  They're customer service is terrific.

Since applying Dittos services we have seen continual support and grown in our brand and our music. Support at your fingertips friendly experts who  step you through the day to day requirements to help you "Make It" the the rough and tumble of the entertainment industry "Highly recommended"

Been with Ditto for about six months now. Really enjoyed their product range, although several features have been "coming soon" for the duration of my time with them. Overall they are excellent to go with and I wholeheartedly recommend them for digital distribution.

Great company, everything is straightforward, site easy to understand and very helpful staff on the phone. Been using Ditto services since 2012 and would recommend them to anybody out there.AJCCarreira Records

review_title: Ditto Music are an innovative opportunous platform
review_content: Ditto Music are an innovative opportunous platform.  They are consistent with keeping the people that support them up to date with huge events and opportunities for creators.  The likes of distribution, festival events and Record Label in a box shows that they want to provide a substantial amount for people like myself and you do to great things.   For those that don't know about Ditto, and are in the music industry, get to know, because you'll have great opportunities awaiting you.
I haven't signed up yet, but it seems pretty cool

I came across Ditto Music through internet, and they looked quite promising. Thus I submitted one of my tracks through them. The process was simple and best of all, not time consuming.My track is distributed. Lets see how that goes.

review_title: One of the best solutions out there.
review_content: I have to say...Ditto Music provides any artist with the best stores and customer service around.
Very good tools for the independant/major artist

review_title: I've been waiting to put my music out for years and Ditto gave me the confidence to do so!
review_content: I've always worried about my music not being distributed safely without having to worry about copyright and legal issues and Ditto has taken care of those worries, and distributed my music to more companies than I ever thought my music would ever expand to! Thanks Ditto!!

Very nice company, everything delivered impeccably except my artist name which is being butchered all over shazam, itunes and spotify.My artist name is 'Nix K', and on itunes it's Nix & K as well on shazam, and on spotify it's nixk.
As an independent artist I'm impressed by the options available to support independent releases and the reasonable prices for distribution.  Nailed It!!!

Ditto is one of the most loyal and exceptional distribution companies out there period ,hands down they will work with you to make sure everything is right, and your music gets to where it needs to be

Competitors to Ditto Music eat some of our catalog artist earnings up in fees. As a label we work with a variety of bands and new acts have a lot of difficulty earning more charges with other distributors. Ditto allows us to net more in earnings with a simple unlimited release solution to all major retailers. Many labels like us paid thousands in the past before this,  Look forward to know what stores get added on in the future. Easy UI

It took time to get them to do what's best for my company not what's best for them. LLC is taking longer than advertise . I can't get into my account at all. You can't reach them by phone which is frustrating.
Ditto Music provides artist with everything that they need from music distribution to social media promotion to PR. A true one stop shop for independent artists and record labels.
Much needed product however the following; Customer service, disbursement policies and metrics leave much to be desired.

Ditto were upfront about costs and what they would do for each level of investment on my behalf, so I knew exactly what I was signing up to! My album (Material Electrico) appeared on Spotify, Amazon and iTunes without my having to lift a finger, but they were a couple of days late in doing so (missed their own deadline!) hence only a four star rating. Otherwise, pretty much perfect.
Ditto have always been brilliant, even since the early days. Independent distribution is where people care about what you're doing.

review_title: Ditto Music is must have tool for the Independent Artist or Publisher
review_content: You want your sound to be quality right? So do I. With Ditto Music's extensive range of services and professional help, it's easy to feel good about what ends up in the final product. You get to focus on the art and let the professional handle the details without ever signing away your right to royalties. It's your art, you own it Ditto will make sure that your art is given its fair chance in the world The rest is all up to you!
Can recommend

This is a wonderful resource for anyone on the rise and serious about the music business. From distribution to artwork to promotion they have tools and advice to help you on your journey. There are a lot of services out there I have used and none stand out the way you guys do. I'll recommend the services to anyone serious about making a mark in the music business!

review_title: I made real money from my music for the first time using Ditto!
review_content: A friend recommended Ditto to me when I mentioned I was going to self-release my new single. The whole process was remarkably simple and efficient. I set a release date and everything went to the relevant streaming services and download sites at the right time. What I hadn't anticipated was that Ditto would help me make real money from my single, I made several times my £79 investment back and even covered the cost of making my single through revenue from the platforms that Ditto distributed my music to. None of this was down to any other means of promotion. In a time when there is more and more resistance to the idea that indie artists can make a living from music this has really given me a lot of faith. Thanks so much to Ditto, I have been recommending you to all my artist friends!

After many years in and out of the music industry and working with countless distribution companies (so called label services) every single one has either charged silly amounts or just been a let down,then I discovered Ditto I really can't recommend them high enough,after spending years with over priced so called industry main staya,Ditto has brought a whole new side to the game of value for money and service which no one else can provide The choice is simple Ditto is the way forward

I was releasing my debut EP through Ditto. They have a good system and dedicated team which was great. I had a few queries about my release and they answered them really quickly and resolved all issues. Great service and I'll be using Ditto for my next release for certain!

review_title: I have developed a lot of information about becoming a independent artist
review_content: I have got a lot of info about the music business and also the independent side of music if that's where you're trying to go. I would recommend this website for any upincoming musician

review_title: The best that I've come across 😎
review_content: Ditto has made it very easy for me to content from myself and others that I offer distribution to. I can't think of any other company that offers what Ditto offers.

Great company with loads of incentives, have really helped me out over the years, thank you.I wouldn't choose another company to deal with my music, they have helped me loads whilst I have been apart of ditto and allowed me to achieve music that has hit the top 20 in the charts in iTunes (hip hop)Very greatful 🙏🏽VITAL

review_title: Easy, quick and clear. A winner.
review_content: I have released a single with the Chartbreaker  package & found the whole experience easy and cheap. I had one question that was answered quickly. It takes the ball ache of of releasing your music as an independent. Viva la revolution.

review_title: ditto music gave me the opportunity to work at my dream
review_content: They understand the needs of an artist and have provided the necessary tools for success to be possible
Simply the best
They halp emed me with chicken

We have released 2 Christmas singles via Ditto over the last 2 years and disappointed at how long it takes to get sales figures through. We also had problems getting payment through with the first release and paid for extra services which took an age to implement. The most recent release we paid for UK chart registration and it doesn't even show if it is in progress let alone completed and it was released in December.Some more support from the team would be appreciated and better response times.

review_title: One of the numerous digital music distributor, but still the best.
review_content: I use Ditto Music since August 2015, first in combinaison of cdbaby.Ditto offer me such a profesionnal ear that, there is more than one year i've started to pubish mainly all my releases on DITTO MUSIC.There is a real team, listening, and aswering any e-mail.All issue become quickly a response and a solution.So if you consider on digitally distribute your music, dont think twice an try ditto, for sure you will be happy.Laurent aka The Funktronics

I've been treated nothing less than equal to my compadre's that are in higher positions than me within this industry, especially from Jayne Crother and James Walsh, their services are nothing short from amazing with a unique and warming etiquette.
I think the whole process is great. Much easier than CD Baby

review_title: IMPORTANT!!! Do not trust this worthless company!
review_content: Ditto Music are stealing royalties from artists. I have seen receipts from friends who have bought my music in different countries, proving that I have made sales. Ditto music have not paid me even years after these sales were made. I have even seen sales data from France disappear from my dashboard and I know of 4 other artists who have also had this happen to them.As for high number of 5 star ratings, the majority of them are fake reviews written either by people who work for ditto music or by their friends. I know for a fact that most of these reviews are not genuine and if a company feels the need to gain fake reviews, then there is obviously a problem.

We released our latest single through Ditto - fabulous service with no hitches, the song went up internationally at the set time. Will definitely use again.We also bought a discounted PR and Social Media Package - which was pretty good. The social team tripled our Instagram following! Although the press release didn't seem very well put together. I had filled out the questionnaire sent with the impression they would rephrase my answers to write the release, but it was just a patchwork of casual statements I had made. I felt like I could have done a better job structuring/rewriting my answers myself. Additionally, they sent us notification of a placement that we secured ourselves as if it was due to their efforts.My overall experience of the company has been of a high quality, professional standard, I only wouldn't pay for their PR services again.

review_title: Team work makes the dream work!
review_content: The Ditto team are efficient, professional and have fantastic communication skills. Having worked with them for a number of years with numerous mutual clients, I know I can rely on them to do things quickly meaning that I can get to work without any hold ups. They are always great to be on a team with and we at Ten Letter are lucky to work with James, Jayne and Ben regularly.

Everything flowed smooth like water with Ditto. I used Ditto to set up my record label and used them to release my first single. Unfortunately, my single did not reach the stores on time and it compromised my campaign. This was resolved in a quick manner however, once my single was released to stores, the company name was the featured artist name instead of the record labels name which is a very important factor and the genre it is listed under is completely wrong. Several days later, I am still waiting on a response as I type this review. Nevertheless, I still believe Ditto has the potential to become a greater company in the future.
Great service. Exceptional communication. Intelligent people. Always go above and beyond. Love working with Ditto. Highly recommend.

review_title: I got on Itunes and SPotify with less hassle than all the other similar services
review_content: clear and simple I got on Itunes and SPotify with less hassle than all the other similar services
I really LOVE this product, been waiting to start my own label and it allowed me to that and a lot more

review_title: Ditto is the best in distribution
review_content: Comparing ditto to the others, There is no way the other industries Will be like ditto at least for a long time Ditto has the right people in its organization
Wether you're a hobbiest or proffesional, Ditto has a service perfect for you. Getting exposure, compensation, and fans for your craft has never been easier! 10/10
Straight forward,black and white,upload it -distribute it. LAF 11/2016
Ur services r so accesible n nt complicated
Great company, I Love them, x

review_title: Easy to use, beautiful layout, amazing concept...great platform.
review_content: Easy to use, beautiful layout, amazing concept...great platform. thank you guys. Have recommended to other artists and will continue to do so. Absolutely love what ditto music is doing.

When you find a distribution company that answer calls with happiness in their voice, actually concern themselves with your question and want to see the best for your tunes, you know you've found a home for your music!
Hi, i'am HILGAS a GermanProducer/DJ.Which websites (URLs) I should best name as Dubstep Producer & DJ for the Twitter account verification form ?Twitter.com - @HILGASdj
I found the service affordable and was able to access services I needed with ease

review_title: Great service, but customer service was a little difficult
review_content: I've used Ditto for all of my releases, and always found it easy to use and cheaper than other platforms.  However, I had a little confusion a while ago with early bird releases for pre-orders and getting their customer service to explain the issue to me was a little difficult.  They sort of said we can't really fix the problem, so you'll have to make do with it.  Which, I wasn't all that happy about, however, they've always been great in every other aspect, and everything with that one exception has always ran smoothly and flawlessly, so I would definitely recommend them.

Most distribution companies are packed with promise makersDo you realize the precious time these distributors wasted?Institutionalizing weekly delays only multiplies our troublesWait till the wrong track is viral, and our problem doubles!But not with Ditto, their staff are relentless, obsessed? Yes!No matter your troubles they would never consider lessThan diligently tackling all your issues and cares,While at the same time on the phone hawking your wares! In summission you could send your music to countless corporations,True that in the end the difference may be hard to compare oneAgainst the other, but to aid in your musical liberationJust hand your music over to the brothers named Parson... *mic drop*
Really good team to work with. They make time consuming aspects of the music industry very easy. Also cost effective.
Somewhat difficult to browse the site at first but did learn it with effort.

review_title: Best online distro company I've worked with!

review_content: I give 4 stars as evaluation.I have not yet released any songs through dittomusic but despite this, both for the newsletter that constantly updated even non-paying users, for both quality and trust who demonstrate our products.First of all the "Record Label in a Box", which will probably become my first direct experience with investment ditto.Do not wait to be able to add the missing star to my rating!

review_title: With Ditto, releasing, distributing and promoting music is made incredibly easy.
review_content: Ditto's service in supporting music acts with release, distribution and promotion could not be better. The team are efficient, friendly and supportive and they are always coming up with new ideas and opportunities. The service is extremely good value and I have no reservations in recommending Ditto to any musicians/bands.
It was a great experience to know that my music had finally gotten into the right hands.I can't thank these guys at Ditto Music enough for their great service.
They helped get me on itunes so fast! Its reliable and the customer service is amazing! I recommend this site to any up and coming artist because this give you 100% of your profit.
I have been dealing with other distributors but i didn't the results which i got from ditto i love you guys keep going and thanks for everything cheers!CM Records
I think its cool ;)

review_title: Always thrilled with the service from Ditto
review_content: The service we receive from ditto is outstanding. The staff are easy to reach with any queries, and dealt with very knowledgeably. The creative team and distribution staff are amazing. Highly highly recommend.

Ditto is a strong brand going places but, like the hit parade, its after-care service can be Hit or Miss – a number 1 or a miserable failure. The company is motivated and is outgrowing its competitors yearly, yet (from my own experience) I still had issues with simple tasks such as invoicing and after sales care. Their updated website is functional and easy to navigate, with no irritating pop-ups. All in all a company I will recommend to any aspiring musician or band. However, I would hold back from recommending this company in its present format to any artiste who has already experienced the service a major, established label can offer. Ditto - 4 Star rising

review_title: Madd Love for Ditto & Ditto DJ!!!
review_content: I am in a music biz class and I rave all day about Ditto & DittoDJ. Almost always people come back to me and thank me for leading them in the right direction. Hands down Ditto is the key! The have looked at all aspects of distribution and simplified the process for everyone, from the label to the artist.

I've been with ditto music since 2013 and the quality of the service just gets better and better. They are always introducing new ways for me to sell my music and are very helpful on The phones. Thanks ditto!

I start using ditto about a month ago and these guys are amazing I had some question/problems and I told them the customer support they solved it right away. I think prices are really good its better than all the other websites doing this service. Good analytics! you can keep track of your track sales and streams. If you are readings this my friend and if you are curious about which website you should choose, choose this one bro.

Ditto is seemingly small in comparison to what other's would consider a market for large corporations. The music that they help distribute is made up of every genre you can think of, from Ed Sheeran to Local Natives to Lil B. They do an awesome job of promoting their brand as well. Ditto creates all kinds of playlists to promote their artists via Spotify. They are also involved with Apple Music/iTunes and distributing their artists' music so that they are openly available for anyone to find.I have seen many of their employees working extensively to get their name out to anyone who will listen, from passing out buttons and pins to following their listeners on social media.

review_title: Amazing service, customer support was speedy and helpful!
review_content: I purchased the Ditto Plus subscription back in June of 2015, and never have been any more happy! Quick, easy, and powerful for serious independent artists who don't need a record label! All of the negative reviews I've seen so far are temporary problems blown WAY out of proportion or just plain lies with no sources of proof to their claims. I highly recommend any artist Ditto. If you don't believe me, just look at their successes and story.

So I signed up to the unlimited release option with Ditto last week, I then came across some bad review after signing up and was really nervous.  However having just released my first single the service has been incredible.  Customer service got back to me immediately, the price you are paying for the service is truly second to none.  I have no idea why anyone wouldn't recommend them.  For a great service, incredible price and brilliant customer service I would always choose ditto.
ditto scam company stay away from this company, they will skip your release date they will mess up your campaign and never refund you, i do not recommend them at all.

I've been a customer of Ditto for a year now. It's been obvious through that whole time that they are always willing to go the extra mile for their customers and have an in depth knowledge of their industry. I've not had any issue with distribution through Ditto and their service is spot on. I think the longest I've ever had to wait for a reply on anything is 48 hours and the replies I do get are always, detailed, pleasant and usually very insightful on the subject. It's my pleasure to give them a 5 star review. I can honestly say over the past year they've earnt an extra one on their record from me!

Ditto Music is a company filled with talented-amazing staff members who produce creative ideas and has excellent knowledge about the music industry, including social media outlets. Since it was my first time having a company promote my music, Ditto Music offered an amazing experience and amazing results.

When I was looking for distribution I found Ditto Music through a friend and their services sounded great. In reality, they're even better than great! I have been so looked after by the Melbourne office and even worldwide when I was temporarily working overseas. Their added services really take the guesswork out of releasing music. I had never spent money on publicity before but Ditto had a great package I could afford as an independent artist and I saw amazing results! My first release with them made it to the front page of Vevo AU, was played on Rage ABC, premiered via Tone Deaf and achieved Nation wide blog coverage. They just keep getting better and better - Thanks Ditto

I'm at Ditto music since the end of february 2015. It took them 4 to 6 weeks to put on iTunes, Amazon, etc the albums I wanted to sell. Fine. The main problem I had with them is : they don't pay. They're not honest. I have several friends and close fans who told me they actually bought my albums (and showed me the bills) but Ditto always showed stats that say that my music was sold song by song. I complained without success. I tried to buy my own albums to see if it would work : only 2 on the 4 albums I put online appeared on the stats. And still no answers from Ditto about that issue. Which you can call stealing money. Even worse, yesterday, I tried to log in... and I had this message : "the request had been black-holed. Error : the request adress/ contact was not found on this server". If someone from Ditto music can contact me. My music is Amazon Zero, Claudie Pero and Claude Perraudin. You'll find my email if you're well organized. I'm still ok to solve this peacefully. But quick.

review_title: An outstanding business and great group of people.
review_content: I found Ditto Music and they have my business for life. I live in Phoenix,AZ and was having a very hard time with my project. Ditto Music came to the rescue with great customer service and the services that I needed. I recommend Ditto Music to all aspiring and top artists.

Dittomusic's attitude and conduct is terrible. Their response is fast when it involves transferring funds to them. However, when it comes to transferring funds to the customer and general inquiries, their response is slow and downright rude at times. They will reply with ridiculous excuses for their unprofessional behaviour when they have already shown that they can respond promptly. Their response is selective I.e. When a customer intends to transfer funds to them. At the moment, they have promised me to refund an incorrect charge directly on my credit card within 5 to 7 business days. Over 15 business days have passed and I have yet to receive a reply to my email. Dittomusic used to have a good reputation. However, over the past 3 years a lot of labels and artists as week as reviewed have reported poor conduct and dishonesty. Maybe they grew too fast and couldn't handle it or got greedy, I don't know exactly what but they don't seem to be very open either. At this rate, they will have setup heir own failure. Stay away from Dittomusic.Regarding royalties and Dittomusic's claim on how they don't keep royalties illegitimately. - They also claim to be unable to payput sales from unlicensed remixes (which is fair), however, they take no initiative or show any intention in redirecting sales originating from those remixes to the original copyright holder - it's a double standard. They have withheld sales from unlicensed remixes. Don't take my word for it if you wish - research for proof.

review_title: Ditto PR and social media campaign review
review_content: What I really appreciated about Ditto, was their honesty in what they would be able to provide from the very beginning. There were no lofty promises, just a realistic idea of what they can do, what will happen throughout the campaign, and these were all met.I also found their support to be constant, and they were easy to discuss ideas with and go back and forth on certain things with.They were clear, professional and clearly huge music lovers and passionate about what they do.5 stars.

Artist Lucy Neville. I am a new artist with my first EP released in September 2015. As you would be aware, it is very difficult to gain traction with one's music in a very crowded marketplace. Ditto has achieved enormous exposure for my music. I have had great press in the UK/USA and Australia. The Melbourne office has coordinated our campaign. Their advice regarding public relations/music release strategy as well as social media, has been excellent. The office has always been very approachable. It felt like I was working with family.Initially I had a look at all the other providers. Ditto is established enough to have the experience to make a difference but not too big where you are just another artist in a large pool of artists.In summary I would strongly recommend Ditto.

review_title: Do not trust them with your release please
review_content: Ditto music are awful. I used them to release my video on vevo. The first time they messed up. Released it on early, made excuses, blamed me. I was accused to lying. To make it worse, they then took the video down but didn't put it up at the correct release date. This was their fault not vevo. It is clear they have no control or even care enough to get things right for their clients! In my stupidity I used them the second time hoping that if I explained what happened the first time they would do everything they can to make sure it didn't repeat itself. They did not. They did not release my video at the promised date and time. This cost me fans, it cost me a lot of tears and heartache especially not being able to reach them to rectify it. My fans tried to use the link in the messages pre-scheduled to them and it didn't work! On top of this, they couldn't get it sorted and kept making excuses. The story still gets worse believe it or not because they allowed vevo to load a 25second video for what was supposed to be 4mins. I told them to take this off asap- they promised vevo would. They should double check that they did considering everything that has happened. Here I am still in the middle of this mess. Believe it or not. I have only had excuses and no solution. They do not care. They have left information such as a question to them as it is uploaded to my vevo profile. They have no expertise. They do not care about artists. Please if you are an independent artist reading this. Do not trust them with anything important. I have cried so much because I have felt helpless and let down. They ruined what was supposed to a big stepping stone in my growing music career. I just need to make sure no one else is hurt by them. I never ever write bad reviews. I think let things go but this time on a mission to make sure what has happened and is happening to me doesn't happen to anyone else. It's hard enough being an independent artist trying to get heard. We don't need this. We don't Unacceptable.

review_title: Great digital service for any project - big or small!
review_content: I am happy I've chosen DITTO among other digital companies (and I made my research!) to run the campaign for the release of my debut single. DITTO has a very enthusiastic, creative, professional and dynamic team, that gave me the feeling of being taken care of like I'm a part of a big label. No matter how big or small is your project - your business is treated with all seriousness and is given the best possible chance to succeed. We achieved great results with Strawberries campaign, and surely I'll be coming back for the album release.

Ditto has been a great partner in our release marketing plan.  They have brought valuable ideas to the table and executed without skipping a beat.  Honestly, hard to keep up with the team, as there are so detail and schedule oriented.  Very happy with my experience and would recommend to others!

review_title: Made everything so easy and our music accessible across all the major digital platforms
review_content: Ditto made everything easy for us to release our music digitally, and to the areas in which we wanted to distribute in. They also expressed enjoyment of our music, which made us feel comfortable and confident in our choice to distribute through them, and felt good about them championing our music to the different platforms. We would highly recommend and we're looking forward to working with them again on our next release.

review_title: Great company with amazing services for emerging artists
review_content: Great company with amazing services for emerging artists and independent labels.

review_title: Very happy with Ditto's service so far
review_content: Some of our students at school composed a song and recorded it recently. When we heard the quality of the recording we thought it would be a good idea to release it as a single but we were not sure how to proceed. Eventually we were recommended to Ditto Music. Both Claire and Dominic at the company have been quick to respond to our enquiries and they have been most helpful no matter how mundane our questions might have seemed! This has given our students a great introduction to the music world.
Fr Andrew

review_title: Great Service and it works at Ditto
review_content: Helped us launch our music and gain a good base of fans pretty quickly.  Helpful and effective team members to get what we needed done.  Thanks guys!
This company is at the cusp of what is going on in the music industry today. In my mind there would be no one else I would use. Hands down I had a great experience.

Ditto Music is an absolute pleasure to work with. Their staff is courteous, professional and capable. They communicate clearly, effectively, honestly and thoroughly. We were thrilled with the increased exposure our band received as a result of working with Ditto and highly recommend them.
Had the best time working with Ditto! Awesome company and works with what my needs are. Highly recommend working with them. They definitely know the business and how to get you were you want to be!

review_title: Andy Is Incredible In His Service
review_content: Andy Tomlinson is an incredible customer representative that has gone above and beyond the call of duty to fulfill my needs and the needs of the artists I represent. As a fellow marketing professional, I believe Andy has the qualities of an incredible salesman and potentially even better marketing administrator.  As for Ditto as a whole, I find their service helpful in distributing my artists.
Andy, worked really hard with us, and he's a stellar dude. He does solid work and you won't regret working with ditto.

review_title: Excellent customer service, fast response and great communication.
review_content: We had a problem with some content that we had uploaded to Ditto Music for release on various music sites. An email, enquiring why the content hadn't been released was answered almost immediately, and the issues were sorted out quickly and effectively, with helpful advice and wonderful communication at every step, keeping us informed of progress.  Great work by Rudi, James and the team at Ditto!!
Needed a quick turnaround on my EP's digital distro and Andy got up in 24 hours. Needless to say I won't be using anyone other than Ditto for any of my future distribution needs.

We've been using Ditto for a number of years now and have always found them to be efficient and reliable. The support they offer is excellent, and the response from their customer service is swift and professional. We look forward to working with them on many more releases for years to come. Jeff Thompson (Bare Noise Records)

Ditto Music is a top of the line digital distro service. I've utilised Ditto on a number of releases for myself as a solo independent artist as well as employing their label services. They always operate in a professional and timely manner and have never hesitated to help me out should any issues arise. They provide great tools for independent musicians and artists to deliver music to online stores and publicise themselves. More than happy to continue to use their services as long time customer.

We have had the pleasure of Partnering with Ditto several times over the past years. I have never come across such a Dedicated, Hardworking, Caring and  Conscientious Team of people. Working around the clock to provide the best 24hr Service to all their clients. Continuously striving for improvements on every level. Keep up the good work guys!!

review_title: A great friendly well rounded company
review_content: I see a lot of positive reviews on social media regarding Ditto Music, and i'm 100% going to use them in terms of distribution of my songs/music, they have a positive energy about them, and seem to love the music as well as the artists!

review_title: Top service, best value, best PEOPLE.
review_content: I've released 1 album and 2 singles through my own label created with Ditto, and they have been genuinely amazing every step of the way.  Having never self-released before, I was initially apprehensive about how to get my music out there, but after reviewing the fine print on all the various sites, Ditto stood out as the best at understanding what an artist needs - largely, I feel, because they have also been in the same position - they're not like some of the vultures out there in the shifting landscape of the music industry who've never played a note in their lives but will promise you anything and deliver nothing.  I've been with Ditto 2.5 years, and in that time the platform (which was already great) has been upgraded and improved, and I have always felt that if I *did* have a question it was responded to pretty much immediately (usually within a couple of hours). Every member of the team has been SO genuinely nice to talk to, so you actually feel like they're on your team (which is fabulous, being an independent) and moreover, they are actually FUN to interact with, so it doesn't feel like a chore, or like you have a stupid question, or that they're just there for a cash grab and then disappear (I've heard many a rumour of other services who do just that).  Customer service aside, I've received excellent service for really reasonable fees that did exactly as promised, and additionally, SO many bonuses - from free e-books on strategy for releasing and charting, to gig opportunities, to RT's of my release on social media (cmon babe, they MATTER in this new music industry). I truly think you're doing the smart thing to check out reviews to decide which option is best for you - it's your music, but I'VE got my next singles and EP's lined up to go out through Ditto - I couldn't imagine why anyone would use another service. Xx

Ditto remain the best company around for independent distribution. Doing/ done my new single with them 'Sketchman - Paramount Ft. Chloe Ray'. The service includes many outlets, pre-order (on iTunes now), chart registration and set up a short code (text PARAMOUNT to 85888) all within a reasonable budget. They are also soon to handle my VEVO channel for the music video, and most recently have given me a free upgrade to Apple Music!

I'm a 'bucket list' musician who, until six weeks ago, didn't have a clue how to start putting my music online. I did a bit of research and liked how Ditto seemed to work - so I phoned them. I got a human who was really helpful, knowledgeable and gave me some great pointers. I also had some problems with my submitted artwork. Again Ditto dealt with it quickly and clearly by email. Fantastic. If you just want to put yourself 'out there' for the hell of it, use Ditto! I can personally highly recommend them!
Brilliant facility, easy website, fast uploads, the customer service is super prompt - I love it!
A big thank you to the Ditto team, especially Claire who processed my upload very quickly and answered all questions in a polite and courteous manner.

Real people, with a passion for the Melbourne music scene and beyond. Over my 4-5 month campaign with Ditto, my single & music clip made it's way to the front page of the Vevo.com, Tonedeaf, Rage, and now MTV. I can't thanks these guys enough.  -Chris Watts

I have had great experiences with Ditto. Very flexible, very hard working, and aimed at building a unique campaign and experience that works for you. Whatever your project may be. I am very demanding, and had a particularly unusual project. But they were very efficient and dedicated to making it as successful as possible. I would recommend to anyone.

I truly agree that Team behind this company are just like sun and moon ,Coz they know the right time ,they know artist value ,they know the value of artist passion ,They have that madness towards to work and to serve things on time . I haven't seen in my life the team like this .I just love u guys and I'm a big fan of your working style and skills . Thank ulGod bless you .Asif Iqbal

review_title: Great service, not just another faceless aggregator
review_content: Use these folks all the time for my own releases and as a record producer I advise my independent clients to consider Ditto.

column1: Had a problem/query once and they sorted it on the phone with minimal hassle.
review_content: Russell Cottier v

review_title: Amazing response and help from JAYNE
review_content: I had an amazing experience with JAYNE who helped me swiftly and efficiently.So thankful !!!

column1: The site is so easy to use and understand and I just LOVE IT!!!!

review_content: Icie MC

review_title: Ditto : simple, efficient and oriented to musicians
review_content: I worked with Ditto when I released my first E.P and I was able to control everything myself from their Dashboard. Ditto is a great artist-to-fan tool that contribute to change the way we market music.

column1: The team is always here to help you if you need and are very quick to respond. I left Ditto for the unique reason that I had to have a Canadian Digital distributor to apply for fundings in Quebec.
I recommend this solution to any musician who wants to go DIY
review_content: florian gravouil

As the music industry fluctuates like like the melting ice caps We as musicians have to control our own destiny no longer dealing with idiotic A&R long release dates endless meetings. With Ditto you can be in control of your own destiny. Having signed 5 major record deals the Ditto model is totally liberating. I have had records sell enough too chart in the top 100 and l didn't even leave my studio. Now with their Promotion package and Chart breaker packages also just their telephone support l have seen many Ditto artist break the top 10. Every artist l meet with whom l collaborate I've told them get your stuff on Ditto some have and forgotten they did it and have then gone back a year later too find they've made hundreds of pounds.

review_title: Ditto music have been great to work with.
review_content: I have twice used Ditto music, and both times I have been very happy with the service they provide. Very helpful people who listened to my needs, and did a great job. I would recommend Ditto music to anyone, as I am confident that you will get excellent service from the team.

I found Ditto while researching online music and video distribution for my last EP "Black Denim" out of Nashville. I was attracted by their UK base and the way they seemed to "get" what was missing from digital distribution services. Turned out I couldn't have been more right! Ditto Music is one of a kind. My prior experiences with CD Baby were fine... just fine, thats all. Ditto Music has taken what every artist wants in a record label opportunity and made it available to the world! Unlike every other music distribution company, they are real people [with real offices] who will meet with you face to face and get excited about your project, offering solid feedback on what, where and how to promote and sell your music. They essentially offer the indie artist everything a label does for very reasonable & straight forward cost. I couldn't have asked for more in promoting and distributing my music & videos!
Replies polite and timely, excellent service

review_title: Always there when I need them
review_content: I wish I'd found these guys earlier.  Any problems have been dealt with without fuss. And you get to speak to real people none of this press 1 for this hash tag for that. Also they have been very patient with all my questions which have been more than a few.

Have dealt with these guys for the first time today and can't say enough to do justice to the service I received. So great to be able to deal with a distro company both online and over the phone and have great contact back from them so promptly.

I've had some tracks up on ditto for quite some time now. I've made quite a few sales. Those sales were made back in June 2014. I'm yet to see them in my account. I've opened many tickets over the last year, and they have all fobbed me off. It took 2 quarters to actually show up a small amount of my sales data. Not including the stores that my tracks actually sold at. They seem to be just out to get your money.

review_title: If you're not using Ditto, you're not using your head.
review_content: Ditto is an amazing, fast, and reliable service to distribute your music with. When they released my track they did it fast and were very accommodating. They took care of me like they would want to be taken care of! No hassle and they take care of anything you want immediately! Without Ditto my career would have never been able to take off! Thank you Ditto Music!

After careful consideration, we recruited the PR Services of Ditto Music for our debut EP release.  The guys at Ditto are a real pleasure to work with.  As an unsigned band, it is important to dream big and aim for the sky, but equally as important to have a grounded PR team behind you who have breadth & depth, and able to help you achieve these goals.  Ditto has successfully placed our band across major media outlets & radio stations.  Being new to this, we also found the insight & guidance we received from Ditto extremely valuable in achieving our goals.  Can't recommend these guys highly enough! Rewired

review_title: Got my music on super quick
review_content: Music is up and all because of you guys

Ditto music brings a fresh and modern attitude to the music business.They are looking out for us artists , and they advice us ,  they get back to us quickly , and truly helps us as much as they can. I am really pleased with the service in every way shape and form. We are making money with Ditto and I gladly pay Ditto the fees they have for their services because without them it would not be possible. Andre - Spain
My dealings with ditto have been on both on their automated services and direct contact with their strategic planning team.

column1: I have to be honest and say their service and promotional efforts are second to none. Great for all in the industry from artists to managers...green to experienced.
review_content: Stefan Emslie

review_title: Been there since beginning and still there
review_content: after all my years involved with Music i finally found a company i could completely trust and after nearly 10 years (oh and by the way i was their first customer and i'm still there,) they are still doing it for me, straightforward, no hassle and no question is unanswered, whether your just starting out or been round the block many times Ditto Music does the job 100%, 100% of the time, hooking up with them was one of the best things i ever did, Scott Kerr/WAY UP

Ditto has helped DreamBase Records launch singles faster than any other distributor we have worked with. Along with their quick response team, they have the best costumer service you can ask for. Polite and to the point Ditto is my favourite distributor.

I've been working with Ditto Music since September 2014 and have released three different projects under their supervision.  First of all, the price of working with Ditto is significantly less than CD Baby, and the customer has been better, too.  They are quick to response and act any time that I have a question for the American branch.  It's important to feel like you matter, especially for an independent artist.  Ditto Music takes care of my business and acts quickly to resolve any issues.  I highly suggest working with them.
